tika-s0102t:13_1: Yathājātānaṃ karerirukkhānaṃ ghanapattasākhāviṭapehi maṇḍapasaṅkhepehi sañchanno padeso “karerimaṇḍapo”ti adhippeto.
tika-s0102t:13_3: Dvāre ṭhitarukkhavasena aññatthāpi samaññā atthīti dassetuṃ “yathā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:13_4: Kathaṃ pana bhagavā mahāgandhakuṭiyaṃ avasitvā tadā karerikuṭikāyaṃ vihāsīti?
tika-s0102t:13_5: Sāpi buddhassa bhagavato vasanagandhakuṭi evāti dassento “antojetavane”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:14_0: Maṇḍalasaṇṭhānā māḷasaṅkhepena katā nisīdanasālā “maṇḍalamāḷa”nti adhippetāti āha “nisīdanasālāyā”ti.
tika-s0102t:14_5: khandhā ca santānavaseneva pavattantīti āha “pubbenivutthakkhandhasantānasaṅkhātena pubbenivāsenā”ti.
tika-s0102t:15_2: Taṃ panassā uppannākāraṃ pāḷiyaṃ saṅkhepatova dassitaṃ,
tika-s0102t:15_10: Aggappattakammavādinoti sikhāppattakammavādino “atthi kammaṃ atthi kammavipāko”ti evaṃ kammassakatāñāṇe ṭhitā tāpasaparibbājakā.
tika-s0102t:15_11: Cattālīsaṃyeva kappe anussarantīti brahmajālādīsu bhagavatā tathā paricchijja vuttattā.
tika-s0102t:15_12: Tato paraṃ na anussarantīti tathāvacanañca diṭṭhigatopaṭṭhakassa tesaṃ ñāṇassa paridubbalabhāvato.
tika-s0102t:16_3: dve ca asaṅkhyeyyānī”ti kālavasena evaṃ parimāṇo yathākkamaṃ aggasāvakapaccekabuddhānaṃ puññañāṇābhinīhāro,
tika-s0102t:16_7: Yadi bodhisambhārasambharaṇakālaparicchinno tesaṃ tesaṃ ariyānaṃ abhiññāñāṇavibhavo,
tika-s0102t:16_8: evaṃ sante buddhānampissa saparicchedatā āpannāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “buddhānaṃ pana ettakanti paricchedo natthi,
tika-s0102t:16_12: Sabbaññutaññāṇassa viya hi buddhānaṃ abhiññāñāṇānampi savisaye paricchedo nāma natthi,
tika-s0102t:16_15: Atha vā satipi kālaparicchede karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahādinā sātisayattā mahābodhisambhārānaṃ paññāpāramitāya
tika-s0102t:17_3: taṃ saññābhave tattha tattha anussaraṇavasena gahetvā gacchantā ekavokārabhave alabhantā “na passantī”ti vuttā,
tika-s0102t:18_0: Evaṃ santepīti kāmaṃ buddhasāvakāpi asaññabhave khandhappavattiṃ na passanti,
tika-s0102t:18_1: evaṃ santepi te buddhasāvakā asaññabhavaṃ laṅghitvā parato anussaranti.
tika-s0102t:18_5: so asaññabhavo”ti evaṃ sammāsambuddhehi desitāyaṃ dhammanettiyaṃ ṭhatvā.
tika-s0102t:18_6: Evañhi antarā cutipaṭisandhiyo apassantā parato anussaranti seyyathāpi āyasmā sobhitoti.
tika-s0102t:18_7: So kira pubbenivāse ciṇṇavasī hutvā anupaṭipāṭiyā attano nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ anussaranto yāva asaññabhave attano acittakapaṭisandhi tāva addasa,
tika-s0102t:18_8: tato paraṃ pañcakappasataparimāṇe kāle cutipaṭisandhiyo adisvā avasāne cutiṃ disvā “kiṃ nāmeta”nti āvajjayamāno
tika-s0102t:18_10: Atha naṃ bhagavā taṃ kāraṇaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
tika-s0102t:18_11: “Cutipaṭisandhiṃ oloketvā”ti idaṃ cutipaṭisandhivasena tesaṃ ñāṇassa saṅkamanadassanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:18_12: tena sabbaso bhave anāmasitvā gantuṃ na sakkontīti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:19_0: Taṃ tadeva passantīti yathā nāma saradasamaye ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāya caturatanike gehe cakkhumato purisassa
tika-s0102t:19_2: siyā pana tassa sukhumataratirohitādibhedassa rūpagatassa agocaratā.
tika-s0102t:19_3: Na tveva buddhānaṃ ñātuṃ icchitassa ñeyyassa agocaratā,
tika-s0102t:19_4: atha kho taṃ ñāṇālokena obhāsitaṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya supākaṭaṃ suvibhūtameva hoti tathā ñeyyāvaraṇassa suppahīnattā.
tika-s0102t:19_5: Tenāha “buddhā pana attanā vā parehi vā diṭṭhakatasutaṃ,
tika-s0102t:21_5: osadhīnaṃ vā anubalappadāyakattā “osadhī”ti evaṃ laddhanāmāya tārakāya pabhāsadisaṃ.
tika-s0102t:22_0: Asaṅgaappaṭihataṃ pavattamānaṃ bhagavato ñāṇaṃ lahutarepi visaye,
tika-s0102t:22_1: garutare ca ekasadisamevāti dassetuṃ “dubbalapattapuṭe”tiādinā upamādvayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:22_2: Dhammakāyattā bhagavato guṇaṃ ārabbha pavattā “bhagavantaṃyeva ārabbha uppannā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:22_3: Taṃ sabbampīti taṃ yathāvuttaṃ sabbampi pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ.
tika-s0102t:22_5: sāvakānañca pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ bhagavato pubbenivāsānussaraṇassa hīnudāharaṇadassanavasenettha kathitaṃ.
tika-s0102t:22_6: Evañhi bhagavato mahantabhāvo visesato pakāsito hotīti.
tika-s0102t:22_8: Yattakopi pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa pavattibhedo attano ñāṇassa visayabhūto,
tika-s0102t:22_9: taṃ sabbaṃ tadā yathākathitaṃ te bhikkhū saṅkhipitvā “itipī”ti āhaṃsu.
tika-s0102t:22_12: “iti kho bhikkhave sappaṭibhayo bālo”tiādīsu viya ākārattho iti-
tika-s0102t:23_1: Vuttamevāti ettha ca idha pāṭhe yaṃ vattabbaṃ tena pāṭhena sādhāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0102t:23_3: na asādhāraṇaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanāya adhikatattāti taṃ dassento “ayameva hi viseso”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:23_4: “Assosī”ti idaṃ savanakiccanipphattiyā vuttaṃ saddaggahaṇamukhena tadatthāvabodhassa siddhattā.
tika-s0102t:23_5: Tattha pana pāḷiyaṃ “imaṃ saṃkhiyadhammaṃ viditvā” icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:23_6: Ime bhikkhū mama guṇe thomenti, kathaṃ?
tika-s0102t:23_11: iti iminā samānattho nipātoti vuttaṃ “iccheyyātha nū”ti.
tika-s0102t:23_14: saddena kiriyāparāmasanabhūtena “dhammiṃ kathaṃ katheyyā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:23_15: Dhammikathākaraṇaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ “etassā”ti padassa atthoti āha “etassa dhammikathākaraṇassā”ti,
tika-s0102t:24_7: Chinnaṃ upacchinnaṃ vaṭumaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ etesanti chinnavaṭumakā,
tika-s0102t:24_19: Yanti yena kāraṇenāti ayamettha atthoti āha “karaṇavacane dissatī”ti.
tika-s0102t:25_0: Kālassa bhaddatā nāma tattha sattānaṃ guṇavibhūtiyā,
tika-s0102t:25_1: buddhuppādaparamā ca guṇavibhūtīti tabbahulatā yassa kappassa bhaddatāti āha “pañcabuddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitattā sundarakappe”ti,
tika-s0102t:25_3: “Imaṃ kappaṃ thomento evamāhā”ti vatvā imassa kappassa tathā thometabbatā anaññasādhāraṇāti dassetuṃ “yato paṭṭhāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:25_4: Tattha yato paṭṭhāyāti yato pabhuti abhinīhāro katoti manussattādiaṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato abhinīhāro pavattito.
tika-s0102t:25_5: Saṃsārassa anādibhāvato imassa bhagavato abhinīhārato puretaraṃ uppannā sammāsambuddhā anantā aparimeyyāti
tika-s0102t:25_8: tassa pana bhagavato nibbatti imassa abhinīhārato purimatarāti vuttaṃ “amhākaṃ…pe…
tika-s0102t:26_3: sumedhassa ca bhagavato antare ekūnasattatikappasahassāni buddhasuññāni ahesunti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:26_4: “Ito aṭṭhārasannaṃ kappasahassānaṃ uparī”ti iminā sujātassa bhagavato,
tika-s0102t:26_5: atthadassissa ca bhagavato antare ekenūnāni dvādasakappasahassāni buddhasuññāni ahesunti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:26_7: siddhatthassa ca bhagavato antare chādhikanavasatuttarāni sattarasakappasahassāni buddhasuññāni ahesunti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:26_9: sikhissa ca bhagavato antare saṭṭhi kappāni buddhasuññāni ahesunti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:26_10: Te sabbepi padumuttarassa bhagavato oraṃ sumedhādīhi uppannakappehi saddhiṃ samodhāniyamānā satasahassā kappā honti,
tika-s0102t:26_11: yattha mahāsāvakādayo vivaṭṭū panissayāni kusalāni sambhariṃsu.
tika-s0102t:26_12: Buddhasuññepi loke paccekabuddhā uppajjitvā tesaṃ purisavisesānaṃ puññābhisandābhibuddhiyā paccayā honti.
tika-s0102t:27_11: Yojanasahassamattā hutvāti patamānāva udakadhārā yojanasahassamattaṃ ākāsaṭṭhānaṃ pharitvā pavattiyā yojanasahassamattā hutvā.
tika-s0102t:28_6: Pubbanimittasannissayo hi gaccho nissitavohārena tathā vutto.
tika-s0102t:28_12: Tathā hi te catutthiṃyeva viññāṇaṭṭhitiṃ bhajanti.
tika-s0102t:28_15: Nimīyati anumīyati phalaṃ etenāti nimittaṃ, kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:28_16: Ñāpakampi hi kāraṇaṃ disvā tassa abyabhicārībhāvena phalaṃ siddhameva katvā gaṇhi,
tika-s0102t:28_17: yathā taṃ asito isi abhijātiyaṃ mahāpurisassa lakkhaṇāni disvā tesaṃ abyabhicārībhāvena buddhaguṇe siddhe eva katvā gaṇhi,
tika-s0102t:28_18: evaṃ pana gayhamānaṃ tannimittakaṃ phalaṃ tadānubhāvena siddhaṃ viya voharīyati tabbhāve bhāvato.
tika-s0102t:28_20: Tathā cāha bhagavā “so tena lakkhaṇena samannāgato…pe…
tika-s0102t:28_22: buddho samāno kiṃ labhatī”ti ca evamādi.
tika-s0102t:28_23: Imamatthanti pañca buddhā imasmiṃ kappe uppajjissantīti imamatthaṃ yāthāvato jāniṃsu.
tika-s0102t:30_1: Kappaparicchedavasenāti “ito so ekanavute kappe”tiādinā yattha yattha kappe te te buddhā uppannā,
tika-s0102t:30_3: “Idaṃ ta”nti hi niyametvā paricchijja jānanaṃ paricchindanaṃ paricchedo.
tika-s0102t:31_0: “Appaṃ vā bhiyyo”ti avisesajotanaṃ “vīsaṃ vā tiṃsaṃ vā”tiādinā aniyamitavaseneva yathālābhato vavatthapetvā
tika-s0102t:31_1: ayañca nayo apacuroti dassento “evaṃ dīghāyuko pana atidullabho”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:31_2: Idaṃ taṃ visesavavatthāpanaṃ puggalesu pakkhipitvā dassento “tattha visākhā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:32_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā amhākaṃ bhagavā tattakampi kālaṃ na jīvi,
tika-s0102t:32_1: nanu mahābodhisattā carimabhave ativiyauḷāratamena puññābhisaṅkhārena paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantīti?
tika-s0102t:32_13: Tattha cirataraṃ kālaṃ santānassa pāramitāparibhāvitatā ādhāravisesatā.
tika-s0102t:33_0: Ayañca nayo sabbesaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ carimabhavābhinibbattakakammāyūhane sādhāraṇoti tassa phalenāpi
tika-s0102t:33_1: ekasadiseneva bhavitabbanti āha “iti sabbe buddhā asaṅkhyeyyāyukā”ti,
tika-s0102t:33_4: buddhā pana tadā manussānaṃ paramāyuppamāṇānurūpameva kālaṃ ṭhatvā parinibbāyanti tato paraṃ ṭhatvā sādhetabbapayojanābhāvato,
tika-s0102t:33_6: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tato paraṃ pana aṭṭhānassa “utubhojanavipattiyā”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:33_7: “taṃ lokasādhāraṇaṃ loke jātasaṃvuddhānaṃ tathāgatānaṃ na hotī”ti na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-s0102t:33_11: bhojanassa ca vasena yathākkamaṃ āyu hāyatipi vaḍḍhatipi.
tika-s0102t:34_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ samudāgamato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ “tattha yadā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:34_7: Tesaṃ kira tathā cittuppādasamakālameva yathicchitaṭṭhānaṃ uṇhaṃ pharamānā valāhakamālā nātibahalā ito cito nabhaṃ chādentī vitanoti.
tika-s0102t:34_9: Abbhavalāhakā pana devatā sītuṇhavassehi vinā kevalaṃ abbhapaṭalasseva samuṭṭhāpakā veditabbā.
tika-s0102t:34_11: Kāmaṃ heṭṭhā vuttā sattavidhāpi devatā cātumahārājikāva tā pana tena tena visesena vatvā idāni tadaññe
tika-s0102t:34_13: Tāsaṃ adhammikatāyāti rājūnaṃ adhammikabhāvamūlakena uparājādiadhammikabhāvaparamparābhatena tāsaṃ devatānaṃ adhammikabhāvena.
tika-s0102t:34_14: Visamaṃ candimasūriyā pariharantīti bahvābādhatādi aniṭṭhaphalūpanissayabhūtassa yathāvuttaadhammikatāsaññitassa
tika-s0102t:34_15: sādhāraṇassa pāpakammassa balena visamaṃ vāyantena vāyunā pīḷiyamānā candimasūriyā sineruṃ parikkhipantā
tika-s0102t:34_18: evaṃ utuvassādivisamappavattīti dassetuṃ “vāto yathāmaggena na vāyatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:34_21: Tasmiṃ asampajjanteti tasmiṃ yathāvutte vassabījabhūte utumhi yathākālaṃ sampattiṃ anupagacchante.
tika-s0102t:35_0: “Na sammā devo vassatī”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto “kadācī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:35_1: Tattha kadāci vassatīti kadāci avassanakāle vassati.
tika-s0102t:35_2: Kadāci na vassatīti kadāci vassitabbakāle na vassati.
tika-s0102t:35_16: Evaṃ utubhojanavasena āyu hāyati hetumhi aparikkhīṇepi paccayassa paridubbalattā.
tika-s0102t:37_1: Na hi ekasmiṃ antarakappe aneke buddhā uppajjanti,
tika-s0102t:40_2: Taṃ pana tassā heṭṭhāpadeso hotīti āha “pāṭalirukkhassa heṭṭhā”ti.
tika-s0102t:40_5: So kira bodhirukkho sālakalyāṇī viya pathaviyā abbhantare eva puretaraṃ vaḍḍhento abhisambodhidivase pathaviṃ ubbhijjitvā uṭṭhito ratanasataṃ ucco,
tika-s0102t:40_6: tāvadeva ca vitthato hutvā nabhaṃ pūrento aṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0102t:40_7: Ayampi kiretassa rukkhabhāvena viya aññehi vemattatā.
tika-s0102t:40_11: samujjalanti tahaṃ tahaṃ olambitakusumadāmehi ceva tahaṃ tahaṃ khittamālāpiṇḍīhi ca ito cito vippakiṇṇavividhavaṇṭamuttapupphehi ca sammadeva ujjalaṃ.
tika-s0102t:40_12: Aññamaññaṃ sirīsampattānīti aññamaññassa siriyā sobhāya sampannāni.
tika-s0102t:42_0: Ekova pallaṅkoti ekova pallaṅkappadeso. So so rukkho “bodhī”ti vuccati bujjhanti etthāti katvā.
tika-s0102t:44_2: “Khaṇḍatissa”nti dvepi ekajjhaṃ gahetvā ekattavasena vuttanti āha “khaṇḍo ca tisso cā”ti,
tika-s0102t:44_4: vemātikopi vā jeṭṭhabhātā na hotīti “ekapitiko kaniṭṭhabhātā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:44_6: “Paññāpāramiyā matthakaṃ patto”ti vatvā tassa matthakappattaṃ guṇavisesaṃ dassetuṃ “sikhinā bhagavatā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:47_5: Abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya vatthuṃ kathetvā pabbajjā dīpetabbā,
tika-s0102t:47_6: sā pana yasmā manorathapūraṇiyaṃ aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ vitthārato āgatā,
tika-s0102t:49_1: Nibaddhupaṭṭhākabhāvanti ārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva parinibbānā niyataupaṭṭhākabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0102t:49_2: Aniyatuupaṭṭhākā pana bhagavato paṭhamabodhiyaṃ bahū ahesuṃ.
tika-s0102t:49_4: Idāni ānandatthero yena kāraṇena satthu nibaddhupaṭṭhākabhāvaṃ upagato,
tika-s0102t:49_7: “Ahaṃ iminā maggena gacchāmī”ti āha anayabyasanāpādakena kammunā codiyamāno.
tika-s0102t:49_8: Atha naṃ bhagavā tamatthaṃ anārocetvāva khemaṃ maggaṃ sandhāya “ehi bhikkhu iminā gacchāmā”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:49_11: Tañhi tassa hoti dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāyātiti.
tika-s0102t:50_2: Dhammagāravanissito saṃvego dhammasaṃvego “amhesu nāma tiṭṭhantesu bhagavatopi īdisaṃ jāta”nti.
tika-s0102t:50_3: “Ahaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti vadanto dhammasenāpati atthato evaṃ vadanto nāma hotīti “ahaṃ bhante tumhe”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:50_4: Asuññāyeva me sā disāti asuññāyeva mama sā disā.
tika-s0102t:51_0: Vasituṃ na dassatīti ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vāsaṃ na labhissatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:51_1: Parammukhā desitassāpi dhammassāti suttantadesanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:51_2: Abhidhammadesanā panassa parammukhāva pavattā pageva yācanāya.
tika-s0102t:51_4: So niddesapaṭisambhidā viya therassa bhikkhuto gahitadhammakkhandhapakkhiyo.
tika-s0102t:51_5: Apare pana “dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko paṭipāṭiyā tikadukesu devasikaṃ katokāso bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi,
tika-s0102t:51_7: Evaṃ abhidhammopi satthārā parammukhā desitopi therena sammukhā paṭiggahitova ahosī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0102t:52_1: Thero hi upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ laddhakālato paṭṭhāya bhagavantaṃ duvidhena udakena,
tika-s0102t:52_4: gandhakuṭipariveṇasammajjanenāti evamādīhi kiccehi upaṭṭhahanto “imāya nāma velāya satthu idaṃ nāma laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-s0102t:52_5: idaṃ nāma kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā taṃ taṃ nipphādento mahatiṃ daṇḍadīpikaṃ gahetvā ekarattiṃ gandhakuṭipariveṇaṃ nava vāre anupariyāyati.
tika-s0102t:52_6: Evaṃ hissa ahosi “sace me thinamiddhaṃ okkameyya,
tika-s0102t:52_7: bhagavati pakkosante paṭivacanaṃ dātuṃ nāhaṃ sakkuṇeyya”nti,
tika-s0102t:52_8: tasmā sabbarattiṃ daṇḍadīpikaṃ hatthena na muñcati.
tika-s0102t:54_1: Ettakaṃ kathetvāti kappaparicchedādinavavārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ vipassīādīnaṃ sattannaṃ buddhānaṃ pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ ettāvatā desanaṃ desetvā.
tika-s0102t:54_2: Kasmā panettha bhagavā vipassīādīnaṃ sattannaṃyeva buddhānaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ kathesi,
tika-s0102t:56_0: Kamhi kāle tayā vīra, patthitā bodhimuttamā”ti. ādinā –
tika-s0102t:57_0: Pavattaṃ taṃ pucchaṃ adhikāraṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā yassa sammāsambuddhassa pādamūle attanā mahābhinīhāro kato,
tika-s0102t:57_1: taṃ dīpaṅkaraṃ bhagavantaṃ ādiṃ katvā yesaṃ catuvīsatiyā buddhānaṃ santikā bodhiyā laddhabyākaraṇo hutvā tattha tattha pāramiyo pūresi,
tika-s0102t:57_6: tato vā pana purato buddhe ārabbha pubbenivāsaṃ katheyya.
tika-s0102t:57_7: Tasmā na ettha buddhavaṃsadesanāyaṃ viya pubbenivāso vitthārito.
tika-s0102t:57_8: Yasmā ca buddhānaṃ desanā nāma desanāya bhājanabhūtānaṃ puggalānaṃ ñāṇabalānurūpā,
tika-s0102t:57_14: tādisānañca devatānaṃ vasena pubbenivāsaṃ kathento sattannameva buddhānaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ kathesi.
tika-s0102t:57_15: Tathā hi ne bhagavā palobhanavasena samuttejetuṃ sappapañcatāya kathāya desanaṃ matthakaṃ apāpetvāva gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi.
tika-s0102t:57_16: Tathā ca imissā eva desanāya anusārato āṭānāṭiyaparitta-
tika-s0102t:58_0: Apicettha bhagavā attano suddhāvāsacārikāvibhāviniyā uparidesanāya saṅgahatthaṃ vipassīādīnaṃ eva sattannaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ kathesi.
tika-s0102t:58_1: Tesaṃyeva hi sāvakā tadā ceva etarahi ca suddhāvāsabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitā,
tika-s0102t:58_3: “Siddhatthatissaphussānaṃ kira buddhānaṃ sāvakā suddhāvāsesu upapannā upapattisamanantarameva imasmiṃ
tika-s0102t:58_4: sāsane upakādayo viya arahattaṃ adhigantvā nacirasseva parinibbāyiṃsu,
tika-s0102t:58_5: na tattha tattha yāvatāyukaṃ aṭṭhaṃsū”ti vadanti.
tika-s0102t:58_6: Tathā yesaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ paṭivedhasāsanaṃ ekaṃsato nicchaye na ajjāpi dharati,
tika-s0102t:58_8: te eva kittento vipassīādīnaṃyeva bhagavantānaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ imasmiṃ sutte kathesi veneyyajjhāsayavasena.
tika-s0102t:58_9: Apubbācarimaniyamo pana aparāparaṃ saṃsaraṇakasattavāsavasena ekissā lokadhātuyā icchitoti na tenetaṃ virujjhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:58_10: Nirantaraṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvāti abhijātito paṭṭhāya yāva pātimokkhuddeso yāva tā buddhakiccasiddhi,
tika-s0102t:61_1: aṭṭhakathāsu āgatattā pana ānetvā dīpetabboti taṃ dīpento “sabbabodhisattānañhī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:61_5: tena tesaṃ jātanagarādi paññāyamānaṃ ekaṃsato manussabhāvasañjānanatthaṃ icchitabbaṃ,
tika-s0102t:61_6: aññathā yathādhippetabuddhakiccasiddhi eva na siyāti dasseti,
tika-s0102t:61_7: yato mahāsattānaṃ carimabhave manussaloke eva pātubhāvo,
tika-s0102t:63_4: Tathā mahāsattena vuttavacanameva gahetvā kumārassa “rāhulo”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
tika-s0102t:63_10: Itthiratanabhāvato manussaloke sabbāsaṃ itthīnaṃ bimbapaṭicchannabhūtāti bimbā.
tika-s0102t:65_1: Cūḷaṃsena chādetvāti tiriyabhāgena ṭhapanavasena sabbaṃ vihāraṭṭhānaṃ chādetvā.
tika-s0102t:66_3: Paṭhamapadagaṇṭhikāti pacchime sopānaphalake ṭhatvā ṭhapiyamānassa dakkhiṇapādassa patiṭṭhahanaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:66_4: Taṃ pana yasmā daḷhaṃ thiraṃ kenaci abhejjaṃ hoti,
tika-s0102t:66_7: tattha yasmiṃ ṭhāne purimānaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ mañcā paññattā,
tika-s0102t:66_8: tasmiṃyeva padese amhākampi bhagavato mañco paññattoti katvā “cattāri mañcapādaṭṭhānāni avijahitāneva hontī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:66_9: Mañcānaṃ pana mahantakhuddakabhāvena mañcapaññāpanapadesassa mahantāmahantatā appamāṇaṃ,
tika-s0102t:66_10: buddhānubhāvena pana so padeso sabbadā ekappamāṇoyeva hotīti “cattāri mañcapādaṭṭhānāni avijahitāneva hontī”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:66_11: Vihāropi na vijahito yevāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0102t:66_12: Purimaṃ vihāraṭṭhānaṃ na pariccajatīti hi attho.
tika-s0102t:68_1: tato tiguṇaṃ bhagavato sarīrappamāṇanti bhagavā aṭṭhārasahattho”ti vadanti.
tika-s0102t:68_2: Apare pana bhaṇanti “manussānaṃ pākatikahatthena catuhattho majjhimapuriso,
tika-s0102t:68_3: tato tiguṇaṃ bhagavato sarīrappamāṇanti bhagavā dvādasahattho upādinnakarūpadhammavasena,
tika-s0102t:68_4: samantato pana byāmamattaṃ byāmappabhā pharatīti upari chahatthaṃ abbhuggato,
tika-s0102t:70_5: sarīrappabhā ca buddhānaṃ visadisāti idha pāḷiyaṃ anāgatā,
tika-s0102t:70_6: tasmā tehi saddhiṃ vemattatāsāmaññena āyukulānipi idha āharitvā dīpitāni.
tika-s0102t:70_11: tadubhayaṃ pana buddhaguṇaggahaṇena gahitameva hotīti na uddhaṭaṃ.
tika-s0102t:70_12: Yadaggena hi sabbabuddhānaṃ buddhaguṇesu vemattaṃ natthi,
tika-s0102t:70_13: tadaggena nesaṃ sambodhisambhāresupi vemattaṃ natthīti. Kasmā?
tika-s0102t:70_16: Mahābodhisattānañhi hetuavatthāyaṃ sambhatūpanissayindriyaparipākā veneyyapuggalā carimabhave arahattasampattiyā
tika-s0102t:70_17: paripositāni kamalavanāni sūriyarasmisamphassena viya tathāgataguṇānubhāvasamphassena vibodhaṃ upagacchantīti
tika-s0102t:71_2: saddena katamahābhinīhāro cāti ayampi attho saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0102t:74_0: “Eteneva ca sabbabuddhānaṃ visākhānakkhatteneva mahābhinīhāro hotī”ti ca vadanti.
tika-s0102t:75_2: aññe pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantā iminā ākārena anussarantīti attho,
tika-s0102t:75_4: tāva anussaraṇaṃ ārohanaṃ atītaatītataraatītatamādijātisaṅkhāte pubbenivāse ñāṇassa abhimukhabhāvena pavattīti katvā.
tika-s0102t:75_6: tāva anussaraṇaṃ orohanaṃ pubbenivāse paṭimukhabhāvena ñāṇassa pavattīti āha “pacchāmukhaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesetvā”ti.
tika-s0102t:75_7: Cutigantabbanti yaṃ panidaṃ cutiyā ñāṇagatiyā gantabbaṃ,
tika-s0102t:75_11: Aparampi kāraṇanti chinnavaṭumānussaraṇaṃ pacchāmukhaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesanato aparaṃ acchariyabbhutakāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:75_23: buddhānañca lokiyasīlampi lokuttarasīlaṃ viya anaññasādhāraṇaṃ evāti dassetuṃ “lokiyalokuttarasīlenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:75_25: Samādhipakkhāti samādhi ca samādhipakkhā ca samādhipakkhā,
tika-s0102t:76_1: Nīvaraṇādīhīti nīvaraṇehi ceva tadekaṭṭhehi ca pāpadhammehi,
tika-s0102t:76_13: apagamo ca nibbānassa tehi vivittattā evāti āha “dūre ṭhitattā”ti.
tika-s0102t:77_3: Suppaṭividdhāti suṭṭhu paṭividdhā savāsanānaṃ sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ pajahanato.
tika-s0102t:77_5: dasabalañāṇādayo cāti sabbe buddhaguṇā bhagavatā adhigatā ahesuṃ.
tika-s0102t:77_10: Devacārikakolāhalanti attano devaloke cārikāyaṃ suddhāvāsadevānaṃ kutūhalappavattiṃ dassento suttantapariyosāne vicāressati,
tika-s0102t:77_12: Ayaṃ desanāti “ito so bhikkhave”tiādinā vitthārato pavattitadesanamāha.
tika-s0102t:77_14: Sā hi imissā desanāya nidānaṭṭhāniyattā tathā vuttā.
tika-s0102t:79_1: “Vipassīti tassa nāma”nti vatvā tassa anvatthataṃ dassetuṃ “tañca kho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:79_3: tadaññe ca indriyagocarabhūte te ca yathūpagate,
tika-s0102t:79_7: so eva sattayogato bodhisattoti āha “paṇḍitasatto bujjhanakasatto”ti.
tika-s0102t:79_10: tato paṭṭhāya mahābodhiyaṃ ekantaninnattā bodhimhi satto bodhisattoti āha “bodhisaṅkhātesū”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:79_13: “Sato sampajāno”ti iminā catutthāya gabbhāvakkantiyā okkamīti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:79_14: Catasso hi gabbhāvakkantiyo idhekacco gabbho mātukucchiyaṃ okkamane, ṭhāne,
tika-s0102t:79_22: Tattha paṭhamā gabbhāvakkanti lokiyamahājanassa vasena vuttā,
tika-s0102t:79_26: Te kira kammajavātehi uddhaṃpādā adhosirā anekasataporise papāte viya yonimukhe khittā tāḷacchiggaḷena
tika-s0102t:79_27: hatthī viya sambādhena yonimukhena nikkhamantā mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ pāpuṇanti,
tika-s0102t:79_28: tena nesaṃ “mayaṃ nikkhamāmā”ti sampajaññaṃ na hoti.
tika-s0102t:79_30: Te hi mātukucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantāpi pajānanti,
tika-s0102t:79_33: Na hi te kammajavātā uddhaṃpāde adhosire katvā khipituṃ sakkonti,
tika-s0102t:79_34: dve hatthe pasāritvā akkhīni ummīletvā ṭhitakāva nikkhamantīti.
tika-s0102t:79_35: Ñāṇena paricchinditvāti pubbabhāge pañcamahāvilokanañāṇehi ceva “idāni cavāmī”ti cutiparicchindanañāṇena
tika-s0102t:79_36: ca aparabhāge “idha mayā paṭisandhi gahitā”ti paṭisandhiparicchindanañāṇena ca paricchijja jānitvā.
tika-s0102t:80_1: ñātatthacariyādīnañca satipi pāramiyā pariyāpannabhāve sambhāravisesabhāvadassanatthaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:80_8: tathāpi pariccāgavisesabhāvadassanatthañceva sudukkarabhāvadassanatthañca mahāpariccāgānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:80_9: Tato eva ca aṅgapariccāgatopi visuṃ nayanapariccāgaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0102t:80_13: Tathā sattalokassa diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthānaṃ vasena hitacariyā lokatthacariyā.
tika-s0102t:80_22: Tattha gatapaccāgatavattasaṅkhātāya pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya saddhiṃ abhiññāsamāpattinipphādanaṃ pubbayogo.
tika-s0102t:80_27: sattānaṃ bodhittaye patiṭṭhāpanaparipācanavasena ca pavattakathā dhammakkhānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:80_28: Koṭiṃ patvāti paraṃ pariyantaṃ paramukkaṃsaṃ pāpuṇitvā.
tika-s0102t:80_29: Sattamahādānānīti aṭṭhavassikakāle “hadayamaṃsādīnipi yācakānaṃ dadeyya”nti ajjhāsayaṃ uppādetvā dinnadānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:81_0: “Idāneva me maraṇaṃ hotū”ti adhimuccitvā kālakaraṇaṃ adhimuttikālakiriyā,
tika-s0102t:81_3: Bodhisattā kira dīghāyukadevaloke ṭhitā “idha ṭhitassa me bodhisambhārasambharaṇaṃ na sambhavatī”ti katvā tattha vāsato nibbindamānasā honti,
tika-s0102t:81_4: tadā vimānaṃ pavisitvā akkhīni nimīletvā “ito uddhaṃ me jīvitaṃ nappavattatū”ti cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāya nisīdanti,
tika-s0102t:81_6: Pāramīdhammānañhi ukkaṃsappavattiyā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ attabhāve abhiññāsamāpattīhi santānassa visesitattā attasinehassa tanubhāvena,
tika-s0102t:81_7: sattesu ca mahākaruṇāya uḷārabhāvena adhiṭṭhānassa tikkhavisadabhāvāpattiyā bodhisattānaṃ adhippāyā samijjhanti. Citte,
tika-s0102t:81_9: tasmā yattha upapannānaṃ pāramiyo sammadeva paribrūhanti.
tika-s0102t:81_11: Tathā hi amhākaṃ mahāsatto imasmiṃyeva kappe nānājātīsu aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke nibbatto,
tika-s0102t:81_12: appakameva kālaṃ tattha ṭhatvā tato cavitvā manussaloke nibbatto,
tika-s0102t:81_16: “Ekenaattabhāvena antarena pāramīnaṃ sabbaso pūritattā”ti iminā payojanābhāvato tattha ṭhatvā adhimuttikālakiriyā nāma nāhosīti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:81_17: Api ca tattha yāvatāyukaṭṭhānaṃ carimabhave anekamahānidhisamuṭṭhānapubbikāya dibbasampattisadisāya mahāsampattiyā nibbatti viya,
tika-s0102t:81_18: buddhabhūtassa asadisadānādivasena anaññasādhāraṇalābhuppatti viya ca “ito paraṃ mahāpurisassa dibbasampattianubhavanaṃ
tika-s0102t:81_19: nāma natthī”ti ussāhajātassa puññasambhārassa vasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:82_3: Amilāyitvāti ettha amilātaggahaṇeneva tāsaṃ mālānaṃ vaṇṇasampadāyapi gandhasampadāyapi sobhāsampadāyapi avināso dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:82_4: Bāhirabbhantarānaṃ rajojallānaṃ lepassapi abhāvato devānaṃ sarīragatāni vatthāni sabbakālaṃ parisuddhappabhassarāneva
tika-s0102t:82_6: Neva sītaṃ na uṇhanti yassa sītassa paṭikāravasena adhikaṃ seviyamānaṃ uṇhaṃ,
tika-s0102t:82_7: sayameva vā kharataraṃ hutvā abhibhavantaṃ sarīre sedaṃ uppādeyya,
tika-s0102t:82_11: Bindubinduvasenāti chinnasuttāya āmuttamuttāvaliyā nipatantā muttaguḷikā viya bindu bindu hutvā.
tika-s0102t:82_19: Sā natthi uparūpari uḷārauḷārānameva bhogānaṃ visesato duvijānanānaṃ upatiṭṭhahanato.
tika-s0102t:83_1: Yathā devatā sampatijātā “kīdisena puññakammena idha nibbattā”ti cintetvā “iminā nāma puññakammena idha nibbattā”ti jānanti,
tika-s0102t:83_3: aññadāpi vā ekaccaṃ puññakammaṃ jānantiyeva mahāpuññāti āha “ye mahāpuññā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:84_2: Sattā na paramāyuno honti nāma pāpussannatāyāti āha “tadā hi sattā ussannakilesā hontī”ti. Etthāha –
tika-s0102t:84_8: tesaṃ sā acchariyadhammatā devattabhāve ṭhitānaṃ na pākaṭā hoti yathā manussabhūtānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:84_9: devabhūte hi sammāsambuddhe dissamānaṃ buddhānubhāvaṃ devānubhāvato loko dahati,
tika-s0102t:84_13: devattabhāvassa ca cirakālādhiṭṭhānato ekaccasassatavādato na parimuccati.
tika-s0102t:84_15: Sattānaṃ tādisaggāhavinimocanatthañhi buddhā bhagavanto manussasugatiyaṃyeva uppajjanti,
tika-s0102t:84_19: dhammaveneyyānaṃ dhammatantiyā ṭhapanassa viya dhātuveneyyānaṃ dhātūnaṃ ṭhapanassa icchitabbattā ca.
tika-s0102t:84_20: Na hi opapātikānaṃ parinibbānato uddhaṃ sarīradhātuyo tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0102t:84_21: Manussaloke uppajjantāpi mahābodhisattā carimabhave manussabhāvassa pākaṭabhāvakaraṇāya pana dārapariggahampi
tika-s0102t:84_28: Tathā hi tadattho mahābhinīhāropi manussabhūtānaṃyeva ijjhati,
tika-s0102t:85_0: Kasmā pana sammāsambuddhā jambudīpe eva uppajjanti,
tika-s0102t:85_11: paripācanañca buddhakhettabhūte imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe jambudīpe eva ijjhati,
tika-s0102t:85_13: Veneyyānaṃ vinayanattho ca buddhuppādoti aggasāvakamahāsāvakādi veneyyavisesāpekkhāya etasmiṃ jambudīpe eva buddhā nibbattanti,
tika-s0102t:85_16: Tesaṃ uttamapurisānaṃ tattheva uppatti sampatticakkānaṃ viya aññamaññūpanissayato aparāparaṃ vattatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0102t:85_17: eteneva imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ majjhe katvā iminā saddhiṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ dasasahassasseva khettabhāvo dīpito ito
tika-s0102t:85_18: aññassa buddhānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānassa tepiṭake buddhavacane anupalabbhanato.
tika-s0102t:85_21: Iminā nayena desaniyāmepi kāraṇaṃ nīharitvā vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:86_0: Idāni ca khattiyakulaṃ lokasammataṃ brāhmaṇānampi pūjanīyabhāvato.
tika-s0102t:86_1: “Rājā pitā bhavissatī”ti kulaṃ passi pituvasena kulassa niddisitabbato.
tika-s0102t:88_1: Kathaṃ pana tā devatā tadā bodhisattassa pūritapāramibhāvaṃ,
tika-s0102t:88_5: Tathā hi bhagavato dhammadānasaṃvibhāge anekavāraṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāsannipāto ahosi.
tika-s0102t:89_0: “Cavāmī”ti jānāti cutiāsannajavanehi ñāṇasahitehi cutiyā upaṭṭhitabhāvassa paṭisaṃviditattā.
tika-s0102t:89_5: Yasmā ekavāraṃ āvajjitamattena ārammaṇaṃ nicchinituṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0102t:89_10: Cutiyā puretaraṃ katipayacittavārato paṭṭhāya “maraṇaṃ me āsanna”nti jānanato “cutikkhaṇepi cavāmīti jānātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:89_11: Paṭisandhiyā pana apubbabhāvato paṭisandhicittaṃ na jānāti.
tika-s0102t:89_12: Nikantiyā uppattito parato “asukasmiṃ me ṭhāne paṭisandhi gahitā”ti jānāti.
tika-s0102t:89_14: Dasasahassilokadhātu kampatīti ettha kampanakāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā brahmajālavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva.
tika-s0102t:89_17: Mahākāruṇikā buddhā bhagavanto sattānaṃ hitasukhavidhānatapparatāya bahulaṃ somanassikāva hontīti tesaṃ
tika-s0102t:89_19: Mahāsivattheropana yadipi mahākāruṇikā buddhā bhagavanto sattānaṃ hitasukhavidhānatapparāva,
tika-s0102t:89_20: vivekajjhāsayā pana visaṅkhāraninnā sabbasaṅkhāresu ajjhupekkhanabahulāti pañcamamahāvipākacittena paṭisandhiggahaṇamāha.
tika-s0102t:90_0: Pure puṇṇamāya sattamadivasato paṭṭhāyāti puṇṇamāya pure sattamadivasato paṭṭhāya,
tika-s0102t:90_2: Sattame divaseti navamito sattame divase āsaḷhipuṇṇamāyaṃ.
tika-s0102t:90_5: Atha nesaṃ deviyo āgantvā manussamalaharaṇatthaṃ nhāpetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:91_3: putto te bhavissatī”ti ettakameva te brāhmaṇā attano supinasatthanayena kathesuṃ.
tika-s0102t:91_4: “Sace agāraṃ ajjhāvasissatī”tiādi pana devatāviggahena tamatthaṃ yāthāvato pavedesuṃ.
tika-s0102t:92_2: dhammo eva dhammatā yathā devo eva devatāti āha “ayaṃ sabhāvo”ti,
tika-s0102t:92_4: Svāyaṃ sabhāvo atthato tathā niyatabhāvoti āha “ayaṃ niyāmoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0102t:92_5: Niyāmo pana bahuvidhoti te sabbe atthuddhāranayena uddharitvā idhādhippetaniyāmameva dassetuṃ “niyāmo ca nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:92_8: Itaro pana dhammo eva niyāmo dhammaniyāmo, dhammatā.
tika-s0102t:94_0: Arūpādibhūmibhāgavisesavasena utuvisesadassanato utuvisesena sijjhamānānaṃ rukkhādīnaṃ pupphaphalādiggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0102t:94_2: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāleti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vasantādikāle.
tika-s0102t:96_1: Vattamānasamīpe vattamāne viya voharitabbanti “okkamatī”ti vuttanti āha “okkanto hotīti ayamevattho”ti.
tika-s0102t:96_2: Evaṃ hotīti evaṃ vuttappakārenassa sampajānanā hoti.
tika-s0102t:97_9: saddena yathā heṭṭhā udakassa pidhāyikā pathavī natthīti asaṃvutā lokantarikā,
tika-s0102t:97_10: evaṃ uparipi cakkavāḷesu viya devavimānānaṃ abhāvato asaṃvutā appatiṭṭhāti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:97_14: Tathā hi “tena obhāsena aññamaññaṃ sañjānantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:97_15: Jambudīpe ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāyaṃ pubbavidehavāsīnaṃ atthaṅgamanavasena upaḍḍhaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ paññāyati,
tika-s0102t:97_17: evaṃ sesadīpesu pīti āha “ekappahāreneva tīsu dīpesu paññāyantī”ti.
tika-s0102t:97_18: Ito aññathā pana dvīsu eva dīpesu ekappahārena paññāyantīti.
tika-s0102t:97_19: Ekekāya disāya nava nava yojanasatasahassāni andhakāravidhamanampi imināva nayena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:97_20: Pabhāya nappahontīti attano pabhāya obhāsituṃ anabhisambhunanti.
tika-s0102t:97_21: Yugandharapabbatappamāṇe ākāse vicaraṇato “cakkavāḷapabbatassa vemajjhena vicarantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:98_4: Accantakhāreti ātapasantāpābhāvena atisītabhāvameva sandhāya accantakhāratā vuttā siyā.
tika-s0102t:98_5: Na hi taṃ kappasaṇṭhahanaudakaṃ sampattikaramahāmeghavuṭṭhaṃ pathavisandhārakaṃ kappavināsakaṃ udakaṃ viya khāraṃ bhavituṃ arahati.
tika-s0102t:98_7: tesaṃ vā pāpakammabalena petānaṃ udakassa pubbakheḷabhāvāpatti viya tassa udakassa tadā khārabhāvāpatti hotīti vuttaṃ “accantakhāre udake”ti.
tika-s0102t:99_0: Ekayāgupānamattampīti pattādibhājanagataṃ yāguṃ gaḷociādiuddharaṇiyā gahetvā pivanamattampi kālaṃ.
tika-s0102t:102_3: Parassa santike gahaṇena vinā attano sabhāveneva sayameva adhiṭṭhahitvā sīlasampannā.
tika-s0102t:102_5: Kāladevilassāti yathā kāladevilassa santike aññadā gaṇhāti,
tika-s0102t:103_3: Bodhisattassa mātuyā pana devesupi tādisaṃ cittaṃ nuppajjateva.
tika-s0102t:103_4: Yathā bodhisattassa ānubhāvena bodhisattamātu purisādhippāyacittaṃ nuppajjati,
tika-s0102t:103_5: evaṃ tassa ānubhāveneva sā kenaci purisena anabhibhavanīyāti āha “pādā na vahanti dibbasaṅkhalikā viya bajjhantī”ti.
tika-s0102t:104_2: puna “pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitā samaṅgībhūtā paricāretī”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:105_2: kāyassa garubhāvakathinabhāvādayopi tassā tadā na honti eva.
tika-s0102t:105_9: Cakkavattigabbhatopi hi savisesaṃ bodhisattagabbho parihāraṃ labhati puññasambhārassa sātisayattā,
tika-s0102t:105_10: tasmā bodhisattamātā ativiya sappāyāhārācārā ca hutvā sakkaccaṃ pariharati.
tika-s0102t:105_17: Phalikaabbhapaṭalādino viya bodhisattamātukucchitacassa patanubhāvena ālokassa vibandhābhāvato yathā bodhisattamātā kucchigataṃ bodhisattaṃ passati,
tika-s0102t:105_22: āloke ca na passatīti āha “na hi antokucchiyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjatī”ti.
tika-s0102t:105_23: Assāsapassāsā viya hi tattha cakkhuviññāṇampi na uppajjati tajjassa samannāhārassa abhāvato.
tika-s0102t:106_1: Yathā aññā itthiyo vijātappaccayā tādisena rogena abhibhūtāpi hutvā maranti,
tika-s0102t:106_2: bodhisattamātu pana bodhisatte kucchigate tassa vijāyananimittaṃ,
tika-s0102t:106_9: Tathā sati bodhisattapitu aññāya aggamahesiyā bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0102t:106_10: tathāpi bodhisattamātari dharantiyā ayujjamānakanti āha “na ca sakkā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:106_12: Attani chandarāgavaseneva bahiddhā ārammaṇapariyesanāti visayinisārāgo sattānaṃ visayesu sārāgassa balavakāraṇanti
tika-s0102t:106_13: dassento āha “sattānaṃ attabhāve chandarāgo balavā hotī”ti.
tika-s0102t:106_14: Anurakkhituṃ na sakkotīti sammā gabbhaparihāraṃ nānuyuñjati.
tika-s0102t:106_16: Vatthu visadaṃ hotīti gabbhāsayo visuddho hoti.
tika-s0102t:106_17: Mātu majjhimavayassa tatiyakoṭṭhāse bodhisattagabbhokkamanampi tassā āyuparimāṇavilokaneneva saṅgahitaṃ vayovasena uppajjanakavikārassa parivajjanato.
tika-s0102t:106_18: Itthisabhāvena uppajjanakavikāro pana bodhisattassa ānubhāveneva vūpasamati.
tika-s0102t:107_2: So sītuṇhakkhamo na hoti ativiya sukhumālatāya.
tika-s0102t:107_4: ekacce pana cammapadesā vuddhiṃ pāpuṇantā ghaṭṭanaṃ na sahanti,
tika-s0102t:107_6: “Sattamāsajātassa pana na tāva te jātā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0102t:108_1: Devā paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhantīti “lokanāthaṃ mahāpurisaṃ sayameva paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmā”ti sañjātagāravabahumānā
tika-s0102t:108_2: attano pītiṃ pavedentā khīṇāsavā suddhāvāsabrahmāno ādito paṭiggaṇhanti.
tika-s0102t:108_10: Dukkhassa hi balavabhāvato taṃ dukkhaṃ asahamānā aññā itthiyo nisinnā vā nipannā vā vijāyanti.
tika-s0102t:110_5: yonipadese ca katthaci alaggo asatto hutvā,
tika-s0102t:110_8: Amakkhitova nikkhamati sammakkhitassa tādisassa udakasemhādikasseva tattha abhāvato.
tika-s0102t:110_9: Bodhisattassa hi puññānubhāvato paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya taṃ ṭhānaṃ pubbepi visuddhaṃ visesato paramasugandhagandhakuṭi
tika-s0102t:112_7: Na kho pana evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ padavītihārato pageva disāvilokanassa katattā.
tika-s0102t:112_9: Ekaṅgaṇānīti vivaṭabhāvena vihāraṅgaṇapariveṇaṅgaṇāni viya ekaṅgaṇasadisāni ahesuṃ.
tika-s0102t:112_10: Sadisopi natthīti tumhākaṃ idaṃ vilokanaṃ visiṭṭhe passituṃ “idha tumhehi sadisopi natthi,
tika-s0102t:112_18: Ettha ca mahesakkhā tāva devā tathā ca vadanti,
tika-s0102t:112_21: Mahesakkhānañhi devānaṃ mahāsattassa ānubhāvo viya tena sadisānampi ānubhāvo paccakkho ahosīti,
tika-s0102t:112_22: itare pana tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā saddahantā anuminantā tathā āhaṃsu.
tika-s0102t:113_0: Jātamattasseva bodhisattassa ṭhānādīni yesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ pubbanimittabhūtānīti te niddhāretvā dassento “ettha cā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:113_1: Tattha patiṭṭhānaṃ caturiddhipādapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ iddhipādavasena lokuttaradhammesu suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasamijjhanato.
tika-s0102t:113_3: Tena hi bhagavā sadevakassa lokassa abhibhūto,
tika-s0102t:113_12: pubbanimittanti veditabbaṃ tassa tassa anāgate laddhabbavisesassa taṃ taṃ nimittaṃ abyabhicārīti katvā.
tika-s0102t:113_14: aññattha ca vakkhamānāya anupubbiyā na āgato.
tika-s0102t:114_0: “Dasasahassilokadhātu kampī”ti idaṃ satipi idha pāḷiyaṃ āgatatte vakkhamānānaṃ acchariyānaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:114_2: Tantibaddhā vīṇā cammabaddhā bheriyoti pañcaṅgikatūriyassa nidassanamattaṃ, ca-
tika-s0102t:114_4: “Andubandhanādīni taṅkhaṇe eva chajjitvā puna pākatikāneva honti,
tika-s0102t:114_5: tathā jaccandhādīnaṃ cakkhusotādīni tathārūpakammapaccayā tasmiṃyeva khaṇe uppajjitvā tāvadeva vigacchantī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0102t:114_9: Sakatejobhāsitānīti ativiya samujjalāya attano pabhāya obhāsitāni ahesuṃ.
tika-s0102t:114_11: Na vāyīti kharo vāto na vāyi.
tika-s0102t:114_16: atthato pana vāmahatthaṃ ure ṭhapetvā dakkhiṇena puthupāṇinā hatthatāḷanena saddakaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:114_20: atha kho aññānipi “vicittapupphasugandhapupphavassadevopavassi sūriye dissamāne eva tārakā obhāsiṃsu,
tika-s0102t:114_27: rūpino devā sarūpeneva manussānaṃ āpāthaṃ agamaṃsu,
tika-s0102t:114_28: sattānaṃ cutūpapātā nāhesu”nti evamādīni yāni mahābhinīhārasamaye uppannāni dvattiṃsapubbanimittāni,
tika-s0102t:115_0: Tatrāpīti tesupi pathavikampādīsu evaṃ pubbanimittabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:115_1: Na kevalaṃ sampatijātassa ṭhānādīsu evāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:115_4: Kenaci anussāhitānaṃyeva imasmiṃyeva ekacakkavāḷe sannipāto kenaci anussāhitānaṃyeva ekappahāreneva sannipatitvā dhammapaṭiggaṇhanassa pubbanimittaṃ.
tika-s0102t:115_6: pacchā manussānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ tattheva ṭhānassa niccalasabhāvato āneñjavihārapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ.
tika-s0102t:115_7: Vīṇānaṃ sayaṃ vajjanaṃ parūpadesena vinā sayameva anupubbavihārapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ.
tika-s0102t:115_8: Bherīnaṃ vajjanaṃ cakkavāḷapariyantāya parisāya pavedanasamatthassa dhammabheriyā anusāvanassa amatadundubhighosanassa pubbanimittaṃ.
tika-s0102t:115_10: Mahājanassa rogavigamo tasseva sakalavaṭṭadukkharogavigamabhūtassa saccapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ.
tika-s0102t:115_12: mahājanassa dibbasotadhātupaṭilābhassā”tiādinā tattha tattha ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:115_13: Iddhipādabhāvanāvasena sātisayañāṇajavasampattisiddhīti āha “pīṭhasappīnaṃ javasampadā caturiddhipādapaṭilābhassa pubbanimitta”nti.
tika-s0102t:115_16: Ratanānaṃ sakatejobhāsitattaṃ yaṃ lokassa dhammobhāsaṃ dassessati,
tika-s0102t:116_5: tañca kho amadhurassa lokassa sabbaso madhurabhāvāpādanena.
tika-s0102t:116_7: Ākāsādiappatiṭṭhavisamacañcalaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya sakuṇānaṃ pathavigamanaṃ tādisaṃ micchāgāhaṃ pahāya sattānaṃ
tika-s0102t:116_14: Kāyagatāsativasena laddhaṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppāditamaggaphalasukhānubhavo kāyagatāsatiamatapaṭilābho,
tika-s0102t:116_15: tassa pana kāyassāpi atappakasukhāvahattā khudāpipāsāpīḷanābhāvo pubbanimittaṃ vutto.
tika-s0102t:116_23: sadevakassa lokassa pana ariyamaggabojjhaṅgaddhajamālāhi mālibhāvassa pubbanimittaṃ.
tika-s0102t:117_2: tasmā amhehi idha apubbaṃ vattabbaṃ natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:117_3: Tadā pathaviyaṃ gacchantopi mahāsatto ākāsena gacchanto viya mahājanassa tathā upaṭṭhāsīti ayamettha
tika-s0102t:117_4: niyati dhammaniyāmo bodhisattānaṃ dhammatā ti idaṃ niyativādavasena kathanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:117_5: Pubbe purimajātīsu tādisassa puññasambhārakammassa katattā upacitattā mahājanassa tathā upaṭṭhāsīti idaṃ pubbekatakammavādavasena kathanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:117_6: Imesaṃ sattānaṃ upari īsanasīlatāya yathāsakaṃ kammameva issaro nāma,
tika-s0102t:117_7: tassa nimmānaṃ attano phalassa nibbattanaṃ mahāpurisopi sadevakaṃ lokaṃ abhibhavituṃ samatthena uḷārena puññakammena nibbattito,
tika-s0102t:117_11: yāya mahājanassa tathā upaṭṭhāsīti idaṃ issaranimmānavasena kathanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:117_12: Evaṃ taṃ taṃ bahulaṃ vatvā kiṃ imāya pariyāyakathāyāti avasāne ujukameva byākari.
tika-s0102t:117_14: evaṃ mahānubhāvo ākāsena maññe gacchatīti parikappanavasena ākāsena gacchanto viya ahosi.
tika-s0102t:117_15: Sīghataraṃ pana sattapadavītihārena gatattā dissamānarūpopi mahājanassa adissamāno viya ahosi.
tika-s0102t:117_17: khuddakasarīratā ca tādisassa iriyāpathassa na anucchavikāti kammānubhāvasañjanitapāṭihāriyavasena alaṅkatapaṭiyatto viya,
tika-s0102t:117_18: soḷasavassuddesiko viya ca mahājanassa upaṭṭhāsīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:117_22: Buddhabhāvānucchavikassa bodhisattānubhāvassa yāthāvato paveditattā parisā cassa byākaraṇena buddhena viya…pe…
tika-s0102t:118_0: Sabbadhammatāti sabbā soḷasavidhāpi yathāvuttā dhammatā sabbabodhisattānaṃ hontīti veditabbā puññañāṇasambhāradassanena nesaṃ ekasadisattā.
tika-s0102t:120_4: “Poṇikā cikkhallikā sākiyā koḷiyā”ti evamādi kulapadeso. Ādi-
tika-s0102t:121_2: Tena ca dhammena sakalaṃ lokaṃ rañjetīti dhammarājā.
tika-s0102t:121_3: Yasmā cakkavattī dhammena ñāyena rajjaṃ adhigacchati,
tika-s0102t:121_6: Catūsu disāsu samuddapariyosānatāya caturantā nāma tattha tattha dīpe mahāpathavīti āha “puratthima…pe…
tika-s0102t:121_12: Kāmaṃ cakkavattino kenaci yuddhaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-s0102t:121_13: yuddhena pana sādhetabbassa vijayassa siddhiyā “vijitasaṅgāmo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:121_14: Janapadova catubbidhaacchariyadhammādisamannāgate asmiṃ rājini thāvariyaṃ kenaci asaṃhāriyaṃ daḷhaṃ bhattabhāvaṃ patto,
tika-s0102t:121_15: janapade vā attano dhammikāya paṭipattiyā thāvariyaṃ thirabhāvaṃ pattoti janapadatthāvariyappatto.
tika-s0102t:121_16: Manussānaṃ ure satthaṃ ṭhapetvā icchitadhanaharaṇādinā parasāhasakāritāya sāhasikā.
tika-s0102t:122_3: “Svāyaṃ cittīkāro tassa pūjanīyatāyā”ti cittīkatanti pūjanīyanti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0102t:122_4: Mahantaṃ vipulaṃ aparimitaṃ mūlaṃ agghatīti mahagghaṃ.
tika-s0102t:122_5: Natthi etassa tulā upamāti atulaṃ, asadisaṃ.
tika-s0102t:122_6: Kadāci eva uppajjanato dukkhena laddhabbattā dullabhadassanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:122_8: Idāni nesaṃ cittīkatādiatthānaṃ savisesaṃ cakkaratane labbhamānataṃ dassetvā itaresupi te atidisituṃ “cakkaratanassa cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0102t:122_9: Aññaṃ devaṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti rañño anaññasādhāraṇissariyādisampattipaṭilābhahetuto,
tika-s0102t:122_15: Sattānaṃ pāpajigucchanena vigatakāḷako puññapasutatāya maṇḍabhūto yādiso kālo buddhuppādāraho,
tika-s0102t:122_16: tādise eva cakkavattīnampi sambhavoti āha “yasmā ca panā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:122_19: Tasmā yathā buddhā kadāci karahaci uppajjanti,
tika-s0102t:122_22: iminā dullabhuppādatāsāmaññena tesaṃ dullabhadassanatā vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:122_24: tathāpi “cakkavattī eva naṃ sāmibhāvena visavitāya paribhuñjatī”ti vattabbataṃ arahati tadatthaṃ uppajjanatoti dassento “tadeta”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:122_26: channampi vā atthānaṃ itararatanesupi labbhanato “evaṃ sesānipī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:123_0: Catunnaṃ mahādīpānaṃ sirivibhavanti tattha laddhaṃ sirisampattiñceva bhogasampattiñca.
tika-s0102t:124_6: Yāva cakkavāḷapabbatā cakkassa vattanato “cakkavāḷapabbataṃ sīmaṃ katvā ṭhitasamuddapariyanta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:124_9: “Asatthenā”ti iminā pana senāya yujjhanassāti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ “ye katāparādhe”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:125_1: taṇhāyanaṭṭhena taṇhā”ti pavattiākārabhedena lobho eva dvidhā vutto.
tika-s0102t:125_8: Yasmā te sabbe pāpadhammā uppajjamānā sattasantānaṃ chādetvā pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhanti kusalappavattiṃ nivārenti,
tika-s0102t:126_3: Tathā hi lakkhīyati mahāpurisabhāvo etehīti lakkhaṇāni.
tika-s0102t:126_4: Ṭhānagamanādīsu bhūmiyaṃ suṭṭhu samaṃ patiṭṭhitā pādā etassāti suppatiṭṭhitapādo.
tika-s0102t:126_5: Taṃ panassa suppatiṭṭhitapādataṃ byatirekamukhena vibhāvetuṃ “yathā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:126_14: Ekappahāreneva sakalaṃ pādatalaṃ bhūmito uṭṭhahatīti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:127_0: Nābhi dissatīti lakkhaṇacakkassa nābhi parimaṇḍalasaṇṭhānā suparibyattā hutvā dissati,
tika-s0102t:127_2: Nābhiparicchinnāti tassaṃ nābhiyaṃ paricchinnā paricchedavasena ṭhitā.
tika-s0102t:127_3: Nābhimukhaparikkhepapaṭṭoti pakaticakkassa akkhabbhāhatapariharaṇatthaṃ nābhimukhe ṭhapetabbaṃ parikkhepapaṭṭo,
tika-s0102t:127_19: “Cakkavattirañño parisaṃ upādāyā”ti idaṃ hatthiratanādīnampi tattha labbhamānabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:127_20: Sabbotisattiādiko yathāvutto aṅgaviseso cakkalakkhaṇasseva parivāroti veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:128_0: “Āyatapaṇhī”ti idaṃ aññesaṃ paṇhito dīghataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:128_2: Yathā pana paṇhilakkhaṇaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0102t:130_0: Yathā satakkhattuṃ vihataṃ kappāsapaṭalaṃ sappimaṇḍe osāritaṃ ativiya mudu hoti,
tika-s0102t:131_4: Paṭivijjhitvāti taṃtaṃpabbānaṃ samānadesatāya aṅgulīnaṃ pasāritakālepi aññamaññaṃ vijjhitāni viya phusitvā tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0102t:132_3: Tenāti piṭṭhipāde ṭhitagopphakabhāvena baddhā hontīti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:132_4: Tayidaṃ “tenā”ti padaṃ uparipadadvayepi yojetabbaṃ “tena baddhabhāvena na yathāsukhaṃ parivaṭṭanti,
tika-s0102t:132_5: tena yathāsukhaṃ naparivaṭṭanena gacchantānaṃ pādatalānipi na dissantī”ti.
tika-s0102t:133_0: Yasmā eṇimigassa samantato ekasadisamaṃsā anukkamena uddhaṃ thūlā jaṅghā honti,
tika-s0102t:134_3: Khujjā vā honti heṭṭhimakāyato uparimakāyassa rassatāya,
tika-s0102t:135_1: kañcanapadumakaṇṇikā pana pabhassarabhāvena tato sātisayāti āha “suvaṇṇapadumakaṇṇikasadisehī”ti.
tika-s0102t:135_3: Tathābhūtaṃ pana taṃ tena channaṃ hotīti āha “paṭicchanna”nti.
tika-s0102t:136_4: Paṭhamavikappaṃ vatvā tathārūpāya pana ruḷhiyā abhāvaṃ manasi katvā vaṇṇadhātupariyāyameva vaṇṇa-
tika-s0102t:139_0: Brahmuno sarīraṃ purato vā pacchato vā anonamitvā ujukameva uggatanti āha “brahmā viya ujugatto”ti.
tika-s0102t:139_1: Sā panāyaṃ ujugattatā avayavesu buddhippattesu daṭṭhabbā,
tika-s0102t:139_3: Itaresūti “khandhajāṇūsū”ti imesu dvīsu ṭhānesu namantā purato namantīti ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0102t:139_4: Passavaṅkāti dakkhiṇapassena vā vāmapassena vā vaṅkā.
tika-s0102t:140_0: Hatthapiṭṭhiādivasena satta sarīrāvayavā ussadā upacitamaṃsā etassāti sattussado.
tika-s0102t:140_2: Nigūḷhasirājālehīti lakkhaṇavacanametanti tena nigūḷhaaṭṭhikoṭīhītipi vuttameva hotīti.
tika-s0102t:140_4: saddena aṃsakūṭakhandhakūṭānaṃ saṅgahe siddhe taṃ ekadesena dassento “vaṭṭetvā…pe…
tika-s0102t:140_6: “Silārūpakaṃ viyā”tiādinā vā nigūḷhaaṃsakūṭatāpi vibhāvitā yevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:141_1: paripuṇṇāvayavatāya sīhapubbaddhaṃ viya sakalo kāyo assāti sīhapubbaddhakāyo.
tika-s0102t:141_2: Tenāha “sīhassa pubbaddhakāyo viya sabbo kāyo paripuṇṇo”ti.
tika-s0102t:141_7: virūpabhāvena ca saṇṭhiti upagato na hotīti attho.
tika-s0102t:142_0: Satapuññalakkhaṇatāya nānācittena puññacittena cittito sañjātacittabhāvo “īdiso eva buddhānaṃ dhammakāyassa
tika-s0102t:142_1: adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhavituṃ yutto”ti dasapāramīhi sajjito abhisaṅkhato,
tika-s0102t:143_0: Dvinnaṃ koṭṭānaṃ antaranti dvinnaṃ piṭṭhibāhānaṃ vemajjhaṃ piṭṭhimajjhassa uparibhāgo.
tika-s0102t:144_0: Nigrodho viya parimaṇḍaloti parimaṇḍalanigrodho viya parimaṇḍalo,
tika-s0102t:144_5: parimaṇḍalasaddasannidhānena vā parimaṇḍalova nigrodho gayhatīti ekassa parimaṇḍalasaddassa lopena vināpi
tika-s0102t:146_0: Rasaggasaggīti madhurādibhedaṃ rasaṃ gasanti anto pavesantīti rasaggasā rasaggasānaṃ aggā rasaggasaggā,
tika-s0102t:146_2: Tenāti ojāya apharaṇena hīnadhātukattā te bahvābādhā honti.
tika-s0102t:147_11: atha kho tibhāgāvasesamaṇḍalatāyāti āha “dvādasiyā pakkhassa candasadisānī”ti.
tika-s0102t:148_0: Sātisayaṃ mududīghaputhulatādippakāraguṇā hutvā bhūtā jātāti pabhūtā, bha-
tika-s0102t:148_2: kāraṃ katvā pahūtā jivhā etassāti pahūtajivho.
tika-s0102t:151_4: “Adhippeta”nti iminā ayamettha adhippāyo ekadesena samudāyupalakkhaṇañāyenāti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:153_0: Dve atthavase paṭicca vuttanti yasmā buddhā,
tika-s0102t:153_3: tasmā te dve atthavase paṭicca “uṇhīsasīso”ti idaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:153_4: Idāni taṃ atthadvayaṃ mahāpurise suppatiṭṭhitanti “mahāpurisassa hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:153_8: paripuṇṇatāya ca rañño bandhauṇhīsapaṭṭo viya virocati.
tika-s0102t:153_17: Uṇhīsaṃ viyāti chekena sippinā viracitauṇhīsamaṇḍalaṃ viya.
tika-s0102t:155_1: Tassa vitthāroti tassa lakkhaṇapariggaṇhane nemittakānaṃ santappanassa vitthāro vitthārakathā.
tika-s0102t:155_5: Tā hi dhāpenti thaññaṃ pāyentīti dhātiyo.
tika-s0102t:155_9: Tāpi dahanti vidahanti nhānaṃ dahanti dhārentīti “dhātiyo” tveva vuccanti.
tika-s0102t:155_13: aññassa bāhuto attano bāhuṃ upasaṃharantehi haraṇaṃ sampāpanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:156_9: piyāyitabbatā cassa suṇantānaṃ attani bhattisamuppādanenāti āha “pemajanakassaro”ti.
tika-s0102t:156_12: te attano sarasampattiyā pakatiṃ jahāpetvā avase karonto attano vase vatteti,
tika-s0102t:156_20: Pakkhe pasāretvāti pakkhe yathāpasārite katvā apatantā tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0102t:157_0: Suvaṇṇapañjaraṃ vissajjesi yojanappamāṇe ākāse attano āṇāya pavattanato.
tika-s0102t:157_3: Taṃ pītinti taṃ buddhaguṇārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ teneva nīhārena punappunaṃ pavattaṃ pītiṃ avijahitvā vikkhambhitakilesā
tika-s0102t:157_4: therānaṃ santike laddhadhammassavanasappāyā upanissayasampattiyā paripakkañāṇatāya sattahi…pe…
tika-s0102t:157_6: Sattasatamattena orodhajanena saddhiṃ padasāva therānaṃ santikaṃ upagatattā “sattahi jaṅghasatehi saddhi”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:158_1: Kammavipākajanti sātisayasucaritakammanibbattaṃ pittasemharuhirādīhi apalibuddhaṃ dūrepi ārammaṇaṃ sampaṭicchanasamatthaṃ kammavipākena sahajātaṃ,
tika-s0102t:158_8: cakkhuviññāṇena pana tassa tathā vibhāvitattā manoviññāṇassa tattha tathāpavattīti āha “yena nimittaṃ…pe…
tika-s0102t:159_3: tathā ca akkhīni avivaṭāni nimīladassanassa na visuddhibhāvato.
tika-s0102t:160_4: iti pana pavattanatthaṃ dhātuṃ gahetvā “nayati pavattetī”ti.
tika-s0102t:161_4: Māsā pana vasse utumhi bhavāti vassikā.
tika-s0102t:162_0: Nātiucco hoti nātinīcoti gimhiko viya ucco,
tika-s0102t:162_2: atha kho tadubhayavemajjhalakkhaṇatāya nātiucco hoti, nātinīco.
tika-s0102t:162_19: Tasmā hemante viya himāni patantāniyeva hontīti ca veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:166_3: Ābhoggavaṅkanti ādito paṭṭhāya abbhuggatāya kuṭilasarīratāya vaṅkaṃ.
tika-s0102t:166_5: Daṇḍaparaṃ daṇḍaggahaṇaparaṃ ayanaṃ gamanaṃ etassāti daṇḍaparāyanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:166_6: daṇḍo vā paraṃ āyanaṃ gamanakāraṇaṃ etassāti daṇḍaparāyanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:166_7: Ṭhānādīsu daṇḍo gati avassayo etassa tena vinā appavattanatoti daṇḍagatikaṃ,
tika-s0102t:166_12: Yadā ratho purato hotīti dvedhāpathe sampatte purato gacchante balakāye tattha ekaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ āruḷho
tika-s0102t:166_13: majjhe gacchanto bodhisattena āruḷho ratho itaraṃ saṇṭhānaṃ gacchanto yadā purato hoti.
tika-s0102t:166_14: Pacchā balakāyoti tadā pacchā hoti sabbo balakāyo.
tika-s0102t:166_17: Suddhāvāsāti siddhatthādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ sāsane brahmacariyaṃ caritvā suddhāvāsabhūmiyaṃ nibbattabrahmāno.
tika-s0102t:166_19: “Kiṃ paneso jiṇṇo nāmā”ti eso tayā vuccamāno kiṃ atthato,
tika-s0102t:166_21: Aniddhāritasarūpattā hi tassa attano bodhisatto liṅgasabbanāmena taṃ vadanto “ki”nti āha.
tika-s0102t:166_22: “Yathā kiṃ te jāta”nti dvayameva hi loke yebhuyyato jāyati itthī vā puriso vā,
tika-s0102t:167_0: “Tena hī”tiādi “ayañca jiṇṇabhāvo sabbasādhāraṇattā mayhampi upari āpattito evā”ti mahāsattassa saṃvijjanākāravibhāvanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:167_2: Kīḷāvihāratthaṃ uyyuttā yanti upagacchanti etanti uyyānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:167_5: Jātiyā ādīnavadassanatthaṃ taṃmūlassa ummūlanaṃ viya hotīti,
tika-s0102t:167_6: tassa ca avassitabhāvato “jātiyā mūlaṃ khaṇanto nisīdī”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:167_7: Siddhe hi kāraṇe phalaṃ siddhameva hotīti.
tika-s0102t:167_8: Pīḷaṃ janetvā antotudanavasena sabbapaṭhamaṃ hadayaṃ anupavissa ṭhitattā paṭhamena sallena hadaye viddho viya nisīdīti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:169_1: Pubbe vuttanayenevāti “suddhāvāsā kirā”tiādinā pubbe vutteneva nayena.
tika-s0102t:171_1: Bhantanettakuppalādi vividhaṃ katvā lātabbato vilāto, vayhaṃ,
tika-s0102t:173_3: Evaṃ ekekassa padassāti yathā “sādhudhammacariyāti pabbajito”ti yojanā,
tika-s0102t:173_4: evaṃ “sādhusamacariyāti pabbajito”tiādinā ekekassa padassa yojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0102t:175_2: Aññañca saṅgītianāruḷhaṃ tena tadā vuttaṃ dhammiṃ kathanti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:175_10: tasmā ahaṃ pabbajitomhi rājā”ti āha yathā “nhatvā vatthaṃ paridahitvā gandhaṃ vilimpitvā mālaṃ piḷandhitvā bhutto”ti.
tika-s0102t:177_1: “Kasmā panetthā”tiādinā tesaṃ caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ mahāsatte saṃbhattataṃ,
tika-s0102t:177_3: yato sutaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhatvā ñātimittādīsu kiñci anāmantetvā mattavaravāraṇo viya ayomayabandhanaṃ ghanabandhanaṃ chinditvā pabbajjaṃ upagacchiṃsu.
tika-s0102t:178_0: Cattāro māse cārikaṃ cari na tāva ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā.
tika-s0102t:179_2: Sabbeva ime pabbajitā mama gamanaṃ jānissanti,
tika-s0102t:179_5: Saṇatevāti saṇati viya saddaṃ karoti viya.
tika-s0102t:180_1: Ayaṃ kāloti ayaṃ tesaṃ pabbajitānaṃ mama gamanassa ajānanakālo.
tika-s0102t:180_4: Pāramitānubhāvena uṭṭhitaṃ upari devatāhi dibbapaccattharaṇehi supaññattampi mahāsattassa puññānubhāvena
tika-s0102t:180_5: siddhattā tena paññattaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ “pallaṅkaṃ paññapetvā”ti.
tika-s0102t:180_7: aṭṭhi ca avasissatū”tiādi nayappavattaṃ caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā.
tika-s0102t:181_3: tadā pana brahāraññe vivitte yogīnaṃ paṭisallānasāruppo hutvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0102t:181_4: tadañño pana jambudīpappadeso yebhuyyena bahujano ākiṇṇamanusso iddho phīto ahosi.
tika-s0102t:181_5: Tena te taṃ taṃ janapadadesaṃ uddissa gatā “anto jambudīpābhimukhā cārikaṃ pakkantā”ti vuttā anto jambudīpābhimukhā,
tika-s0102t:183_1: Kāmaṃ bhagavā buddho hutvā sattasattāhāni tattheva vasi,
tika-s0102t:183_2: sabbapaṭhamaṃ pana visākhapuṇṇamaṃ sandhāya “ekarattivāsaṃ upagatassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:183_5: Paṭisallīnassāti nānārammaṇacārato cittassa nivattiyā pati sammadeva nilīnassa tattha avisaṭacittassa,
tika-s0102t:183_9: maraṇajātiyova “jāyati mīyatī”ti pana vatvā “cavati upapajjatī”ti vacanaṃ na ekabhavapariyāpannānaṃ nesaṃ gahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0102t:183_10: atha kho nānābhavapariyāpannānaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahaṇanti dassento āha “idaṃ dvayaṃ…pe…
tika-s0102t:183_12: Kasmā pana lokassa kicchāpattiparivitakkane “jarāmaraṇassā”ti jarāmaraṇavasena niyamanaṃ katanti āha “yasmā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:183_15: Paṭiccasamuppādamukhena vipassanārambhe tassa jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya abhiniveso aggato yāva mūlaṃ otaraṇaṃ viyāti āha “bhavaggato otarantassa viyā”ti.
tika-s0102t:184_6: Ayanti “etadahosī”ti evaṃ vutto “kimhi nu kho satī”tiādinayappavatto manasikāro.
tika-s0102t:184_7: Tesaṃ aññataroti tesu aniccādimanasikāresu aññataro eko.
tika-s0102t:184_14: Ito yonisomanasikārāti hetumhi nissakkavacananti tassa iminā “upāyamanasikārenā”ti hetumhi karaṇavacanena atthamāha.
tika-s0102t:184_15: Samāgamo ahosīti yāthāvato paṭivijjhanavasena saṅgamo ahosi.
tika-s0102t:184_16: Kiṃ pana tanti kiṃ pana taṃ jarāmaraṇakāraṇanti āha “jātī”ti.
tika-s0102t:184_18: kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0102t:184_19: kiṃ paccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti jarāmaraṇakāraṇaṃ pariggaṇhantassa bodhisattassa “yasmiṃ sati yaṃ hoti,
tika-s0102t:184_21: taṃ tassa kāraṇa”nti evaṃ abyabhicārikāraṇapariggaṇhane “jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0102t:184_22: jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti yā jarāmaraṇassa kāraṇapariggāhikā paññā uppajjati,
tika-s0102t:184_24: Sabbapadānīti “kimhi nu kho sati jāti hotī”tiādinā āgatāni jātiādīni viññāṇapariyosānāni nava padāni.
tika-s0102t:185_0: Dvādasapadike paṭiccasamuppāde idha yāni dve padāni aggahitāni,
tika-s0102t:185_1: tesaṃ aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ pucchitvā vissajjetukāmo tesaṃ gahetabbākāraṃ tāva dassento “ettha panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:185_2: Paccakkhabhūtaṃ paccuppannabhavaṃ paṭhamaṃ gahetvā tadanantaraṃ anāgataṃ “dutiya”nti gahaṇe atīto tatiyo
tika-s0102t:185_3: hotīti āha “avijjā saṅkhārā hi atīto bhavo”ti.
tika-s0102t:185_4: Nanu cettha anāgatassāpi bhavassa gahaṇaṃ na sambhavati paccuppannavasena abhinivesassa jotitattāti?
tika-s0102t:185_6: kāraṇe pana gahite phalaṃ gahitameva hotīti tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:185_7: Api cettha anāgatopi addhā atthato saṅgahito eva,
tika-s0102t:185_8: yato parato “nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”ntiādinā anāgataddhasaṅgahikā desanā pavattā.
tika-s0102t:185_11: Mahāpuriso hi paccuppannavasena abhiniviṭṭhoti aghaṭane kāraṇamāha.
tika-s0102t:185_14: Sati anubodhe paṭivedhena bhavitabbanti āha “na sakkā buddhena bhavitu”nti.
tika-s0102t:186_3: “Kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hotī”tiādinā hi hetuparamparāvasena phalaparamparāya vuccamānāya “kimhi
tika-s0102t:186_4: nu kho sati viññāṇaṃ hotī”ti vicāraṇāya “saṅkhāre kho sati viññāṇaṃ hotī”ti viññāṇassa visesakāraṇabhūte
tika-s0102t:186_5: saṅkhāre aggahite tato viññāṇaṃ paṭinivattati nāma,
tika-s0102t:186_13: Yato paṭinivattamānaṃ viññāṇaṃ atītabhavatopi paṭinivattati nāma.
tika-s0102t:186_16: ārammaṇabhūtañca nāmarūpaṃ nātikkamati tena vinā avattanato.
tika-s0102t:187_0: Viññāṇe nāmarūpassa paccaye honteti viññāṇe nāmassa, rūpassa,
tika-s0102t:187_2: Nāmarūpe ca viññāṇassa paccaye honteti tathā nāme, rūpe,
tika-s0102t:187_3: nāmarūpe ca viññāṇassa paccaye honteti catuvokāraekavokārapañcavokārabhavavasena yathārahaṃ yojanā veditabbā,
tika-s0102t:187_5: Ettakenāti evaṃ viññāṇa nāmarūpānaṃ aññamaññaṃ upatthambhanavasena pavattiyā.
tika-s0102t:187_8: upapajjati vā”ti samaññā hoti viññāṇanāmarūpavinimuttassa sattapaññattiyā upādānabhūtassa dhammassa abhāvato.
tika-s0102t:188_1: Nanu tattha paṭhamatatiyehi catutthapañcamāni atthato abhinnānīti āha “saddhiṃ aparāparaṃ cutipaṭisandhīhī”ti.
tika-s0102t:188_2: Puna taṃ ettāvatāti vuttamatthanti yo “ettāvatā”ti padena pubbe vutto,
tika-s0102t:188_3: tameva yathāvuttamatthaṃ “yadida”ntiādinā niyyātento nidassento puna vatvā.
tika-s0102t:188_5: Paccayadhammānañhi attano paccayuppannassa paccayabhāvo idappaccayatā paccayākāro,
tika-s0102t:188_8: Jātiādikaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ cittena samihitena kataṃ samūhavasena gahetvā pāḷiyaṃ “dukkhakkhandhassā”ti vuttanti āha “jāti…pe…
tika-s0102t:189_1: Dukkhakkhandhassa anekavāraṃ samudayadassanavasena viññāṇassa pavattattā “samudayo samudayo”ti āmeḍitavacanaṃ avoca.
tika-s0102t:189_2: Atha vā “evaṃ samudayo hotī”ti idaṃ na kevalaṃ nibbattinidassanapadaṃ,
tika-s0102t:189_7: te sāmaññarūpena byāpanicchāvasena gaṇhanto “samudayo samudayo”ti āha,
tika-s0102t:189_8: evañca katvā yaṃ vakkhati “imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti paccayasañjānanamattaṃ kathita”nti,
tika-s0102t:189_11: Nāyaṃ doso paccayato udayadassanamukhena nibbattilakkhaṇadassanassa sambhavato.
tika-s0102t:189_12: Dassanaṭṭhena cakkhūti samudayassa paccakkhato dassanabhāvena cakkhu viyāti cakkhu.
tika-s0102t:189_13: Ñātakaraṇaṭṭhenāti yathā samudayo sammadeva ñāto hoti avabuddho,
tika-s0102t:189_15: Pajānanaṭṭhenāti “viññāṇāditaṃtaṃpaccayuppattiyā etassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī”ti pakārato jānanaṭṭhena.
tika-s0102t:189_16: Nibbijjhitvā paṭivijjhitvā uppannaṭṭhenāti anibbijjhitvā pubbe udayadassanapaññāya paṭipakkhadhamme nibbijjhitvā “ayaṃ samudayo”ti paccayato,
tika-s0102t:189_20: Obhāsaṭṭhenāti samudayasabhāvapaṭicchādanakassa mohandhakārassa ca kilesandhakārassa ca vidhamanavasena avabhāsakabhāvena.
tika-s0102t:190_6: Dassanaṭṭho atthoti dassanasabhāvo tena pakāsetabbo attho.
tika-s0102t:190_12: Saṅkhārānaṃ sammadeva udayadassanassa jotitattā “vīthipaṭipannā taruṇavipassanā kathitā”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:191_6: Pariññāpahānabhāvanābhisamayā yāvadeva sacchikiriyābhisamayatthā nibbānādhigamatthattā brahmacariyavāsassāti vuttaṃ “nibbānabujjhanatthāya eva vā”ti.
tika-s0102t:191_12: Nibbānameva kathitaṃ viññāṇādi nirujjhati etthāti katvā.
tika-s0102t:192_2: Nirodhasañjānanamattamevāti “nirodho nirodhoti kho”tiādinā nirodhassa sañjānanamattameva kathitaṃ pubbārambhabhāvato,
tika-s0102t:192_3: na tassa paṭivijjhanavasena paccakkhato dassanaṃ ariyamaggassa anadhigatattā.
tika-s0102t:192_4: Saṅkhārānaṃ sammadeva nirodhadassanaṃ nāma sikhāppattāya vipassanāya vasena icchitabbanti “vuṭṭhānagāminī balavavipassanā kathitā”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:193_3: Upādānassa paccayabhūtesūti catubbidhassapi upādānassa ārammaṇapaccayādinā paccayabhūtesu,
tika-s0102t:193_7: Kasmā vuttanti “yāya paṭipattiyā sabbepi mahābodhisattā carimabhave bodhāya paṭipajjanti,
tika-s0102t:193_8: vipassanāya mahābodhisattena tatheva paṭipanna”nti kathetukamyatāvasena pucchāvacanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:193_13: Tatthāpi cirakālaparibhāvanāya laddhāsevanāya mahākaruṇāya sañcoditamānasattā “kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno”tiādinā
tika-s0102t:193_14: saṃsāradukkhato mocetuṃ icchitassa sattalokassa kicchāpattidassanamukhena jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya paccayākārasammasanampi
tika-s0102t:193_20: Pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisitvāti viññāṇanāmarūpādipariyāyena gahitesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu vipassanābhinivesavasena
tika-s0102t:193_22: Anukkamanti anu anu gāmitabbato paṭipajjitabbato “anukkama”nti laddhanāmaṃ anupubbapaṭipattiṃ.
tika-s0102t:194_4: parimāṇassa ca bodhako anekatthattā nipātānaṃ,āvuttiādivasena vāyamattho veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:194_8: Tattha “ruppanasabhāva”nti iminā sāmaññato rūpassa sabhāvo dassito,
tika-s0102t:194_11: Tattha lakkhaṇaṃ nāma tassa tassa rūpavisesassa anaññasādhāraṇo sabhāvo.
tika-s0102t:194_12: Raso tasseva attano phalaṃ pati paccayabhāvo.
tika-s0102t:194_13: Paccupaṭṭhānaṃ tassa paramatthato vijjamānattā yāthāvato ñāṇassa gocarabhāvo.
tika-s0102t:194_17: ito uddhaṃ” rūpaṃ natthīti padadvayassāpi attho niddiṭṭho rūpassa sabbaso pariyādānavasena niyāmanato.
tika-s0102t:194_19: saddo “iti kho bhikkhave sappaṭibhayo bālo”tiādīsu viya pakāratthoti āha “itīti eva”nti.
tika-s0102t:195_3: tasmā purimabhavasiddhāya avijjāya sati imasmiṃ bhave rūpasamudayo,
tika-s0102t:195_6: Āhārasamudayāti ettha pana pavattipaccayesu kabaḷīkārāhārassa balavatāya so eva gahito.
tika-s0102t:195_7: Tasmiṃ pana gahite pavattipaccayatāsāmaññena utucittāni gahitāneva hontīti catusamuṭṭhānikarūpassa paccayato udayadassanaṃ vibhāvitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:195_12: Addhāvasena hi paṭhamaṃ udayaṃ passitvā ṭhito puna santativasena disvā anukkamena khaṇavasena passati.
tika-s0102t:195_13: Avijjānirodhā rūpanirodhoti aggamaggena avijjāya anuppādanirodhato anāgatassa rūpassa anuppādanirodho hoti paccayābhāve abhāvato.
tika-s0102t:195_19: tasmā taṃ addhāvasena paṭhamaṃ passitvā puna santativasena disvā anukkamena khaṇavasena passati.
tika-s0102t:196_0: “Iti vedanā”tiādīsupi heṭṭhā rūpe vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:196_25: Tesaṃ yevāti tīsu khandhesu “phassassa viññāṇakkhandhe nāmarūpassā”ti phassanāmarūpānaṃyeva vasena atthaṅgamapadampi yojetabbaṃ,
tika-s0102t:196_26: avijjādayo pana rūpe vuttasadisā evāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:197_0: Samapaññāsalakkhaṇavasenāti paccayato vīsati khaṇato pañcāti pañcavīsatiyā udayalakkhaṇānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:197_1: paccayato vīsati khaṇato pañcāti pañcavīsatiyā eva vayalakkhaṇānaṃ cāti samapaññāsāya udayavayalakkhaṇānaṃ vasena.
tika-s0102t:197_2: Tattha pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayo lakkhīyati etehīti lakkhaṇānīti vuccanti avijjādisamudayoti,
tika-s0102t:197_3: tathā tesaṃ anuppādanirodho lakkhīyati etehīti lakkhaṇānīti vuccanti avijjādīnaṃ accantanirodho.
tika-s0102t:197_6: Yathānukkamena vaḍḍhiteti yathāvuttaudayabbayañāṇe tikkhe sūre pasanne hutvā vahante tato paraṃ vattabbānaṃ
tika-s0102t:197_8: Pageva hi chattiṃsakoṭisatasahassamukhena pavattena sabbaññutaññāṇānucchavikena mahāvajirañāṇasaṅkhātena
tika-s0102t:197_9: sammasanañāṇena sambhatānubhāvaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhantaṃ paripākaṃ gacchantaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhiñāṇaṃ aparimitakāle
tika-s0102t:197_10: sambhatāya paññāpāramiyā ānubhāvena ukkaṃsapāramippattaṃ anukkamena vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvaṃ upagantvā yadā
tika-s0102t:197_18: dhammato āgotrabhuṃ savanato pavattanato āsavasaññitehi rāgo, diṭṭhi,
tika-s0102t:197_22: tadekaṭṭhatāya pana sabbehipi kilesehi sabbehipi pāpadhammehi cittaṃ vimuccati.
tika-s0102t:198_0: Maggakkhaṇe vimuccati nāma taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesehi phalakkhaṇe vimuttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0102t:198_1: Maggakkhaṇe vā vimuttañceva vimuccati cāti uparimaggakkhaṇe heṭṭhimamaggavajjhehi vimuttañceva yathāsakaṃ pahātabbehi vimuccati ca.
tika-s0102t:199_2: Suvikasitacittasantānoti sātisayaṃ ñāṇarasmisamphassena suṭṭhu sammadeva samphullacittasantāno.
tika-s0102t:199_7: Sakale ca buddhaguṇeti atītaṃse appaṭihatañāṇādike sabbepi buddhaguṇe.
tika-s0102t:199_9: tadā sabbe guṇe hatthagate karoti nāma.
tika-s0102t:200_1: Tattha ādito dvinnaṃ gāthānamattho heṭṭhā brahmajālanidānavaṇṇanāyaṃ vutto eva.
tika-s0102t:200_2: Parato pana ayoghanahatassāti ayo haññati etenāti ayoghanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:200_10: Yathā na ñāyate gatīti yathā tassa gati na ñāyati.
tika-s0102t:200_12: ayomuṭṭhikūṭādinā pahatattā ayoghanena hatassa pahatassa ayogatassa,
tika-s0102t:200_13: kaṃsabhājanādigatassa vā jalamānassa aggissa anukkamena upasantassa dasasu disāsu na katthaci gati paññāyati
tika-s0102t:200_15: Evaṃ sammāvimuttānanti sammā hetunā ñāyena tadaṅgavikkhambhanavimuttipubbaṅgamāya samucchedavimuttiyā ariyamaggena catūhipi upādānehi,
tika-s0102t:200_17: tato eva kāmabandhanasaṅkhātaṃ kāmoghabhavoghādibhedaṃ avasiṭṭhaoghañca taritvā ṭhitattā kāmabandhoghatārīnaṃ
tika-s0102t:200_18: suṭṭhu paṭipassambhitasabbakilesavipphanditattā kilesābhisaṅkhāravātehi akampanīyatāya acalaṃ nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0102t:200_19: saṅkhārūpasamaṃ sukhaṃ pattānaṃ adhigatānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ gati devamanussādibhedāsu gatīsu “ayaṃ nāmā”ti
tika-s0102t:200_20: paññāpetabbatāya abhāvato paññāpetuṃ natthi na upalabbhati,
tika-s0102t:200_21: yathāvuttajātavedo viya apaññattikabhāvameva te gacchantīti attho.
tika-s0102t:200_22: Evaṃ manasi karontoti “evaṃ anekajātisaṃsāra”ntiādinā attano katakiccattaṃ manasi karonto bodhipallaṅke nisinnova virocitthāti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:203_2: ahanti bhagavā attānaṃ niddisatīti āha “yadi panāha”nti.
tika-s0102t:203_3: “Aṭṭhame sattāhe”tiādi yathā amhākaṃ bhagavā abhisambuddho hutvā vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedanādivasena sattasu sattāhesu paṭipajji,
tika-s0102t:203_6: te ca sattāhādayo tatheva vavatthapīyantīti ayaṃ sabbesampi buddhānaṃ dhammatā.
tika-s0102t:203_7: Tasmā vipassī bhagavā abhisambuddhakāle tathā paṭipajjīti dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0102t:203_9: sattāhato orime ca pavattāya paṭipattiyā vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:203_10: na pallaṅkasattāhassa viya aṭṭhamassa nāma sattāhassa vavatthitassa labbhamānattā.
tika-s0102t:204_0: Paṭividdhoti sayambhuñāṇena “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā paṭimukhaṃ paṭivijjhanavasena pavatto,
tika-s0102t:204_3: Gambhīroti mahāsamuddo viya makasatuṇḍasūciyā aññatra samupacitaparipakkañāṇasambhārehi aññesaṃ ñāṇena alabbhaneyyappatiṭṭho.
tika-s0102t:204_5: Alabbhaneyyappatiṭṭho ogāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya sarūpato visesato ca passituṃ na sakkāti āha “gambhīrattāva duddaso”ti.
tika-s0102t:204_6: Dukkhena daṭṭhabboti kicchena kenaci kadācideva daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0102t:204_8: tassa ogāhetvā anu anu bujjhane kathā eva natthīti āha “duddasattāva duranubodho”ti.
tika-s0102t:204_10: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave dukkarataraṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ vā”ti suttapadaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:204_15: Ettha ca nirodhasaccaṃ santaṃ ārammaṇanti santārammaṇaṃ,
tika-s0102t:204_24: Bālānaṃ avisayattā paṇḍitehi eva veditabboti paṇḍitavedanīyo.
tika-s0102t:204_33: evaṃ rāgampi assādenti abhinandanti yevāti vuttaṃ “duvidhampī”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:205_2: Atthato pana “ṭhāna”nti ca paṭiccasamuppādo eva adhippeto.
tika-s0102t:205_7: Idappaccayā eva idappaccayatā yathā devo eva devatā,
tika-s0102t:205_8: idappaccayānaṃ vā avijjādīnaṃ attano phalaṃ paṭicca paccayabhāvo uppādanasamatthatā idappaccayatā,
tika-s0102t:206_2: Idāni tassa nibbānabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “yasmā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:206_6: Tathā santā ca savisesaṃ upasantā nāma hontīti āha “vūpasammantī”ti,
tika-s0102t:206_7: etena sabbe saṅkhārā sammanti etthāti sabbasaṅkhārasamatho,
tika-s0102t:206_9: Sabbasaṅkhāravisaṃyutte hi nibbāne sabbasaṅkhāravūpasamapariyāyo ñāyāgato yevāti.
tika-s0102t:206_15: Sabbe kilesarāgāti kāmarāgarūparāgādibhedā sabbepi kilesabhūtā rāgā,
tika-s0102t:206_16: sabbepi vā kilesā idha kilesarāgāti veditabbā,
tika-s0102t:206_20: mūḷhampi cittaṃ vipariṇata”nti virajjantīti attano sabhāvaṃ vijahanti.
tika-s0102t:206_22: Bhavena bhavanti tena tena bhavena bhavantaraṃ.
tika-s0102t:206_24: phalena vā saddhiṃ kammaṃ sataṇhasseva āyatiṃ punabbhavabhāvato.
tika-s0102t:206_25: Tato vānato nikkhantaṃ tattha tassa sabbaso abhāvato.
tika-s0102t:206_26: Ciranisajjācirabhāsanehi piṭṭhiāgilāyanatālugalasosādivasena kāyakilamatho ceva kāyavihesā ca veditabbā.
tika-s0102t:206_27: Sā ca kho desanāya atthaṃ ajānantānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:206_30: pana paṭipajjantānañca desanāya kāyaparissamopi satthu aparissamova.
tika-s0102t:206_31: Tenāha bhagavā “na ca maṃ dhammādhikaraṇaṃ vihesesī”ti.
tika-s0102t:206_32: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “yā ajānantānaṃ desanā nāma,
tika-s0102t:206_35: cittavihesā cāti ubhayaṃ petaṃ buddhānaṃ natthi,
tika-s0102t:207_6: Vuddhiatthopi hi akāro hoti yathā“asekkhā dhammā”ti.
tika-s0102t:207_7: Kappānaṃ cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni satasahassañca sadevakassa lokassa dhammasaṃvibhāgakaraṇatthameva pāramiyo
tika-s0102t:208_2: iti vā byattanti etasmiṃ atthe nipāto,
tika-s0102t:208_5: ekaṃsena vā alaṃ nippayojanaṃ evaṃ kicchena adhigatassa dhammassa desetunti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:208_6: Halanti “ala”nti iminā samānatthaṃ padaṃ “halanti vadāmī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0102t:209_1: Evaṃ gatanti evaṃ pavattaṃ aniccādiākārena pavattaṃ.
tika-s0102t:209_4: Evaṃ gatanti vā evaṃ “anicca”ntiādinā abhinivisitvā mayā,
tika-s0102t:209_9: diṭṭhirāgena rattā viparītābhinivesena na dakkhanti yāthāvato imaṃ dhammaṃ nappaṭivijjhissanti.
tika-s0102t:209_10: Evaṃ gāhāpetunti “anicca”ntiādinā sabhāvena yāthāvato dhamme jānāpetuṃ.
tika-s0102t:210_0: Dhammadesanāya appossukkatāpattiyā kāraṇaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “kasmā panā”tiādinā sayameva codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-s0102t:210_1: Tattha yathāyaṃ idāni dhammadesanāya appossukkatāpatti sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇadhammatāvasena,
tika-s0102t:210_2: sabbabodhisattānaṃ ādito “kiṃ me aññātavesenā”tiādinā mahābhinīhāre attano cittassa samussāhanaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇadhammatā vāti āha “kiṃ me”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:210_3: Tattha aññātavesenāti sadevakaṃ lokaṃ unnādento buddho ahutvā kevalaṃ buddhānaṃ sāvakabhāvūpagamanavasena aññātarūpena.
tika-s0102t:210_6: tattha ca bhagavato sātisayaṃ gāravanti taṃ dassetuṃ “tassa hī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0102t:210_7: Tattha paṭipakkhā nāma rāgādayo kilesā sammāpaṭipattiyā antarāyakarattā.
tika-s0102t:210_8: Tesaṃ balavabhāvato ciraparibhāvanāya sattasantānato dubbisodhiyatāya te satte mattahatthino viya dubbalaṃ
tika-s0102t:210_9: purisaṃ ajjhottharitvā anayabyasanaṃ āpādentā anekasatayojanāyāmavitthāraṃ sunicitaṃ ghanasannivesaṃ
tika-s0102t:210_11: Dūrappabheda ducchejjatāhi dubbisodhiyataṃ pana dassetuṃ “athassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:210_12: Tattha ca anto āmaṭṭhatāya kañjikapuṇṇalābu ciraparivāsikatāya takkabharitacāṭi snehatintadubbalabhāvena vasātelapītapilotikā;
tika-s0102t:210_19: Yathā ca dubbisodhanīyatāya evaṃ gambhīraduddasaduranubodhānampi vuttaupamā hīnūpamāva.
tika-s0102t:211_5: So visesato loke sambhāvanīyassa garukātabbassa abhipatthanāhetukoti panāḷikāya sattānaṃ dhammasampaṭipattiyā
tika-s0102t:212_2: atha kho pākaṭo paññātoti dassetuṃ “imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe jeṭṭhakamahābrahmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:212_7: apparajaṃ akkhi paññācakkhu yesaṃ te taṃsabhāvāti katvā apparajakkhajātikāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “paññāmaye”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:212_8: Appaṃ rāgādirajaṃ yesaṃ te taṃsabhāvā apparajakkhajātikāti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:212_9: Assavanatāti “sayaṃ abhiññā”tiādīsu viya karaṇe paccattavacananti āha “assavanatāyā”ti.
tika-s0102t:213_3: Padesavisayañāṇadassanaṃ hutvā buddhānaṃyeva āveṇikabhāvato idaṃ ñāṇadvayaṃ “buddhacakkhū”ti vuccatīti
tika-s0102t:213_5: Tiṇṇaṃ maggañāṇānanti heṭṭhimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maggañāṇānaṃ “dhammacakkhū”ti nāmaṃ,
tika-s0102t:213_8: aggamaggañāṇaṃ pana ñāṇakiccassa sikhāppattiyā dassanamattaṃ na hotīti “dhammacakkhū”ti na vuccatīti.
tika-s0102t:213_19: taṃ imāya atthavaṇṇanāya aññadatthu saṃsandati sametīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:213_25: Taṃ dukkhāvahaṃ vajjaṃ viya bhayato passitabbanti vuttaṃ “paralokañceva vajjañca bhayato passantī”ti.
tika-s0102t:214_0: Ayaṃ panettha pāḷīti ettha “apparajakkhā”dipadānaṃ atthavibhāvane ayaṃ tassa tathābhāvasādhakapāḷi.
tika-s0102t:214_1: Saddhādīnañhi vimuttiparipācakadhammānaṃ balavabhāvo tappaṭipakkhānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ dubbalabhāveneva hoti,
tika-s0102t:214_2: tesañca balavabhāvo saddhādīnaṃ dubbalabhāvenāti vimuttiparipācakadhammānaṃ savisesaṃ atthitānatthitāvasena
tika-s0102t:214_11: sampatti sambhavati etenāti sampattisambhavaloko sugatisaṃvattaniyo kammabhavo.
tika-s0102t:215_0: Puna ekakadukādivasena lokaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “eko loko”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:215_2: Tattha “eko loko sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti yāyaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ paccayāyattavuttitā vuttā,
tika-s0102t:215_3: tāya sabbo saṅkhāraloko eko ekavidho pakārantarassābhāvato.
tika-s0102t:215_5: Nāmaggahaṇena cettha nibbānassa aggahaṇaṃ tassa alokasabhāvattā.
tika-s0102t:215_6: Nanu ca “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti ettha paccayāyattavuttitāya maggaphalānampi lokatā āpajjatīti?
tika-s0102t:215_8: Atha vā na lujjati na palujjatīti yo gahito,
tika-s0102t:215_10: so lokoti taṃgahaṇarahitānaṃ lokuttarānaṃ natthi lokatā.
tika-s0102t:215_15: vajjitabbañca hutvā upaṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ “sabbe abhisaṅkhārā vajjaṃ,
tika-s0102t:215_19: Na pana sabbena sabbaṃ saddhādīnaṃ abhāvatoti apparajakkhadukādīsu pañcasu dukesu ekekasmiṃ dasa dasa
tika-s0102t:215_20: katvā “paññāsāya ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni jānātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:215_22: byatirekato ca saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ paropariyattaṃ jānātīti katvā tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:215_23: Ettha ca apparajakkhādivasena āvajjantassa bhagavato te sattā puñjapuñjāva hutvā upaṭṭhahanti, na ekekā.
tika-s0102t:216_3: Yāni udakassa anto nimuggāneva hutvā pusanti vaḍḍhanti,
tika-s0102t:216_11: Saha udāhaṭavelāyāti udāhāre dhammassa uddese udāhaṭamatte eva.
tika-s0102t:216_13: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā nayena saṅkhittena mātikāya dīpiyamānāya desanānusārena
tika-s0102t:216_14: ñāṇaṃ pesetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhituṃ samattho “puggalo ugghaṭitaññū”ti vuccati.
tika-s0102t:216_15: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ saṅkhittena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho “puggalo vipañcitaññū”ti vuccati.
tika-s0102t:216_20: Anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hotīti anukkamena arahattappatto hoti.
tika-s0102t:216_21: Na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hotīti tena attabhāvena maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā antamaso jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0102t:216_22: Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo padaparamoti ayaṃ puggalo byañjanapadameva paramaṃ assāti “padaparamo”ti vuccati.
tika-s0102t:217_0: Yeti ye duvidhe puggale sandhāya vuttaṃ vibhaṅge kammāvaraṇenāti pañcavidhena ānantariyakammena.
tika-s0102t:217_9: bhavaṅgapaññāya pana paripuṇṇāyapi yassa bhavaṅgaṃ lokuttarassa paccayo na hoti,
tika-s0102t:217_11: Abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattanti kusalesu dhammesu sammattaniyāmasaṅkhātaṃ ariyamaggaṃ okkamituṃ adhigantuṃ abhabbā.
tika-s0102t:220_2: (visuddhimaggamahāṭīkāya nigamane sayameva vuttattā)] visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ;
tika-s0102t:221_1: Ārabbhāti attano adhippetassa atthassa bhagavato jānāpanaṃ uddissāti attho.
tika-s0102t:221_2: Selo pabbato ucco hoti thiro ca,
tika-s0102t:221_6: So hi pabbatasadiso ca hoti sabbadhamme atikkamma abbhuggataṭṭhena pāsādasadiso ca,
tika-s0102t:221_8: Sā hi abbhuggataṭṭhena pāsādoti abhidhamme niddiṭṭhā.
tika-s0102t:224_0: “Yathā hī”tiādīsu yathā pabbate ṭhatvā rattandhakāre heṭṭhā olokentassa purisassa khette kedārapāḷikuṭiyo,
tika-s0102t:224_1: tattha sayitamanussā ca na paññāyanti anujjalabhāvato.
tika-s0102t:224_2: Kuṭikāsu pana aggijālā paññāyati ujjalabhāvato evaṃ dhammapāsādamāruyha sattalokaṃ olokayato bhagavato
tika-s0102t:224_3: ñāṇassa āpāthaṃ nāgacchanti akatakalyāṇā sattā ñāṇagginā anujjalabhāvato,
tika-s0102t:224_4: anuḷārabhāvato ca rattiṃ khittā sarā viya honti.
tika-s0102t:224_5: Katakalyāṇā pana bhabbapuggalā dūre ṭhitāpi bhagavato ñāṇassa āpāthaṃ āgacchanti paripakkañāṇaggitāya samujjalabhāvato,
tika-s0102t:224_6: uḷārasantānatāya himavantapabbato viya cāti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0102t:225_0: Uṭṭhehīti tvaṃ dhammadesanāya appossukkatāsaṅkhātasaṅkocāpattito kilāsubhāvato uṭṭhaha.
tika-s0102t:225_4: Kilesamārassa viya maccumārassapi āyatiṃ asambhavato “maccukilesamārāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:226_2: Nibbānassa dvāraṃ pavisanamaggo vivaritvā ṭhapito mahākaruṇūpanissayena sayambhuñāṇena adhigatattā.
tika-s0102t:228_1: Sallapitvāti “vippasannāni kho te āvuso indriyānī”tiādinā ālāpasallāpaṃ katvā.
tika-s0102t:228_2: Tañhissa aparabhāge satthu santikaṃ upasaṅkamanassa paccayo ahosi.
tika-s0102t:229_1: Anupubbiṃ kathanti anupubbiyā anupubbaṃ kathetabbaṃ kathaṃ.
tika-s0102t:229_4: Tattha dānakathā tāva pacurajanesu pavattiyā sabbasādhāraṇattā,
tika-s0102t:229_6: sīle patiṭṭhānassa upāyabhāvato ca ādito kathitā.
tika-s0102t:229_7: Pariccāgasīlo hi puggalo pariggahavatthūsu nissaṅgabhāvato sukheneva sīlāni samādiyati,
tika-s0102t:229_11: bhogasampattihetuṃ vatvā bhavasampattihetuvacanato ca dānakathānantaraṃ sīlakathā kathitā,
tika-s0102t:229_14: imehi ca dānasīlamayehi paṇītapaṇītatarādibhedabhinnehi puññakiriyavatthūhi etā cātumahārājikādīsu paṇītapaṇītatarādibhedabhinnā
tika-s0102t:229_15: aparimeyyā dibbabhogabhavasampattiyo hontīti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ saggakathaṃ.
tika-s0102t:229_17: sabbadā anupakkiliṭṭho ariyamaggoti dassanatthaṃ saggānantaraṃ maggakathā kathetabbā.
tika-s0102t:229_19: pageva itare sabbepi kāmā nāma bahvādīnavā,
tika-s0102t:229_24: sabbepi bhavā kilesānaṃ vatthubhūtāti tattha saṃkileso,
tika-s0102t:229_25: sabbaso kilesavippamuttaṃ nibbānanti nekkhamme ānisaṃso ca kathetabboti ayamattho maggantīti ettha iti-
tika-s0102t:230_7: Sampattīnaṃ mūlanti yā imā loke padesarajjaṃ sirissariyaṃ sattaratanasamujjalacakkavattisampadāti evaṃpabhedā mānusikā sampattiyo,
tika-s0102t:230_10: tāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ idaṃ dānaṃ nāma mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:231_0: Ratanamayasīhāsanasadisanti sabbaratanamayasattaṅgamahāsīhāsanasadisaṃ mahagghaṃ hutvā sabbaso vinipatituṃ appadānato.
tika-s0102t:231_2: Ālambanarajjusadisanti yathā dubbalassa purisassa ālambanarajju uttiṭṭhato,
tika-s0102t:231_19: Dāyako hi dānapati sampati pakkhabalena balavā hoti,
tika-s0102t:232_0: Idāni dānaṃ vaṭṭagatā ukkaṃsappattā sampattiyo viya vivaṭṭagatāpi tā sampādetīti bodhicariyabhāvenapi dānaguṇe dassetuṃ “dānañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:232_3: parahitāya cāti dassetuṃ sā tāsaṃ parato vuttā,
tika-s0102t:232_5: imā pana lokuttarāti dassetuṃ tato paraṃ “sāvakapāramīñāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:232_6: Tatthāpi ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhatarukkaṭṭhatamāti dassetuṃ kamena ñāṇattayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:232_7: Tesaṃ pana dānassa paccayabhāvo heṭṭhā vutto eva.
tika-s0102t:233_0: Dānañca nāma dakkhiṇeyyesu hitajjhāsayena vā pūjanajjhāsayena vā attano santakassa paresaṃ pariccajanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:233_3: paresaṃ vā santakaṃ haratī”ti aṭṭhānametanti āha “dānaṃ dadanto sīlaṃ samādātuṃ sakkotī”ti.
tika-s0102t:233_4: Sīlasadiso alaṅkāro natthīti akittimaṃ hutvā sabbakālaṃ sobhāvisesāvahattā.
tika-s0102t:233_5: Sīlapupphasadisaṃ pupphaṃ natthīti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0102t:233_6: Sīlagandhasadiso gandho natthīti ettha “candanaṃ tagaraṃ vāpī”tiādikā gāthā,
tika-s0102t:233_8: kāyā cuto gacchati mālutenā”tiādikā ca vattabbā.
tika-s0102t:233_9: Sīlañhi sattānaṃ ābharaṇañceva alaṅkāro ca gandhavilepanañca parassa dassanīyabhāvāvahañca.
tika-s0102t:234_0: “Ayaṃ saggo labbhatī”ti idaṃ majjhimehi chandādīhi āraddhaṃ sīlaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0102t:237_3: taṃ panassa iṭṭhādibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “niccamettha kīḷā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:238_0: Appassādāti nirassādā paṇḍitehi yathābhūtaṃ passantehi tattha assādetabbatābhāvato.
tika-s0102t:238_9: Atha vā ādīnaṃ vāti pavattatīti ādīnavo,
tika-s0102t:238_11: tathā ca kāmā yathābhūtaṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ paccupatiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0102t:238_15: Nekkhamme ānisaṃsanti ettha yattakā kāmesu ādīnavā,
tika-s0102t:238_22: nikkhantaṃ byāpādato”tiādinā nayena nekkhamme ānisaṃse pakāsesi,
tika-s0102t:239_2: heṭṭhā pavattitadesanāya assaddhiyādīnaṃ cittadosānaṃ vigatattā uparidesanāya bhājanabhāvūpagamanena kammakkhamacitteti attho.
tika-s0102t:239_3: Assaddhiyādayo hi yasmā cittassa rogabhūtā tadā te vigatā,
tika-s0102t:239_12: Vinīvaraṇacitteti uddhaccakukkuccavigamena vikkhepassa vigatattā tena apihitacitte.
tika-s0102t:240_14: Dhammacakkhunti brahmāyusutte heṭṭhimā tayo maggā vuttā,
tika-s0102t:240_22: Yasmā taṃ nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccavasena sabbasaṅkhataṃ paṭivijjhantaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0102t:241_0: “Suddhaṃ vattha”nti nidassitaupamāyaṃ idaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ vatthaṃ viya cittaṃ,
tika-s0102t:241_1: vatthassa āgantukamalehi kiliṭṭhabhāvo viya cittassa rāgādimalehi saṃkiliṭṭhabhāvo,
tika-s0102t:241_4: udake temetvā ūsagomayachārikābharehi kāḷakapadese samucchinditvā vatthassa dhovanapayogo viya saddhāsinehena
tika-s0102t:241_5: temetvā temetvā satisamādhipaññāhi dose sithilī katvā sutādividhinā cittassa sodhane vīriyārambho,
tika-s0102t:241_6: tena payogena vatthe nānākāḷakāpagamo viya vīriyārambhena kilesavikkhambhanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:241_8: tena suddhassa vatthassa pabhassarabhāvo viya vikkhambhitakilesassa cittassa maggena pariyodapananti.
tika-s0102t:241_9: “Diṭṭhadhammā”ti vatvā dassanaṃ nāma ñāṇadassanato aññampi atthīti taṃ nivattanatthaṃ “pattadhammā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:241_10: Patti ca ñāṇasampattito aññampi vijjatīti tato visesadassanatthaṃ “viditadhammā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:241_11: Sā pana viditadhammatā dhammesu ekadesenāpi hotīti nippadesato viditabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “pariyogāḷhadhammā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:241_13: Maggañāṇañhi ekābhisamayavasena pariññādikiccaṃ sādhentaṃ nippadesatova catusaccadhammaṃ samantato ogāhantaṃ paṭivijjhatīti.
