tika-s0102t:858_8: Parikkhāro hi sammādiṭṭhiyādayo maggadhammā sammāsamādhissa sahajātādipaccayabhāvena parikaraṇato abhisaṅkharaṇato.
tika-s0102t:858_12: Sammā pasatthā sundarā diṭṭhi etassāti sammādiṭṭhi, puggalo,
tika-s0102t:858_16: Sammāsaṅkappo pahotīti maggasammādiṭṭhiyā dukkhādīsu parijānanādikiccaṃ sādhentiyā kāmavitakkādike samugghāṭento
tika-s0102t:858_18: tathā pavattiṃ panassa dassento āha “sammāsaṅkappo pavattatī”ti.
tika-s0102t:858_19: Esa nayo sabbapadesūti “sammāsaṅkappassa sammāvācā pahotī”tiādīsu sesapadesu yathāvuttamatthaṃ atidisati.
tika-s0102t:859_0: Ettha ca yasmā nibbānādhigamāya paṭipannassa yogino bahūpakārā sammādiṭṭhi.
tika-s0102t:859_3: Tāya hi so avijjandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā kilesacore ghātento khemena nibbānaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-s0102t:859_6: Yasmā pana sammādiṭṭhipuggalo nekkhammasaṅkappādivasena sammadeva saṅkappeti,
tika-s0102t:859_10: Yathāha “pubbe kho gahapati vitakketvā vicāretvā pacchā vācaṃ bhindatī”ti,
tika-s0102t:859_12: Yasmā pana “idañcidañca karissāmā”ti hi paṭhamaṃ vācāya saṃvidahitvā yebhuyyena te te kammantā sammā payojīyanti,
tika-s0102t:859_13: tasmā vācā kāyakammassa upakārikāti sammāvācassa sammākammanto pahoti.
tika-s0102t:859_15: tividhañca kāyaduccaritaṃ pahāya ubhayaṃ sucaritaṃ pūrentasseva ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ pūrati,
tika-s0102t:859_17: tasmā sammāvācassa sammākammantassa ca sammāājīvo pahoti.
tika-s0102t:859_18: Visuddhidiṭṭhisamudāgatasammāājīvassa yoniso padhānassa sambhavato sammāājīvassa sammāvāyāmo pahoti.
tika-s0102t:859_19: Yoniso padahantassa kāyādīsu catūsu vatthūsu sati sūpaṭṭhitā hotīti sammāvāyāmassa sammāsati pahoti.
tika-s0102t:859_20: Yasmā evaṃ sūpaṭṭhitā sati samādhissa upakārānupakārānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samannesitvā pahoti ekattārammaṇe cittaṃ samādhātuṃ,
tika-s0102t:859_22: Ayañca nayo pubbabhāge nānākkhaṇikānaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ vasena vutto,
tika-s0102t:859_23: maggakkhaṇe pana sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ tassa tassa sahajātādivasena vutto “sammādiṭṭhissa sammāsaṅkappo pahotī”tiādīnaṃ padānamattho yutto,
tika-s0102t:860_1: Maggapaññā hi catunnaṃ saccānaṃ sammādassanaṭṭhena “maggasammādiṭṭhī”ti vuttā,
tika-s0102t:860_2: sā eva nesaṃ yāthāvato jānanato paṭivijjhanato idha “maggañāṇa”ntipi vuttā.
tika-s0102t:861_1: So pana vinā ca ācariyamuṭṭhinā anantaraṃ abāhiraṃ karitvā yāvadeva manussehi suppakāsitattā vivaṭo.
tika-s0102t:861_3: So panettha kilesānaṃ samucchedavinayavasena veditabboti āha “sammāniyyānena niyyātā”ti.
tika-s0102t:862_0: Atthīti puthutthavisayaṃ nipātapadaṃ “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā”tiādīsu viyāti āha “anāgāmino ca atthī”ti.
tika-s0102t:862_2: Bahiddhā saṃyojanapaccayo nibbattihetubhūto puññabhāgo etissā atthīti puññabhāgā,
tika-s0102t:863_3: “Abhisamaye viseso natthī”ti etena sabbepi sabbaññuguṇā sabbabuddhānaṃ sadisā evāti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:864_1: Kāraṇassa ekarūpattā imāni pana padānīti na kevalaṃ “tayidaṃ brahmacariya”ntiādīni padāni,
tika-s0102t:864_2: atha kho “imamatthaṃ janavasabho yakkho”tiādīni padāni pīti.
tika-s0102t:869_3: Tattha hi katā sālādayo catūhi disāhi āgatamanussānaṃ upabhogakkhamā honti.
tika-s0102t:869_4: “Evarūpānī”ti iminā rukkhamūlasodhanādīni ceva yathāsatti annadānādīni ca puññāni saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0102t:869_5: “Suvaṇṇakkhandhasadiso attabhāvo iṭṭho kanto manāpo ahosī”ti pāṭho.
tika-s0102t:870_0: Yasmā majjhimayāme eva devatā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamituṃ avasaraṃ labhanti,
tika-s0102t:870_4: īsakaṃ asamattanti attho bhagavato hi samīpaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā sabbo gijjhakūṭavihāro tena obhāsito.
tika-s0102t:873_2: te purato karonto “dvīsu devalokesu devatā purato katvā nisinno”ti vutto.
tika-s0102t:874_0: Nāgarājāti nāgānaṃ adhipati, na pana sayaṃ nāgajātiko.
tika-s0102t:875_6: ekacce ca cātumahārājikā yathāladdhāya sampattiyā thāvarabhāvāya,
tika-s0102t:875_7: āyatiṃ sodhanāya ca pañca sīlāni rakkhanti,
tika-s0102t:877_2: Ye hi nīlapattakā ativiya khuddakā makuḷā,
tika-s0102t:877_4: Jālakajātoti tehiyeva khuddakamakuḷehi jātajālako sabbaso jālo viya jāto.
tika-s0102t:877_5: Keci pana “jālakajātoti ekajālo viya jāto”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0102t:877_6: Pārichattako kira khārakaggahaṇakāle sabbatthakameva pallaviko hoti,
tika-s0102t:879_0: Reṇuvaṭṭīti reṇusaṅghāto. Kaṇṇikaṃ āhaccāti sudhammāya kūṭaṃ āhantvā.
tika-s0102t:880_0: Aṭṭha divaseti pañcamiyā saddhiṃ pakkhe cattāro divase sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:880_1: Yathāvuttesu aṭṭhasu divasesu dhammassavanaṃ nibaddhaṃ tadā pavattatīti tato aññadā kāritaṃ sandhāyāha “akāladhammassavanaṃ kārita”nti.
tika-s0102t:880_3: Cetiyaṃ parikkhipitvā padakkhiṇakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ antokatvā kātabbavedikā puṭavedikā.
tika-s0102t:880_4: Cetiyassa kucchiṃ parikkhipitvā taṃ sambandhameva katvā kātabbavedikā kucchivedikā.
tika-s0102t:881_2: Pavāraṇāsaṅgahatthāya sannipatitāti veditabbā “tadahuposathe pannarase pavāraṇāya puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā”ti vacanato.
tika-s0102t:882_1: Navahi kāraṇehīti “itipi so bhagavā araha”ntiādinā vuttehi arahattādīhi navahi buddhānubhāvadīpanehi kāraṇehi.
tika-s0102t:882_3: saddo avuttasamuccayatthoti tena sampiṇḍitamatthaṃ dassento “ujuppaṭipannatādibhedaṃ saṅghassa ca suppaṭipatti”nti āha.
tika-s0102t:884_3: evaṃ yathābhūtā eva yathābhuccāti pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti āha “yathābhucceti yathābhūte”ti.
tika-s0102t:884_7: sattānaṃ upakārā vatthāyanti tīsupi avatthāsu lokanāthassa bahujanahitāya paṭipattiyā kathetukamyatāpucchā.
tika-s0102t:884_8: Tathā hi naṃ ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā saṅkhepeneva dassento “dīpaṅkarapādamūle”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:884_12: taṃ brahmajālaṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ evāti tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:885_0: “Khantivāditāpasakāle”tiādi hetuavatthāyameva anaññasādhāraṇāya sudukkarāya bahujanahitāya paṭipattiyā vibhāvanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:885_1: Yathādhippetaṃ hitasukhaṃ yāya kiriyāya vinā na ijjhati,
tika-s0102t:885_2: sāpi tadatthā evāti dassetuṃ “tusitapure yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhantopī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:886_1: Āyusaṅkhārossajjanampi “ettakaṃ kālaṃ tiṭṭhāmī”ti pavattiyā bahujanahitāya paṭipatti.
tika-s0102t:887_1: tepi pana buddhā evāti atthato amhākaṃ satthā anaññoti āha “atītepi buddhato aññaṃ na samanupassāmā”ti.
tika-s0102t:887_3: evaṃ anāgate cāti ayamattho nayato labbhatīti katvā vuttaṃ “anāgatepi na samanupassāmā”ti.
tika-s0102t:887_4: Sakko pana devarājā tamatthaṃ atthāpannameva katvā “na panetarahi” iccevāha.
tika-s0102t:887_5: Kiṃ sakko kathetīti vicāretvāti “neva atītaṃse samanupassamā’ti vadanto sakko kiṃ kathetī”ti vicāraṇaṃ samuṭṭhapetvā.
tika-s0102t:887_7: anāgate bhavissantīti nāyamattho sakkena devarājena pariññāto,
tika-s0102t:887_8: te pana buddhasāmaññena amhākaṃ bhagavatā saddhiṃ gahetvā etarahi aññassa sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato tathā vuttanti dassetuṃ “etarahī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:888_0: Gaṅgāyamunānaṃ asamāgamaṭṭhāne udakaṃ bhinnavaṇṇaṃ hontampi samāgamaṭṭhāne abhinnavaṇṇaṃ evāti āha “vaṇṇenapi saṃsandati sametī”ti.
tika-s0102t:888_2: Yathā nibbānaṃ kenaci kilesena anupakkiliṭṭhatāya parisuddhaṃ,
tika-s0102t:888_3: evaṃ nibbānagāminipaṭipadāpi kenaci kilesena anupakkiliṭṭhatāya parisuddhāva icchitabbā.
tika-s0102t:888_9: Idāni tamatthaṃ nidassanena vibhūtaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “candimasūriyāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:889_4: Idaṃ pana “adutiyo”tiādi suttantare āgatavacanaṃ aññehi asadisaṭṭhena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:889_7: “Apanujjā”ti ca antogadhāvadhāraṇaṃ idaṃ vacanaṃ ekantikattā tassa apanodassāti vuttaṃ “apanujjevā”ti.
tika-s0102t:890_2: vipulo eva ca idhādhippetoti āha “mahālābho uppanno”ti.
tika-s0102t:890_4: ito paraṃ mayhaṃ okāso natthī”ti ussāhajāto viya uparūpari vaḍḍhamāno udapādi.
tika-s0102t:890_5: Sabbadisāsu hi yamakamahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā mahāmeghaṃ viya sabbapāramiyo “ekasmiṃ attabhāve vipākaṃ dassāmā”ti
tika-s0102t:890_6: sampiṇḍitā viya bhagavato idaṃ lābhasakkārasilokaṃ nibbattayiṃsu,
tika-s0102t:890_12: sakaṭasatehipi paccaye āharitvā okāsaṃ alabhamānā samantā gāvutappamāṇampi sakaṭadhurena sakaṭadhuraṃ
tika-s0102t:890_13: āhacca tiṭṭhanti ceva anubandhanti ca andhakavindabrāhmaṇādayo viya.
tika-s0102t:890_15: tesu tesu ca suttesu āgatanayena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:891_0: Paṭipāṭibhattanti bahūsu “dānaṃ dassāmā”ti āhaṭapaṭipāṭikāya uṭṭhitesu anupaṭipāṭiyā dātabba bhattaṃ.
tika-s0102t:892_1: Upāyaṃ ācikkhi nāgarānaṃ asakkuṇeyyarūpena dānaṃ dāpetuṃ.
tika-s0102t:892_4: hatthino ca rājabhaṇḍabhūtā nāgarehi na sakkā laddhunti tehi chattaṃ dhārāpitaṃ,
tika-s0102t:892_6: “Pañca āsanasatānī”ti idaṃ sālakalyāṇimaṇḍape paññatte sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:892_7: tato bahi pana bahūni paññattāni ahesuṃ.
tika-s0102t:892_8: Catujjātiyagandhaṃ pisati buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa pūjanatthañceva pattassa ubbaṭanatthañca.
tika-s0102t:894_5: Dhīroti dhītisampanno uḷārapañño parehi kataṃ dānaṃ anumodamānopi,
tika-s0102t:895_0: Vararojo nāma tasmiṃ kāle eko khattiyo,
tika-s0102t:895_4: Atirekapadasahassena tiṃsādhikena aḍḍhateyyagāthāsatena vaṇṇameva kathesi rūpappasannatāya ca.
tika-s0102t:896_0: Yāva maññe khattiyāti ettha yāvāti avadhiparicchedavacanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:896_2: yāva khattiyā khattiye avadhiṃ katvā sabbe devamanussāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:896_4: Madapamattoti lābhasakkārasilokamadena pamatto ceva tadanvayena pamādena pamatto ca hutvā.
tika-s0102t:898_4: idaṃ pana na tādisaṃ tiṇṇavicikicchataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:898_5: atha kho sabbasmiṃ ñeyyadhamme sabbākārāvabodhasaṅkhātasanniṭṭhānavasena sabbaso nirākataṃ sandhāyāti dassento “yathā hī”ti ādimāha.
tika-s0102t:898_9: Sabbesaṃ paramatthadhammānaṃ saccābhisamayavasena paṭividdhattā vuttaṃ “vohāravasenā”ti vā nāmagottādivasenāti attho.
tika-s0102t:899_1: Nanu ca ariyamaggena pariyositasaṅkappatā nāma soḷasakiccasiddhiyā katakaraṇīyabhāvena,
tika-s0102t:899_4: hi paccekabuddhānaṃ paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ viya ca sammāsambuddhānaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ catusaccābhisambodhapubbakamevāti.
tika-s0102t:899_11: Balesu ca vasībhāvanti dasannaṃ balañāṇānaṃ yathāruci pavatti.
tika-s0102t:900_0: 297. Tattha tattha rājadhāniādike nibaddhavāsaṃ vasanto. Tīsu maṇḍalesu yathākālaṃ cārikaṃ caranto.
tika-s0102t:903_0: Ettakanti imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ majjhe katvā imināva saddhiṃ cakkavāḷaṃ dasasahassaṃ.
tika-s0102t:906_3: saddo jānanattho “saṅkhāyetaṃ paṭisevatī”tiādīsu viyāti āha “jānitvā modāmā”ti.
tika-s0102t:908_4: Mahāpaññova so bhagavāti tena brahmunā anumatipucchāvasena devānaṃ vuttanti dassento “mahāpaññova so bhagavā.
tika-s0102t:908_6: Sayamevetaṃ pañhaṃ byākātukāmo “bhūtapubbaṃ bho”ti ādiṃ āhāti sambandho.
tika-s0102t:908_7: Evaṃ pana byākarontena atthato ayampi attho vutto nāma hotīti dassento “anacchariyameta”nti ādimāha.
tika-s0102t:909_0: Rañño diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaatthānaṃ puro dhānato pure pure saṃvidhānato purohitoti āha “sabbakiccāni anusāsanapurohito”ti.
tika-s0102t:909_2: Taṃ kira tassa brāhmaṇassa kulaparamparāgataṃ ṭhānantaraṃ.
tika-s0102t:910_0: Sammā vossajjitvāti suṭṭhu tassevāgāravabhāvena vissajjitvā niyyātetvā.
tika-s0102t:911_6: Bhavantaṃ jotipālanti pana sāmiatthe upayogavacananti āha “bhoto”ti.
tika-s0102t:911_8: So pana paṭikkhepo paṭivacanaṃ hotīti āha “mā paṭibyāhāsī”ti.
tika-s0102t:911_9: Abhisambhosīti kammantānaṃ saṃvidhāne samattho hotīti āha “saṃvidahitvā”ti.
tika-s0102t:911_13: “Go”ti hi paññāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ gacchati atthe bujjhatīti.
tika-s0102t:913_2: Ayaṃ abhisittoti ayaṃ reṇu rājakumāro pitu accayena rajje abhisitto.
tika-s0102t:915_1: Reṇussa rajjasamīpe dasagāvutamattavitthatāni hutvā aparabhāge tiyojanasataṃ vitthatattā sabbāni cha rajjāni sakaṭamukhāni paṭṭhapesi.
tika-s0102t:916_4: so saha āsuṃ satta bhāradhāti yojetabbo,
tika-s0102t:916_5: tena te desantare vasantā vicittena sahabhāvino avinābhāvinoti dīpeti.
tika-s0102t:916_6: Rajjabhāraṃ dhārenti attani āropenti vahantīti bhāradhā.
tika-s0102t:919_6: Tato paṭṭhāyāti vatacariyaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā nhātakālato pabhuti.
tika-s0102t:920_2: Acintetvāti “kathaṃ kho ahaṃ brahmunā saddhiṃ manteyya”nti acintetvā evaṃ cittampi anuppādetvā.
tika-s0102t:920_4: Taṃ disvāti taṃ karuṇābrahmavihārabhāvanaṃ brahmadassanūpāyaṃ disvā ñāṇacakkhunā.
tika-s0102t:921_1: Evanti evaṃ rañño ārocetvā paṭisallānaṃ upagate.
tika-s0102t:923_1: Santhāgāranti jhānamanasikārena bahi visaṭavitakkavūpasamanena cittassa santhambhanaṃ agāraṃ,
tika-s0102t:923_3: Gahitāvāti bhāvanānuyogena mahāsattena attano cittasantāne uppādanavasena gahitā eva.
tika-s0102t:923_5: Visesato hissa karuṇāya bhāvitattā anabhirati ukkaṇṭhanā natthi,
tika-s0102t:926_0: Soti ye te panakanasanantabandhasatanasanaṅkumārakālanāmakā loke pākaṭā paññātā brahmāno,
tika-s0102t:927_2: yaṃ kiñci atithino dātabbaṃ āhāraṃ upacāravasena evaṃ vadati.
tika-s0102t:928_1: Mahāsatto cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā ṭhitopi tesu “brahmasahabyatāya maggo”ti anibbematikatāya “kaṅkhī”ti avoca.
tika-s0102t:928_3: brahmasamāgamena bhayādisamuppattiyā ca paṭiladdhamattehi brahmavihārehi parihīno ahosi,
tika-s0102t:928_6: te pana tassa pākaṭā vibhūtāti āha “parassa pākaṭesu paravediyesū”ti.
tika-s0102t:928_15: “Ekodibhūto”ti padassa bhāvatthaṃ tāva dassento “ekībhūto”ti vatvā puna taṃ vivaranto “eko tiṭṭhanto eko nisīdanto”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:928_19: anibbattite kuto adhimuttīti āha “jhānaṃ nibbattetvāti attho”ti.
tika-s0102t:928_20: Vissagandho nāma kodhādikilesaparibhāvanāti tesaṃ vikkhambhanena vissagandhavirahito.
tika-s0102t:929_6: Corādīhi upaddutassa pavisitukāmassa pākārakavāṭaparikhādīhi viya nagaraṃ kodhādīhi nivuto pihito brahmaloko assāti nivutabrahmaloko.
tika-s0102t:930_3: Sadisaṃ patirūpaṃ dassetvā palobhanaṃ sadisaṃ dassetvā vañcanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:930_10: parehi sādhāraṇabhāvāsahanavasena ca vividhā icchā ruci etassāti vivicchā.
tika-s0102t:930_18: Etesūti etesu yathāvuttesu kodhādīsu sattasantānassa kilissanato vibādhanato,
tika-s0102t:931_0: Ettha cāyaṃ brahmā mahāsattena āmagandhe supuṭṭho attano yathāupaṭṭhite pāpadhamme cuddasahi padehi vibhajitvā kathesi,
tika-s0102t:931_1: te pana tādisaṃ pavattivisesaṃ upādāya vuttāpi keci puna vuttā,
tika-s0102t:931_2: āmagandhasutte pana vuttāpi keci idha sabbaso na vuttā,
tika-s0102t:931_4: tadekaṭṭhatāya vā tesaṃ pettha saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0102t:931_6: Tattha āmagandhasuttena dīpetvāti idha sarūpato avutte āmagandhepi vuttehi ekalakkhaṇatādinā āmagandhasuttena
tika-s0102t:931_7: pakāsetvā kathetabbaṃ tattha nesaṃ sarūpato kathitattā.
tika-s0102t:931_8: Āmagandhasuttampi iminā dīpetabbaṃ idha vuttānampi kesañci āmagandhānaṃ tattha avuttabhāvato.
tika-s0102t:931_9: Yasmā āmagandhasutte vuttāpi āmagandhā atthato idha saṅgahaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0102t:931_10: tasmā idha vutte pariharaṇavasena dassentena yasmā cettha keci abhidhammanayena akilesasabhāvāpi sattasantānassa
tika-s0102t:932_3: Mahāpurisassa daḷhīkammaṃ katvāti mahāpurisassa “pabbajissāmaha”nti pavattacittuppādassa daḷhīkammaṃ katvā.
tika-s0102t:934_0: 321. Mama manaṃ haritvāti mama cittaṃ apanetvā tassa vasena avattitvā.
tika-s0102t:935_0: Ekībhāvaṃ upagantvā vutthassāti kāyavivekaparibrūhanena ekībhāvaṃ upagantvā tapokammavasena vutthassa.
tika-s0102t:935_1: Kusapattehi paritthatoti barihisehi vediyā samantato santharito.
tika-s0102t:938_2: khantibalassa ca abhāvena pabbajitānaṃ samaṇadhammo paripuṇṇo,
tika-s0102t:938_4: tesu vīriyārambhakhantibalesu te te niyojetuṃ “ārambhavho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:939_4: Sabbhi rakkhito sādhūhi yathā parihāni na hoti,
tika-s0102t:939_7: tesaṃ saparahitasādhanena sādhūhi buddhādīhi kathito paveditoti attho.
tika-s0102t:940_2: yo vā so gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyena paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi,
tika-s0102t:940_3: pāde ca baddhakhuradhārāsamāgamanatopi sīghataratāya atiittaro pavattikkhaṇo,
tika-s0102t:940_8: Karaṇatthe vā bhummanti “mantāya”nti idaṃ bhummaṃ karaṇatthe daṭṭhabbaṃ yathā “ñātāya”nti.
tika-s0102t:945_0: 328. Samāpattīnaṃ ājānanaṃ nāma attapaccakkhatā, sacchikiriyāti āha “na sakkhiṃsu nibbattetu”nti.
tika-s0102t:946_2: “Sarāmaha”nti hi vadantena bhagavato mahābrahmunā kathitaṃ “tatheva ta”nti bhagavatā paṭiññātameva jātanti.
tika-s0102t:946_4: Asati pana vaṭṭe nibbidāya virāgānaṃ asambhavo evāti āha “na virāgāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:948_3: Brahmacariyaciṇṇakulaputtānanti ciṇṇamaggabrahmacariyānaṃ kulaputtānanti ukkaṭṭhaniddesena arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
tika-s0102t:949_1: tañcettha atthato cittassa attamanatāti āha “cittena sampaṭicchanto abhinanditvā”ti.
tika-s0102t:949_2: “Sādhu sādhū”ti vācāya sampahaṃsanā anumodanāti āha “vācāya sampahaṃsamāno anumoditvā”ti.
tika-s0102t:955_1: Udānanti raññā okkākena jātisambhedaparihāranimittaṃ pavattitaṃ udānaṃ paṭicca.
tika-s0102t:955_2: Ekopi janapado ruḷhisaddena “sakkā”ti vuccatīti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-s0102t:956_0: Āvaraṇenāti setunā. Bandhāpetvāti paṃsupalāsapāsāṇamattikākhaṇḍādīhi āḷiṃ thiraṃ kārāpetvā.
tika-s0102t:957_0: “Jātiṃ ghaṭṭetvā kalahaṃ vaḍḍhayiṃsū”ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “koliyakammakarā vadantī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:958_0: Tīṇi jātakānīti phandanajātakapathavīundriyajātakalaṭukikajātakāni dve jātakānīti rukkhadhamma vaṭṭakajātakāni.
tika-s0102t:965_0: Yadā te vivadissanti, tadā ehinti me vasa”nti. –
tika-s0102t:971_1: Pucchitapucchitaṃ kathesi “anukkamena kuṇālasakuṇarājassa pucchanappasaṅgena kuṇālajātakaṃ kathessāmī”ti.
tika-s0102t:971_2: Anabhiratiṃ vinodesi itthīnaṃ dosadassanamukhena kāmānaṃ ādīnavokārasaṃkilesavibhāvanena.
tika-s0102t:972_0: Kosajjaṃ vidhamitvā purisathāmaparibrūhanena “uttamapurisasadisehi no bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti uppannacittā.
tika-s0102t:974_3: na kathesī”ti iminā sabbepi te bhikkhū tāvadeva paṭipāṭiyā āgatattā aññamaññassa lajjamānā attanā paṭividdhavisesaṃ bhagavato nārocesunti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:975_4: Rāmaṇeyyakadassanatthanti buddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitattā visesato ramaṇīyassa lokassa ramaṇīyabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0102t:975_6: Evarūpe khaṇe laye muhutteti yathāvutte candamaṇḍalassa uṭṭhitakkhaṇe uṭṭhitavelāyaṃ uṭṭhitamuhutteti
tika-s0102t:976_0: Tathā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ jātiādivasena bhagavato anurūpaparivāritaṃ dassento “tatthā”ti ādimāha.
tika-s0102t:977_3: Jambudīpe kira ādito tesaṭṭhimattāni nagarasahassāni uppannāni,
tika-s0102t:977_7: Te pana sampiṇḍetvā satasahassato paraṃ asītisahassāni,
tika-s0102t:977_10: Doṇamukhanti ca mahānagarassa āyuppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ pādanagaraṃ vuccati.
tika-s0102t:977_13: Evaṃ pana nagaradoṇimukhapaṭṭanaratanākarādivibhāgena kathanaṃ taṃtaṃadhivatthāya vasantīnaṃ devatānaṃ bahubhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0102t:977_15: atha kasmā pāḷiyaṃ “dasahi ca lokadhātūhī”ti vuttanti āha “dasasahassa…pe…
tika-s0102t:977_17: tena sahassilokadhātu idha “ekā lokadhātū”ti vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:978_3: pacchā āgatānaṃ okāso eva na bhaveyyāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yathā kho panā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:978_9: itaresañca saṃyojanānaṃ samucchindanena suddho āvāso etesanti suddhāvāsā.
tika-s0102t:979_4: Yāva cakkavāḷā ottharituṃ ovarituṃ na sakkā.
tika-s0102t:979_5: Pahaṭabuddhavīthiyāvāti buddhānaṃ santikaṃ upasaṅkamantehi tehi devabrahmehi vaḷañjitavīthiyāva.
tika-s0102t:980_0: Samādahaṃsūti samādahitaṃ lokuttarasamādhinā suṭṭhu appitaṃ akaṃsu,
tika-s0102t:980_1: yathāsamāhitaṃ pana samādhinā yojitaṃ nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “samādhinā yojesu”nti.
tika-s0102t:980_4: Avīthipaṭipannānaṃ assānaṃ vīthipaṭipādanaṃ rasmiggahaṇena pahotīti “sabbayottāni gahetvā acodento”ti
tika-s0102t:980_5: vatvā taṃ pana acodanaṃ avāraṇaṃ evāti āha “acodento avārento”ti.
tika-s0102t:981_0: Yathā khīlaṃ bhittiyaṃ vā bhūmiyaṃ vā ākoṭitaṃ dunnīharaṇaṃ,
tika-s0102t:981_2: yathā ca indakhīlaṃ gambhīranemi sunikhātaṃ dunnīharaṇaṃ,
tika-s0102t:981_6: Taṇhāejāya abhāvena anejā paramasantuṭṭhabhāvena cātuddisattā appaṭihatacārikaṃ caranti.
tika-s0102t:982_3: Te hi niyamena apāyabhūmiṃ na gamissanti,
tika-s0102t:982_5: Ye pana lokiyena saraṇagamanena buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse,
tika-s0102t:982_7: sati ca paccayantarasamavāye pahāya mānusaṃ dehaṃ,
tika-s0102t:985_0: Kiṃ pana bhagavatāva mahante devatāsamāgame tesaṃ nāmagottaṃ kathetuṃ sakkāti?
tika-s0102t:985_1: Āma sakkāti dassetuṃ “buddhā nāma mahantā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:985_11: Katthaci nīlādivasena vibhattarūpārammaṇeti abhidhamme “nīlaṃ pītaka”ntiādinā vibhatte yattha katthaci
tika-s0102t:985_12: rūpārammaṇe kiñci rūpārammaṇaṃ vā na atthīti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:986_1: Tadā jānanakiriyāya apariyositabhāvadassanatthaṃ “jānāmī”ti vatvā yasmā yaṃ kiñci neyyaṃ nāma,
tika-s0102t:986_2: sabbaṃ taṃ bhagavatā aññātaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-s0102t:987_2: “Yassa maṅgalā samūhatā”ti ārabhitvā “rāgaṃ vinayetha mānusesu dibbesu kāmesu cā”tiādinā ca rāganiggahakathābāhullato
tika-s0102t:987_4: “piyamappiyabhūtā kalaha vivādā paridevasokā sahamaccharā cā”tiādinā kalahādayo yato dosato samuṭṭhahanti,
tika-s0102t:987_6: so ca piyabhāvo yato chandato samuṭṭhahanti,
tika-s0102t:987_8: kāraṇaparamparato ca dose ādīnavavibhāvanabāhullato kalahavivādasuttaṃ dosacaritānaṃ sappāyaṃ –
tika-s0102t:992_0: Ādinā nayena sammohavidhamanato, paññāparibrūhanato ca mahābyūhasuttaṃ mohacaritānaṃ sappāyaṃ –
tika-s0102t:997_0: Ādinā nayena sandiṭṭhiparāmāsitāpanayanamukhena savisayesu diṭṭhiggahaṇesu visaṭavitakkavicchindanavasena
tika-s0102t:1002_0: Papañcasaṅkhāya mūlaṃ avijjādikilesajātaṃ asmīti pavattamānañcāti sabbaṃ mantā paññāya uparundheyya.
tika-s0102t:1002_1: Yā kāci ajjhattaṃ rūpataṇhādibhedā taṇhā uppajjeyya,
tika-s0102t:1002_2: tāsaṃ vinayā vūpasamāya sadā sato upaṭṭhitassati hutvā sikkheyyāti evamādi upadesassa saddhova bhājanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1002_3: Tassa hi so atthāvahoti tuvaṭṭakasuttaṃ saddhācaritānaṃ sappāyaṃ –
tika-s0102t:1007_1: tato eva atītaddhasaññitaṃ purimakoṭṭhāsaṃ taṇhānissayena anissito,
tika-s0102t:1007_3: tassa arahato taṇhādiṭṭhipurakkhārānaṃ abhāvā anāgate addhani kiñci purakkhataṃ natthīti ādinā evaṃ gambhīrakathābāhullato
tika-s0102t:1007_4: pūrābhedasuttaṃ buddhicaritānaṃ sappāyanti katvā vuttaṃ “atha nesaṃ sappāyaṃ …pe…
tika-s0102t:1007_6: Manasākāsīti evaṃ cariyāya vasena manasi katvā puna taṃ sadisaṃ attano desanānikkhepayogyatāvasena manasi akāsi.
tika-s0102t:1007_7: Attajjhāsayena nu kho jāneyyāti parajjhāsayādiṃ anapekkhitvā mayhaṃyeva ajjhāsayena āraddha desanaṃ jāneyya nu kho.
tika-s0102t:1007_12: “Sace paccekabuddho bhaveyyā”ti idaṃ imesaṃ suttānaṃ desanāya pucchā paccekabuddhānaṃ bhāriyā,
tika-s0102t:1008_2: atha kho diṭṭhasaṃsandanapucchāsadisī vā vimaticchedanapucchāsadisī vā pucchā yuttā,
tika-s0102t:1008_5: tattha yadi bhagavā tathā sayameva pucchitvā sayameva vissajjeyya,
tika-s0102t:1008_6: suṇantīnaṃ devatānaṃ sammoho bhaveyya “kiṃ nāmetaṃ bhagavā paṭhamaṃ evamāha,
tika-s0102t:1008_9: tasmā vuttaṃ “evaṃ petā devatā na sakkhissanti paṭivijjhitu”nti.
tika-s0102t:1008_10: Yathādhammadesanāyaṃ pana kathetukamyatāvasena pucchanena sammoho hotīti.
tika-s0102t:1008_11: Sūriyo uggatoti āha devasaṅgho āsannatarabhāvena obhāsassa vipulauḷārabhāvato.
tika-s0102t:1008_12: Ekissā lokadhātuyāti sutte āgatanayena sabbattheva pana apubbaṃ acarimaṃ dve buddhā na honteva.
tika-s0102t:1009_0: Gāthāyaṃ pucchāmīti nimmitabuddho bhagavantaṃ pucchituṃ okāsaṃ kārāpesi.
tika-s0102t:1009_5: sabbassa vā ñeyyassa pāraṃ pariyantaṃ gataṃ.
tika-s0102t:1009_8: Nikkhamma gharā panujja kāmeti vatthukāme panūditvā gharāvāsā nikkhamma.
tika-s0102t:1009_9: Kathaṃ bhikkhu sammā so loke paribbajeyyāti so bhikkhu kathaṃ sammā paribbajeyya gaccheyya vihareyya,
tika-s0102t:1010_1: Silokaṃ anukassāmīti ettha siloko nāma pādasamudayo,
tika-s0102t:1010_4: taṃ silokaṃ anukassāmi pavattayissāmīti atthoti āha “akkhara…pe…
tika-s0102t:1010_9: Taṃ taṃ nissitā taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ nissitavanto nissāya vasamānā,
tika-s0102t:1010_11: “Ye sitā girigabbhara”nti iminā tesaṃ vivekavāsaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0102t:1011_2: tejussadatāya ca sīhā viya pavivittatāya nilīnā.
tika-s0102t:1011_4: Odātacittā hutvā suddhāti arahattamaggādhigamena pariyodātacittā hutvā suddhā,
tika-s0102t:1012_0: Bhikkhū jānitvāti bhinnakilese bhikkhū “ime dibbacakkhunā ete devakāye passantīti jānitvā.
tika-s0102t:1013_0: Tadatthāya vīriyaṃ kariṃsūti dibbacakkhuñāṇābhinīhāravasena vīriyaṃ ussāhaṃ akaṃsu.
tika-s0102t:1014_0: Anantanti antarahitaṃ, taṃ pana ativiya mahantaṃ nāma hotīti āha “vipula”nti.
tika-s0102t:1015_0: Avekkhitvāti ñāṇacakkhunā visuṃ visuṃ avekkhitvā “vavatthitvānā”tipi paṭhanti,
tika-s0102t:1017_7: Yasassinoti mahāparivārā ceva patthaṭakittisaddā ca. Samiti-
tika-s0102t:1021_2: tathāpi catūsupi disāsu saparivāradīpesu catūsupi mahādīpesu gandhabbānaṃ jeṭṭhako, kathaṃ?
tika-s0102t:1022_1: Tādisāyevāti dhataraṭṭhassa puttasadisā eva puthutthato, nāmato, balato,
tika-s0102t:1023_0: Sabbasaṅgāhikavasenāti dasasahassilokadhātuyā paccekaṃ cattāro cattāro mahārājānoti tesaṃ sabbesaṃ saṅgaṇhanavasena.
tika-s0102t:1024_2: Yadi evaṃ mahatiyā parisāya āgatānaṃ kathaṃ kāpilavatthave vane ṭhitāti āha “te panā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:1025_8: te ca paresaṃ vañcanatthaṃ yena māyākaraṇena “māyā”ti vuttā,
tika-s0102t:1026_0: Ettakā dāsāti ettakā kuṭeṇḍuādikā nighaṇḍupariyosānā aṭṭhamahārājānaṃ dāsā.
tika-s0102t:1027_1: Citto ca seno ca cittaseno cāti tayo ete devaputtā pāḷiyaṃ ekasesanayena vuttāti āha “citto cā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:1028_0: Bhikkhusaṅgho samito sannipatito etthāti bhikkhusaṅghasamiti, imaṃ vanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1029_3: cirakālaṃ vasato tassa parisā mahatī paramparāgatā atthi,
tika-s0102t:1032_1: Kākolūkaahinakulādayo viya aññamaññaṃ jātisamudāgataverāpi samānā mittā viya…pe…
tika-s0102t:1032_3: Buddhaṃyeva te saraṇaṃ gatā “buddhānubhāveneva mayaṃ aññamaññasmiṃ mettiṃ paṭilabhimhā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1034_3: Abhabbāti sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamituṃ na bhabbā acchandikattā tādisassa chandasseva abhāvato.
tika-s0102t:1035_0: Balino mahāasurassa abbhatītattā tassa putte eva kittento bhagavā “satañca baliputtāna”nti ādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1035_1: So kira sukhumaṃ attabhāvaṃ māpetvā upagacchi.
tika-s0102t:1036_7: “mettākaruṇākāyikāti mettājhāne ca karuṇājhāne ca parikammaṃ katvā nibbattadevā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1037_0: Te āpodevādayo yathāsakaṃ vaggavasena ṭhitattā dasadhā ṭhitā.
tika-s0102t:1038_5: Candassūpanisā devā candassa upanissayato vattamānā tassa purato ca pacchato ca passato ca dhāvanakadevā.
tika-s0102t:1039_0: Daseteti ete veṇḍudevatādayo vāsavapariyosānā dasa devakāyā.
tika-s0102t:1040_0: Imānīti “jalamaggī”ti ca “sikhārivā”ti ca imāni tesaṃ nāmāni.
tika-s0102t:1040_2: kāro padasandhikaro “jalā”ti ca “aggī”ti ca “sikhārivā”ti ca imāni tesaṃ nāmānīti vadanti.
tika-s0102t:1040_4: rojā”ti ca vuttadevesu ekacce,umāpupphanibhāsino vaṇṇato umāpupphasadisāti evamattho gahetabbo,
tika-s0102t:1041_0: Daseteti ete dasa sahabhūdevādayo vāsavanesipariyosānā dasa devakāyā.
tika-s0102t:1042_0: “Samānā”tiādi tesaṃ devānaṃ nikāyasamudāyagataṃ nāmaṃ. Evaṃ sesānampi.
tika-s0102t:1043_0: Daseteti ete samānādikā mahāpāragapariyosānā dasa devakāyā. Teneva nikāyabhedena dasadhā āgatā.
tika-s0102t:1044_0: Sukkādayo tayo devakāyā. Pāmokkhadevāti pamukhā padhānabhūtā devā.
tika-s0102t:1045_2: Daseteti ete sukkādayo pajjunnapariyosānā dasa devakāyā,
tika-s0102t:1046_0: Daseteti ete khemiyādayo paranimmitapariyosānā dasa devakāyā,
tika-s0102t:1046_3: kaṭṭhakādayo ca pañcāpi sadevakāyā tāvatiṃsakāyikā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0102t:1047_0: Pavutthāti pavāsaṃ gatā viya apetāti āha “vigatā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1047_5: Lañcanābhāvena vā asitātigo kāḷakabhāvātītāya siriyā cando,
tika-s0102t:1048_5: yo aparabhāge manussesu nibbattitvā moggaliputtatissatthero jāto.
tika-s0102t:1049_0: Sahassaṃ brahmalokānanti brahmaloko etesanti brahmalokā, brahmāno,
tika-s0102t:1049_1: tesaṃ brahmalokānaṃ sahassaṃ sattalokapariyāyo cāyaṃ lokasaddoti āha “mahābrahmānaṃ sahassaṃ āgata”nti.
tika-s0102t:1051_1: Kāḷakadhammasamannāgato kāḷakassa pāpimassa mārassa bālabhāvaṃ passatha,
tika-s0102t:1051_2: yo attano avisaye niratthakaṃ parakkamituṃ vāyamati.
tika-s0102t:1052_0: Vītarāgabhāvāvahassa dhammassavanassa antarāyakaraṇena avītarāgā rāgena baddhā eva nāma hontīti vuttaṃ “rāgena baddhaṃ hotū”ti.
tika-s0102t:1053_0: Bhayānakaṃ sarañca katvāti bheravaṃ mahantaṃ saddaṃ samuṭṭhapetvā.
tika-s0102t:1054_0: Idāni taṃ saddaṃ upamāya dassento “yathā”ti ādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1054_2: mānusakaṃ vā attano vase vattetuṃ asakkonto asayaṃvase sayañca na attano vase ṭhito.
tika-s0102t:1055_2: Sabbāyapi hi tattha samāgataparisāya mārasenā apakkantāva.
tika-s0102t:1055_3: Nesaṃ lomampi iñjayuṃ tesaṃ lomamattampi na cālesuṃ,
tika-s0102t:1055_7: vītarāgaggahaṇena vā sarāgavītarāgavibhāvino ca tattha saṅgahitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1055_9: Kathañhi nāma tāva ghorataraṃ mahatiṃ vibhiṃsakaṃ mayi karontepi sabbe pime nibbikārā samāhitā eva. Kasmā?
tika-s0102t:1055_13: na kadāci tādiso anariyānaṃ hotīti “sāsane bhūtehi ariyehi” iccetaṃ vuttaṃ. Vi-
tika-s0102t:1055_15: saddo vikhyātatthavacano hoti “sutadhammassā”tiādīsu viyāti āha “jane vissutā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1056_1: Daharassa antarāyaṃ pariharantī “na sakkā bhante sakalaṃ kāyaṃ dassetu”nti avocāti.
tika-s0102t:1062_1: Ambasaṇḍānaṃ adūrabhavattā ekopi so brāhmaṇagāmo “ambasaṇḍā”tveva bahuvacanavasena vuccati,
tika-s0102t:1063_2: tathā ussāhanavasena ca pavattiyā “dhammiko ussāho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1063_6: Parittakenāti aparāparaṃ bahuṃ puññakammaṃ akatvā appamattakeneva puññakammena.
tika-s0102t:1064_1: sātisayāya pana dibbasampattiyā viyogahetukena sokena diguṇitena maraṇabhayena saṃtajjito jāto.
tika-s0102t:1065_0: Dibbacakkhunā devatānaṃ dassanaṃ nāma paṭivijjhanasadisanti āha “paṭivijjhī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1065_4: aññe ayonisomanasikāratāya ceva appahukāya ca na sahantiyeva,
tika-s0102t:1065_5: sā pana nesaṃ marisaniyasampattikatā dukkhavirahitāyāti vuttaṃ “niddukkhātipi vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1065_6: Ekako vāti devaparisāya vinā āgatattā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1065_7: mātaliādayo pana tādisā sahāyā tadāpi ahesuṃyeva.
tika-s0102t:1065_8: Tathā hi vakkhati “api cāyaṃ āyasmato cakkanemisaddena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhito”ti.
tika-s0102t:1066_1: Bhaddaṃtavāti pana sakkaṃ uddissa nesaṃ āsi vādo.
tika-s0102t:1067_3: Iminā katokāseti iminā pañcasikhena katokāse bhagavati.
tika-s0102t:1068_1: taṃ panassa anucaraṇaṃ nāma saddhiṃ gamanamevāti āha “sahacaraṇaṃ ekato gamana”nti.
tika-s0102t:1069_3: Veṭhakāti tantīnaṃ bandhanāya ceva uppīḷanāya ca dhametabbā veṭhakā.
tika-s0102t:1069_5: Samapaññāsamucchanā mucchetvāti yathā samapaññāsamucchanā kamato tattha saṃmucchanaṃ kātuṃ sakkā,
tika-s0102t:1069_7: “Samapaññāsamucchanā saṃmucchetvā”ti ca idaṃ devaloke niyataṃ vīṇāvādanavidhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1072_0: Tattha chajjo, usabho, gandhāro, majjhimo, pañcamo, dhevato,
tika-s0102t:1072_6: Manussaloke vādanavidhinā ekekasseva ca sarassa vasena tayo tayo mucchanā katvā ekavīsati mucchanā.
tika-s0102t:1072_7: Ekekasseva ca sarassa satta satta tānabhedā,
tika-s0102t:1072_11: catasso tisso duve catassoti dvāvīsati sutibhedā icchitā,
tika-s0102t:1072_12: ayaṃ pana ekekassa sarassa vasena satta satta mucchanā,
tika-s0102t:1072_13: antarasarassa ca ekāti samapaññāsāya mucchanānaṃ yogyabhāvena vīṇaṃ vajjesi.
tika-s0102t:1074_3: te kathaṃ atthikehi durupasaṅkamāti āha “ahaṃ sarāgo”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:1074_4: Tadantaraṃ paṭisallīnāti yena antarena yena khaṇena upasaṅkameyya,
tika-s0102t:1074_7: saddo vā “etarahī”ti iminā samānatthoti āha “sampati paṭisallīnā vā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1076_1: Sāvesīti yathādhippetamucchanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā vīṇaṃ vādento taṃtaṃṭhānuppattiyā pākaṭībhūtamandatāvavatthaṃ
tika-s0102t:1079_0: Yathāpi muni nandeyya, patvā sambodhiṃ uttama”nti. ;
tika-s0102t:1080_1: Buddhūpasañhitā pana buddhānaṃ dhammasarīraṃ ārabbha nissayaṃ katvā pavattitāti āha “dhammo arahatāṃ ivā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1081_2: Yasmā timbaruno gandhabbadevarājassa sūriyavaccha sā aṅke jātā,
tika-s0102t:1081_3: tasmā āha “yaṃ timbaruṃ devarājānaṃ nissāya tvaṃ jātā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1082_0: Rāgāvesavasena pubbe vuttā gāthā idānipi tameva ārabbha purato ṭhitaṃ viya ālapanto vadati.
tika-s0102t:1083_0: Thanudaranti payodharañca udarañca adhippetanti āha “thanavemajjhaṃ udarañcā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1086_3: Na tikhiṇanti na tikkhaṃ na lūkhaṃ na kakkhaḷaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1087_1: so pana bahuvidho nāma hotīti āha “anekavidho jāto”ti.
tika-s0102t:1088_0: Tayā saddhiṃ vipaccatanti tayā sahitaṃyeva me taṃ kammaṃ vipaccatu,
tika-s0102t:1088_1: tayā saheva tassa kammassa phalaṃ anubhaveyyanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:1088_2: Tayā saddhimevāti yathā cakkavattisaṃvattaniyakammaṃ tassa nissandaphalabhūtena itthiratanena saddhiṃyeva vipākaṃ deti,
tika-s0102t:1088_3: evaṃ taṃ me kammaṃ tayā saddhiṃyeva mayhaṃ vipākaṃ detu.
tika-s0102t:1089_3: Tathābhūtova jigīsati nāmāti tathā paṭhamavikappo vutto.
tika-s0102t:1089_4: Dutiyavikappe pana “vicaratī”ti kiriyāpadaṃ āharitvā attho vutto.
tika-s0102t:1091_5: teneva ca ākārena gītassaropi pavattoti attho.
tika-s0102t:1091_6: Yena ajjhāsayena bhagavā pañcasikhassa gandhabbe vaṇṇaṃ kathesi,
tika-s0102t:1091_13: Yadi evaṃ kasmā pañcasikhassa gandhabbe vaṇṇaṃ kathesīti āha “sace panā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:1092_1: tā pana nirantaraṃ kathiyamānā rāsikatā viya hontīti āha “piṇḍitā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1096_1: “Abhivadito sakko devānamindo”tiādīnaṃ “tena kho pana samayenā”tiādīnaṃ viya saṅgītikāravacanabhāve saṃsayo natthi,
tika-s0102t:1096_2: “evañca pana tathāgatā”ti idha pana siyā saṃsayoti “dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi ṭhapitavacana”nti vatvā itarassāpi
tika-s0102t:1096_4: Vuḍḍhivacanena vuttoti “sukhī hotu pañcasikha sakko devānaṃ indo”ti āsīsavādaṃ vutto.
tika-s0102t:1096_5: “Bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatī”ti vadanto abhivādeti nāma “sukhī hotū”ti āsīsavādassa vadāpanato.
tika-s0102t:1096_6: Tathā pana āsīsavādaṃ vadanto abhivadati nāma sabbakālaṃ tatheva tiṭṭhanato.
tika-s0102t:1097_0: Uruṃ vepullaṃ dassati dakkhatīti urundā vibhattialopena.
tika-s0102t:1097_3: so antarahitoti yo tassaṃ guhāyaṃ satthu samantato asītihatthato ayaṃ pākatiko andhakāro,
tika-s0102t:1097_7: na ca samattho devānaṃ obhāso buddhānaṃ abhibhavituṃ.
tika-s0102t:1099_1: Tenassāti tena phaladvayādhigamena pahīnaoḷārikakāmarāgatāya assā bhūjatiyā devaloke abhiratiyeva natthi.
tika-s0102t:1099_2: Cakkanemisaddena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhitoti ettha adhippāyaṃ ajānantā “ārammaṇassa adhimattatāya samāpattito
tika-s0102t:1099_3: vuṭṭhānaṃ jāta”nti maññeyyunti taṃ paṭikkhipanto “samāpanno saddaṃ suṇātīti no vata re vattabbe”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:1099_4: Sati ca ārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭanāyaṃ gahaṇenapi bhavitabbanti adhippāyena “suṇātī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1099_5: itaro “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa saddo kaṇṭako”ti vacanamattaṃ nissāya sabbassāpi jhānassa saddo kaṇṭakoti
tika-s0102t:1099_8: Tattha yathā dosadassanapaṭipakkhabhāvanāvasena paṭighasaññānaṃ suppahīnattā mahatāpi saddena arūpasamāpattito na vuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1099_10: anuppādo khema”ntiādinā sammadeva dosadassanapaṭipakkhabhāvanāvasena sabbāsampi lokiyasaññānaṃ aggamaggena
tika-s0102t:1099_11: samatikkantattā ārammaṇādhigamatāya na kadāci phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0102t:1099_12: Tathā pana na suppahīnattā paṭighasaññānaṃ sabbarūpasamāpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0102t:1099_13: paṭhamajjhānaṃ pana appakampi saddaṃ na sahatīti taṃsamāpannassa “saddo kaṇṭako”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1099_14: Yadi pana paṭighasaññānaṃ vikkhambhitattā mahatāpi saddena arūpasamāpattito na vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0102t:1099_19: Imameva hi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “bhagavā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1102_1: Vaṭṭetvā vaṭṭetvāti tomarādiṃ vattentena viya codanavacanaṃ parivaṭṭetvā parivaṭṭetvā.
tika-s0102t:1103_0: Kuto mukhāti kuto pavattañāṇamukhā. Tenāha “aññavihitakā”ti. Katapuññeti sammā katapuññe dhamme.
tika-s0102t:1104_1: So hi dīyati tehi dātabbattā dāyo,
tika-s0102t:1104_6: Tattha tāvatiṃsabhavane ṭhitānaṃyeva nibbatto yathā sakkassa indasālaguhāyaṃ ṭhitasseva sakkattabhāvo.
tika-s0102t:1105_0: Nikantiṃ tasmiṃ gandhabbakāye ālayaṃ samucchindituṃ na sakkonto.
tika-s0102t:1108_0: Kāmarāgo eva “chando rāgo chandarāgo”tiādi pavattibhedena saṃyojanaṭṭhena “kāmarāgasaṃyojanānī”ti,
tika-s0102t:1108_2: Pāpimayogānīti ettha pana sesayogaganthānampi vasena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:1110_1: tattha ki”nti ca padadvaye kinti nipātamattaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1110_2: Cātuddisabhāveti tesaṃ buddhādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ catuddisayogyabhāve appaṭihaṭabhāve.
tika-s0102t:1111_0: Majjhimassa paṭhamajjhānassa adhigatattā tāvadeva kāyaṃ brahmapurohitaṃ adhigantvā tāvadeva purimaṃ jhānasatiṃ
tika-s0102t:1111_1: paṭilabhitvā taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā orambhāgiyasaṃyojanasamucchindanena maggaphalavisesaṃ
tika-s0102t:1111_3: Keci pana “kāmāvacarattabhāvena maggaphalāni adhigacchiṃsūti adhippāyena pañcamassa jhānassa anadhigatattā suddhāvāsesu na uppajjiṃsu,
tika-s0102t:1113_4: Tāvatakenevāti attanā sodhitaṭṭhāneva aññassa āgantvā avaṭṭhāneneva.
tika-s0102t:1113_5: Satiṃ paṭilabhitvāti “aho mayā katakammaṃ saphalaṃ jāta”nti yoniso cittaṃ uppādetvā.
tika-s0102t:1114_2: Etassa saggassa gamanamagganti etassa candādīnaṃ uppattiṭṭhānabhūtassa saggassa gamanamaggaṃ puññakammaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1115_3: Gahapatikā kiṃ karissantīti gahapatikā nāma aṭavikā viya visamanissitā,
tika-s0102t:1115_5: evaṃ tayā jānamānena kasmā mayhaṃ na kathitanti yadipi pubbe na kathitaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1115_8: ārocitakālato paṭṭhāya na mayhaṃ dosoti vadati.
tika-s0102t:1117_1: tumhākaṃ antare mayhaṃ pesuññaṃ upasaṃharatīti attho.
tika-s0102t:1117_3: Mayhampīti mayhampi atthāya maṃ uddissa puññakammaṃ karotha.
tika-s0102t:1117_4: Nīluppalaṃ nāma vikasamānaṃ udakato uggantvāva vikasati,
tika-s0102t:1117_5: evaṃ ahutvā antoudake pupphitaṃ nīluppalaṃ viya.
tika-s0102t:1117_6: Amhākaṃ panidaṃ puññakammaṃ bhavantarūpapattiyā vinā imasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ detīti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:1118_3: Tacchetvā maṭṭhaṃ katvā kaṇṇikāya kattabbaṃ sabbaṃ niṭṭhapetvā.
tika-s0102t:1118_4: Tathā hi sā vatthena veṭhetvā ṭhapitā.
tika-s0102t:1120_0: Yassa atthate phalake yassa phalake atthateti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:1121_2: Sabbajeṭṭhikāti sabbāsaṃ tassa bhariyānaṃ jeṭṭhikā sujātā.
tika-s0102t:1123_0: Kakkaṭakavijjhanasūlasadisanti kakkaṭake gaṇhituṃ tassa bilapariyantassa vijjhanasūcisadisaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1124_2: Tassāpi bakasakuṇikāya pañca vassasatāni āyu ahosi devanerayikānaṃ viya manussapetatiracchānānaṃ āyuno aparicchinnattā.
tika-s0102t:1128_0: Evaṃ taṃ jāyate pemaṃ, uppalaṃva yathodake”ti. ;
tika-s0102t:1129_0: Avasesesūti asure, sakkaṃ ṭhapetvā dvīsu devalokesu deveva sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0102t:1130_2: taṃ pana hitaṃ sukhassa nidānanti āha “kāraṇanissita”nti.
tika-s0102t:1132_2: Satte anatthe saṃyojenti bandhantīti saṃyojanānīti āha “kiṃbandhanā,
tika-s0102t:1132_19: Ayañca averādibhāvo saṃvibhāgena pākaṭo hotīti dassetuṃ “accharāyā”ti ādiṃ vatvā “iti ce nesaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1132_20: Cittuppatti daḷhatarāpi hutvā pavattatīti dassetuṃ “dānaṃ datvā,
tika-s0102t:1133_0: Yāya kāyaci paresaṃ sampattiyā khīyanaṃ usūyanaṃ asahanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti parasampattikhīyanalakkhaṇā,
tika-s0102t:1133_3: Tathā hissa porāṇā “mā idaṃ acchariyaṃ aññesaṃ hotu,
tika-s0102t:1133_6: “yā etesu paresaṃ lābhādīsu kiṃ iminā imesa”ntiādinā taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāyañca vuttāneva,
tika-s0102t:1134_2: tasmā abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vibhāvitānampi tesaṃ diṭṭhadhammikepi samparāyike piādīnave dassento “āvāsamacchariyena panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1134_5: Saṅkāraṃ sīsena ukkhipitvāva vicarati tattha laggacittatāya,
tika-s0102t:1134_12: te ca taṃ na maccharāyanti macchariyassa sabbaso pahīnattā.
tika-s0102t:1134_13: Paṭivedhadhamme macchariyassa asambhavo evāti āha “pariyattidhammamacchariyena cā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1135_2: Kulamacchariyena appalābho hoti parehi kulesu laddhabbalābhanisedhanato,
tika-s0102t:1135_4: Lābhamacchariyena gūthaniraye nibbattati lābhahetu parehi laddhabbassa assādanisedhanato.
tika-s0102t:1135_7: guṇavaṇṇoti duvidhopi vaṇṇo nāmamattenapi na hoti,
tika-s0102t:1135_8: tattha tattha nibbattamāno virūpo eva hoti.
tika-s0102t:1135_9: Sampattinigūhanasabhāvena macchariyena virūpite santāne yebhuyyena guṇā patiṭṭhameva na labhanti,
tika-s0102t:1135_12: Te hi tassa loke rattiṃ khittā sarā viya na paññāyanti.
tika-s0102t:1135_15: Verādīhi na parimuccantiyeva tapparimuccanāya icchāya appattabbattā jātiādidhammānaṃ sattānaṃ jātiādīhi viya.
tika-s0102t:1136_2: Etasmiṃ pañheti etasmiṃ “kiṃsaṃyojanā nu kho”ti evaṃ ñātuṃ icchite atthe.
tika-s0102t:1136_3: Tumhākaṃ vacanaṃ sutvāti “issāmacchariyasaṃyojanā”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ tumhākaṃ vissajjanavacanaṃ sutvā.
tika-s0102t:1136_4: Kaṅkhā tiṇṇāti yathāpucchite atthe saṃsayo tarito vigato desanānussaraṇamattena,
tika-s0102t:1136_6: Ayampi kathaṃkathā vigatāti kaṅkhāya vigatattā eva tassā pavattiākāravisesabhūtā “idaṃ katha idaṃ katha”nti ayampi kathaṃkathā vigatā apagatā.
tika-s0102t:1137_2: Piyānaṃ attano pariggahabhūtānaṃ sattasaṅkhārānaṃ parehi sādhāraṇabhāvāsahanavasena,
tika-s0102t:1137_6: Yañhi kiñci appiyasambandhaṃ bhaddakampi taṃ kodhanassa appiyamevāti.
tika-s0102t:1137_13: Issaṃ karotīti “kiṃ imassa iminā”ti tassa piyasattalābhāsahanavasena ussūyati,
tika-s0102t:1137_16: “Imassa puggalassa evarūpaṃ piyavatthu na bhaveyyā”ti issaṃ karoti usūyaṃ uppādeti.
tika-s0102t:1137_24: Ko añño evarūpassa lābhīti tena attānaṃ sambhāvento issaṃ vā karoti.
tika-s0102t:1137_25: Aññassa tādisaṃ uppajjamānampi “aho vatassa evarūpaṃ na bhaveyyā”ti issaṃ vā karoti,
tika-s0102t:1137_26: ayañca nayo heṭṭhā vuttanayattā na gahito.
tika-s0102t:1138_5: Diṭṭhadhammikameva payojanaṃ cintetvā vissajjanavasena pavatto chando vissajjanachando.
tika-s0102t:1140_0: Evaṃ vutto “lābhaṃ paṭicca vinicchayo”ti evaṃ mahānidānasutte vutto vinicchayavitakko vitakko nāma,
tika-s0102t:1140_2: Idāni yathāvuttaṃ vinicchayavitakkaṃ atthuddhāranayena nīharitvā dassetuṃ “vinicchayo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1140_6: Taṇhāvinicchayo nāma taṇhāya vasena vakkhamānanayena ārammaṇassa vinicchinanato.
tika-s0102t:1140_14: Taṇhāvasena hi ekacco kiñci vatthuṃ paṇītaṃ maññati,
tika-s0102t:1140_19: “Dassāmī”ti idaṃ vissajjanachande vuttanayena ceva vaṭṭūpanissayadānavasena ca veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1141_1: taṃ santānaṃ saṃsāre papañcenti vitthārayantīti papañcā.
tika-s0102t:1141_3: taṃ “ratto”ti vā “satto”ti vā “micchābhiniviṭṭho”ti vā papañcenti byañjentīti papañcā.
tika-s0102t:1141_4: Yasmā taṇhādiṭṭhiyo adhimattā hutvā pavattamānā taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃ pamattākāraṃ pāpenti,
tika-s0102t:1141_7: Saṅkhā vuccati koṭṭhāso bhāgaso saṅkhāyati upaṭṭhātīti.
tika-s0102t:1141_9: ārammaṇavasena ca bhāgaso vitakkassa paccayā honti,
tika-s0102t:1141_13: Papañcasaññāsaṅkhāggahaṇena ca anavaseso dukkhasamudayo vutto taṃtaṃ nimittattā vaṭṭadukkhassāti.
tika-s0102t:1142_1: Tassa sāruppanti tassa papañcasaññāsaṅkhāya nirodhassa vūpasamassa adhigamupāyatāya sāruppaṃ anucchavikaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1142_3: Tattha yathāvuttanirodhe ārammaṇakaraṇavasena gacchati pavattatīti tatthagāminī,
tika-s0102t:1144_2: Yasmā sakkena devānaṃ indena papañcasaññāsaṅkhānirodhagāminipaṭipadā pucchitāva,
tika-s0102t:1144_3: bhagavā ca tadadhigamupāyaṃ arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ tassa ajjhāsayavasena vedanāmukhena kathento tisso vedanā ārabhi,
tika-s0102t:1144_4: iti pucchitameva kathentena pucchānusandhivasena sānusandhimeva ca kathitaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1144_5: Na hi buddhānaṃ ananusandhikā kathā nāma atthi.
tika-s0102t:1144_6: Idānissa vedanāmukhena arūpakammaṭṭhānasseva kathane kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “devatānañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1144_7: Karajakāyassa sukhumatāvacaneneva accantamudusukhumālabhāvāpi vuttā evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1144_12: “Vilīyantī”ti etena karajakāyassa mandatāya kammajatejassa balavabhāvena āhāravelātikkamena nesaṃ balavatī
tika-s0102t:1144_15: sukhavedanāpi pana nesaṃ uḷārapaṇītesu ārammaṇesu uparūpari aniggahaṇavasena pavattamānā supākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhātiyeva.
tika-s0102t:1144_16: Upekkhāpi tesaṃ kadāci uppajjamānā santapaṇītarūpā eva iṭṭhamajjhatte eva ārammaṇe pavattanato.
tika-s0102t:1145_4: vipassanābhiniveso pana idhādhippetoti dassento “rūpapariggaho arūpapariggahotipi etadeva vuccatī”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:1145_5: Catudhātuvavatthānanti ettha yebhuyyena catudhātuvavatthānaṃ vitthārento rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:1145_6: Rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ dassetvāva katheti “evaṃ rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ vuccamānaṃ suṭṭhu vibhūtaṃ pākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhātī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1146_1: tadaññadhammavasenapi arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ labbhatīti taṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “tividho hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1146_5: sammasanaṃ pana anavasesatova dhamme pariggahetvā pavattatīti.
tika-s0102t:1146_6: “Pariggahite rūpakammaṭṭhāne”ti idaṃ rūpamukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1146_7: arūpamukhena pana vipassanābhiniveso yebhuyyena samathayānikassa icchitabbo,
tika-s0102t:1146_8: so ca paṭhamaṃ jhānaṅgāni pariggahetvā tato paraṃ sesadhamme pariggaṇhāti.
tika-s0102t:1146_9: Paṭhamābhinipātoti sabbe cetasikā cittāyattā cittakiriyābhāvena vuccantīti phasso cittassa paṭhamābhinipāto vutto.
tika-s0102t:1146_12: cittacetasikarāsi vā ārammaṇena phuṭṭho phassasahajātāya vedanāya taṃsamakālameva vedeti,
tika-s0102t:1146_13: phasso pana obhāsassa viya padīpo vedanādīnaṃ paccayaviseso hotīti purimakālo viya vuccati,
tika-s0102t:1146_16: Ayañhi arūpadhammattā ekadesena anallīyamānopi rūpaṃ viya cakkhuṃ,
tika-s0102t:1147_0: Ārammaṇaṃ anubhavantīti issaravatāya visavitāya sāmibhāvena ārammaṇarasaṃ saṃvedentī.
tika-s0102t:1147_1: Phassādīnañhi sampayuttadhammānaṃ ārammaṇe ekadeseneva pavatti phusanādimattabhāvato,
tika-s0102t:1147_2: vedanāya pana iṭṭhākārasambhogādivasena pavattanato ārammaṇe nippadesato pavatti.
tika-s0102t:1147_5: evaṃsabhāvāneva tāni gahaṇānīti na vedanāya viya phassādīnampi yathā sakakiccakaraṇena sāmibhāvānubhavanaṃ codetabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1147_7: Viññāṇañhi minitabbavatthuṃ nāḷiyā minanto puriso viya ārammaṇaṃ paricchijja vibhāventaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0102t:1147_9: Tathā hi anena kadāci lakkhaṇattayavibhāvanāpi hoti,
tika-s0102t:1147_10: imesaṃ pana phassādīnaṃ tassa tassa pākaṭabhāvo paccayavisesasiddhassa pubbabhāgassa vasena veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:1148_5: abhijāna”nti ca evamādi vacanato sabbe sammasanupagā dhammā pariggahetabbāti dassento “tattha yassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1148_6: Tattha phassapañcamakeyevāti avadhāraṇaṃ tadantogadhattā taggahaṇeneva gahitattā catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1148_8: Tattha ca phassacetanāggahaṇena sabbasaṅkhārakkhandhadhammasaṅgaho cetanappadhānattā tesaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1148_9: Tathā hi suttantabhājanīye saṅkhārakkhandhavibhaṅge “cakkhusamphassajā cetanā”tiādinā cetanāva vibhattā,
tika-s0102t:1149_10: “Vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti sammasanto vicaratī”ti iminā balavavipassanaṃ vatvā puna tassa ussukkāpanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1150_1: Vedanāvasena cettha arūpakammaṭṭhānakathane kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
tika-s0102t:1150_2: Yathāvuttesu ca tīsu kammaṭṭhānābhinivesesu vedanāvasena kammaṭṭhānābhiniveso sukaro vedanānaṃ vibhūtabhāvatoti
tika-s0102t:1150_4: “Na pākaṭaṃ hotī”ti idaṃ sakkapamukhānaṃ tesaṃ devānaṃ yathā vedanā vibhūtā hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
tika-s0102t:1150_6: Vedanāya eva ca nesaṃ vibhūtabhāvo vedanāmukhenevettha bhagavatā desanāya āraddhattā.
tika-s0102t:1150_7: “Vedanānaṃ uppattiyā pākaṭatāyā”ti idaṃ sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1150_10: Tadubhayaggahaṇamukhena vā gahetabbattā itarāyapi pavatti viññūnaṃ pākaṭā evāti sukhadukkhavedanānañhī”ti visesaggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1150_13: Tattha “sakalaṃ sarīraṃ kho bhante”ntiādinā kāmaṃ pavattioḷārikatāya avūpasantasabhāvametaṃ sukhaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1151_5: Pubbāparaṃ samaṃ sukare supalakkhitamaggavasena pāsāṇatale migagatamaggo viya iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇesu sukhadukkhānubhavanehi
tika-s0102t:1151_10: yasmā iṭṭhāniṭṭhavisayāya ārammaṇūpaladdhiyā anubhavanato niṭṭhāmajjhattavisayā ca upaladdhi,
tika-s0102t:1151_17: Sakkā hi vattuṃ anubhavamānā majjhattavisayupaladdhi upaladdhibhāvato.
tika-s0102t:1151_18: Iṭṭhāniṭṭhavisayupaladdhivisayaṃ pana niranubhavanaṃ taṃ anupaladdhisabhāvameva diṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1151_21: “somanassaṃpāha”ntiādinā samānajātiyampi bhindanto aññehi arūpadhammehi vivecetvā asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ katvāti attho.
tika-s0102t:1152_0: Ayañca rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ vedanāvasena nivattetvā desanā tathāvinetabbapuggalāpekkhāya
tika-s0102t:1152_2: Tattha mahāsatipaṭṭhāne tathā desanāya āgatabhāvo anantarameva āvi bhavissati,
tika-s0102t:1152_6: bhikkhuno sutaṃ hoti ‘sabbe dhammā nālaṃ abhinivesāyā’ti,
tika-s0102t:1152_8: sabbaṃ dhammaṃ abhiññāya sabbaṃ dhammaṃ parijānāti,
tika-s0102t:1152_9: sabbaṃ dhammaṃ pariññāya yaṃ kiñci vedanaṃ vedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā,
tika-s0102t:1152_13: Mahātaṇhāsaṅkhaye pana “so evaṃ anurodhavirodhavippahīno yaṃ kiñci vedanaṃ vedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā,
tika-s0102t:1152_14: so taṃ vedanaṃ nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0102t:1152_15: Tassa taṃ vedanaṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato yā vedanāsu nandī sā nirujjhatī”tiādinā āgataṃ.
tika-s0102t:1152_20: Evaṃ raṭṭhapālasuttādīsupi vedanākammaṭṭhānassa āgataṭṭhānaṃ uddharitvā vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1153_6: Tena cassā purimasiddhā eva ārammaṇanti vedanaṃ vadantena tassārammaṇadhammā atthato paṭhamataraṃ gahitā
tika-s0102t:1153_7: eva nāma hontīti imāya atthāpattiyā rūpakammaṭṭhānassevettha paṭhamaṃ gahitatā jotitā,
tika-s0102t:1154_10: Paṭilābhato samanupassatoti “aho mayā imāni laddhānī”ti yathāladdhāni rūpārammaṇādīni assādayato.
tika-s0102t:1154_16: Kāmaguṇā hi kāmarāgassa gehasadisattā idha “geha”nti adhippetā.
tika-s0102t:1155_2: taṃ pana pabbajjādivasena pavattiyā nekkhammūpasañhitanti āha “nekkhammasitaṃ somanassa”nti.
tika-s0102t:1155_3: Idāni taṃ pāḷivaseneva dassetuṃ “tattha katamānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1155_4: Tattha vipassanālakkhaṇe nekkhamme dassite itarāni tassa kāraṇato, phalato,
tika-s0102t:1155_5: atthato ca dassitāneva hontīti vipassanālakkhaṇameva taṃ dassento “rūpānantvevā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1155_6: Vipariṇāmavirāganirodhanti jarāya vipariṇāmetabbatañceva jarāmaraṇehi palujjanaṃ nirujjhanañca viditvāti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:1155_7: Uppajjati somanassanti vipassanāya vīthipaṭipattiyā kamena uppannānaṃ pāmojjapītipassaddhīnaṃ upari anappakaṃ somanassaṃ uppajjati.
tika-s0102t:1157_0: Amānusī rati hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato.
tika-s0102t:1159_0: Labhatī pītipāmojjaṃ, amataṃ taṃ vijānata”nti. ca –
tika-s0102t:1160_8: Yebhuyyena anussatiyā upacārajjhānaṃ niṭṭhātīti katvā “anussativasenā”ti vatvā “paṭhamajjhānādivasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1160_9: Ettha ca yathā pabbajjā gharabandhanato nikkhamanaṭṭhena nekkhammaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1163_0: Yaṃ ceti ettha ceti nipātamattaṃ somanassassa adhippetattā.
tika-s0102t:1163_2: Dvīsūti “savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ avitakkaṃ avicāra”nti vuttesu dvīsu somanassesu.
tika-s0102t:1164_5: Avitakkaavicāra vipassanā paṇītatarā sammasitadhammavasenapi vipassanāya visesasiddhito,
tika-s0102t:1164_7: Ayaṃ panattho “ariyamagga bojjhaṅgādivisesaṃ vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā niyamentī”ti evaṃ pavattena
tika-s0102t:1165_3: Appaṭilābhato samanupassatoti appaṭilābhena “ahameva na labhāmī”ti paritassanato.
tika-s0102t:1165_4: Samanussaratoti “ahu vata me taṃ vata natthī”tiādinā anussaraṇavasena cintayato.
tika-s0102t:1166_3: Kathaṃ pana lokuttaradhamme ārabbha āsā uppajjatīti?
tika-s0102t:1166_4: Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “yaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena tattha pihā pavattatī”ti avisayattā,
tika-s0102t:1166_6: Anussavūpaladdhe pana anuttaravimokkhe uddissa pihaṃ upaṭṭhapento “tattha pihaṃ upaṭṭhapetī”ti vutto.
tika-s0102t:1166_8: Chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate aniccādivasena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvāti yojanā.
tika-s0102t:1166_9: “Iṭṭhārammaṇe”ti ca iminā nayidaṃ domanassaṃ sabhāvato aniṭṭhadhammeyeva ārabbha uppajjanakaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1166_10: atha kho icchitālābhahetukaṃ icchābhighātavasena yattha katthaci ārammaṇe uppajjanakanti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:1166_11: Evaṃ “kudāssu nāmāha”nti vuttākārena pihaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā evaṃ imampi pakkhaṃ…pe…
tika-s0102t:1166_16: kasiṇaparikammaṃ kātuṃ nāladdha”ntiādivasena pavattiṃ sandhāya “nekkhammavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1167_4: atha kho gehasitadomanasse savitakkasavicāratā niyatā paṭiyoginivattanatthattā eva- kārassa.
tika-s0102t:1167_9: Savitakkasavicārasseva kāraṇabhūtaṃ domanassaṃ savitakkasavicāradomanassaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ?
tika-s0102t:1167_13: Ayañca nayo pariyāyavasena vuttoti āha “nippariyāyena panā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:1167_14: Yadi evaṃ kasmā “yaṃ ce avitakkaṃ avicāra”nti pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti āha “etassa panā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:1168_3: Upacārajjhānañhi paṭhamajjhānādīni vā pādakāni katvā maggaphalāni nibbattetukāmassa tesaṃ alābhe domanassassa
tika-s0102t:1168_4: uppajjane tāni tassa paccayā nāma honti iti te dhammā phalūpacārena “domanassa”nti vuttā.
tika-s0102t:1168_5: Yo pana tathā uppannadomanasso dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā anukkamena vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggaphaladhamme nibbatteti,
tika-s0102t:1168_6: te kāraṇūpacārena “domanassa”nti vuttāti imamatthaṃ dassento “idha bhikkhū”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1168_9: tattha kathaṃ domanassasamaññaṃ āropetvā voharatīti āha “aññesaṃ paṭipattidassanavasena domanassanti gahetvā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:1171_1: Antarāmaggeti bhikkhaṃ gahetvā gāmato vihāraṃ paṭigamanamagge. Tayo…pe…
tika-s0102t:1172_1: Saññaṃ akāsi rattiyaṃ pacchato gacchantaṃ asallakkhento.
tika-s0102t:1173_0: Kasmā pana thero antevāsikānaṃ anārocetvāva gatoti āha “thero kirā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:1173_1: Arahattaṃ nāma kinti tadadhigamassa adukkarabhāvaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0102t:1173_3: tasmā yāva arahattādhigamā sayanaṃ paṭikkhipāmīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:1174_0: “Anucchavikaṃ nu kho te eta”nti saṃvegajāto vīriyaṃ samuttejento arahattaṃ aggahesi ettakaṃ kālaṃ vipassanāya
tika-s0102t:1175_1: Keci pana “parimajjīti parivattetvā therena dhoviyamānaṃ pariggahetvā dhovī”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0102t:1178_4: “Bālassā”tiādīsu bālakaradhammayogato bālassa attahitaparahitabyāmūḷhatāya mūḷhassa puthūnaṃ kilesādīnaṃ
tika-s0102t:1178_5: jananādīhi kāraṇehi puthujjanassa kilesodhīnaṃ maggodhīhi ajitattā anodhijinassa,
tika-s0102t:1178_12: Anekādīnave sabbesampi pāpadhammānaṃ mūlabhūte sammohe ādīnavānaṃ adassanasīlatāya anādīnavadassāvino.
tika-s0102t:1178_14: Ediso ekaṃsena andhaputhujjano nāma hotīti tassa andhaputhujjanabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ punapi “puthujjanassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1178_16: Rūpaṃ sā nātivattatīti rūpānaṃ samatikkamanāya kāraṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0102t:1178_18: Aññāṇāvibhūtatāya ārammaṇe ajjhupekkhanavasena pavattamānā lobhasampayuttaupekkhā idhādhippetāti tassa
tika-s0102t:1178_23: dummocanīyatāya ca tena laggitā viya hutvā uppannā.
tika-s0102t:1179_2: sā pana pabbajjādivasena pavattiyā nekkhammūpasañhitāti āha “nekkhammasitā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1179_3: Idāni taṃ pāḷivasena dassetuṃ “tattha katamā”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1179_5: Rūpaṃ sā ativattatīti rūpasmiṃ sammadeva ādīnavadassanato.
tika-s0102t:1179_10: Aniṭṭhe adussantassāti ettha vuttanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:1179_11: Samaṃ sammā yoniso na pekkhanaṃ asamapekkhanaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1179_12: taṃ pana iṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhatte viya iṭṭhāniṭṭhesupi bālassa hotīti “iṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhatte”ti avatvā “asamapekkhanena asammuyhantassā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1179_17: Ettha upekkhā vāti ettha etasmiṃ upekkhāniddese “upekkhā”ti gahitā eva.
tika-s0102t:1181_2: atha kasmā bhagavā yāva arahattaṃ desanaṃ vaḍḍhesīti āha “buddhānañhī”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:1181_9: Gabbhaseyyakānañhi cavantānaṃ kammajarūpaṃ vigacchati anudeva cittajaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1181_11: utujaṃ pana sucirampi kālaṃ paveṇiṃ ghaṭṭentaṃ bhassantaṃ vā sosantaṃ vā kilesantaṃ vā viṭṭhataṃ vā hoti,
tika-s0102t:1181_13: Tesañhi opapātikattā kammajarūpe antaradhāyante sesatisantatirūpampi tena saddhiṃ antaradhāyati.
tika-s0102t:1181_15: Sesadevatā na jāniṃsu punapi sakkattabhāvena tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne nibbattattā.
tika-s0102t:1181_17: Nibbattitaphalamevāti sappimhā sappimaṇḍo viya āgamanīyapaṭipadāya nibbattitaphalabhūtaṃ lokuttaramaggaphalameva kathitaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1181_18: Sakuṇikāya viya kiñci gayhūpagaṃ uppatitvā uḍḍetvā ullaṅghitvā.
tika-s0102t:1183_4: itarāni pana ‘sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthī’ti ananujānanto indriyasaṃvaro nāma chadvārarakkhāmattakaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1183_9: so itarāni rakkhituṃ abhabbattā asīlo hoti.
tika-s0102t:1183_10: Yassa pana sabbaso arogo sesānaṃ rakkhituṃ bhabbattā sampannasīlo”ti vadati,
tika-s0102t:1183_12: sabbaso ekadesena ca tadantogadhabhāvato tadeva padhānasīlaṃ nāmāti āha “uttamajeṭṭhakasīlasaṃvarāyā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1183_13: Tattha yathā heṭṭhā papañcasaññāsaṅkhānirodhasāruppagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ pucchitena bhagavatā papañcasaññānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1183_14: paṭipadāya ca mūlabhūtaṃ vedanaṃ vibhajitvā paṭipadā desitā sakkassa ajjhāsayavasena saṃkilesadhammappahānamukhena vodānadhammapāripūrīti,
tika-s0102t:1183_15: evaṃ tassā eva paṭipadāya mūlabhūtampi sīlasaṃvaraṃ pucchitena bhagavatā yato so visujjhati,
tika-s0102t:1183_17: tadubhayaṃ sakkassa ajjhāsayavasena vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “kāyasamācārampī”tiādi vuttaṃ saṃkilesadhammappahānamukhena vodānadhammapāripūrīti katvā.
tika-s0102t:1184_1: Kammapathabhāvaṃ apattānampi hi kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ asevitabbakādīnaṃ asevitabbakāyasamācārādibhāvo idha vuccatīti.
tika-s0102t:1184_3: Yato yato hi yā yā veramaṇī,
tika-s0102t:1185_0: Micchā sammā ca pariyesati etāyāti pariyesanā, ājīvo,
tika-s0102t:1185_2: Yadi evaṃ kasmā visuṃ gahaṇanti āha “yasmā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:1187_3: Jātarūparajatanti ettha pana yato vikāraṃ anāpajjitvā sabbaṃ jātarūpameva hotīti jātarūpaṃ nāma suvaṇṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1187_5: Idha pana suvaṇṇaṃ ṭhapetvā yaṃ kiñci upabhogaparibhogārahaṃ “rajata”ntveva gahitaṃ vohārūpagamāsakādi.
tika-s0102t:1188_1: Na hetassa sīsarogādayo byādhayo nāma santi,
tika-s0102t:1188_7: Rāgādīhi pana saṃkilesehi saṃkilissatīti saṃkilesadhammavāre gahitaṃ jātarūpaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1189_0: Idāni anesanāvasenāpi taṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Iminā nayena sukkapakkhepi attho veditabbo.
tika-s0102t:1190_9: Tathā uppāditacitto hi sati paccayasamavāye tādisaṃ payogaṃ parakkamaṃ karonto paṭipattiyā matthakaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-s0102t:1191_4: Buddharatanasaṅgharatanupaṭṭhāneheva dhammaratanupaṭṭhānasiddhīti āha “divasassa dvattikkhattuṃ tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ upaṭṭhānagamanādivasenā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1191_7: “Ajātasattuṃ pasādetvā lābhuppādavasena parihīnalābhasakkārassa kulesu viññāpana”nti evamādiṃ anariyapariyesanaṃ pariyesantānaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1192_1: Aggamaggaphalavaseneva hi sevitabbānaṃ pāripūrīti tadatthaṃ sabbā pubbabhāgapaṭipadā,
tika-s0102t:1192_2: pātimokkhasaṃvaropi aggamaggeneva paripuṇṇo hotīti tadatthaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ vatvā nigamento “pātimokkho…pe…
tika-s0102t:1194_3: tesaṃ pidhānaṃ saṃvaraṇaṃ akusaluppattito gopanāti āha “guttadvāratāyā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1194_7: sakkena pana indriyasaṃvarāya paṭipatti pucchitāti tameva nivattetvā dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃvuttaṃ “cakkhuviññeyyaṃ
tika-s0102t:1194_9: “Tuṇhī ahosī”ti vatvā tuṇhībhāvassa kāraṇaṃ byatirekamukhena vibhāvetuṃ “kathetukāmopī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1195_1: tassa asevanaṃ nāma adassanaṃ evāti āha “na sevitabbaṃ na daṭṭhabba”nti.
tika-s0102t:1195_2: Yaṃ pana sattasantānagataṃ rūpaṃ passato paṭikūlamanasikāravasena,
tika-s0102t:1195_4: Atha vā kammaphalasaddahanavasena pasādo vā uppajjati.
tika-s0102t:1196_4: uccāraṇavasena ca vicittasannivesatāya tathāpavattavikappanavasena cittavicittabhāvena upatiṭṭhanakaṃ
tika-s0102t:1196_5: sandhāyāha “yaṃ cittakkharaṃ cittabyañjanampi saddaṃ suṇato rāgādayo uppajjantī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1196_11: Nibbidā vāti aniccasaññādivasena vaṭṭato ukkaṇṭhā vā.
tika-s0102t:1197_0: Gandharasāviparodhādivasena seviyamānaṃ ayoniso paṭipannattā asevitabbaṃ nāma.
tika-s0102t:1197_1: Yoniso paccavekkhitvā seviyamānaṃ sampajaññavasena gahaṇato sevitabbaṃ nāma.
tika-s0102t:1198_0: Yaṃ pana phusatoti yaṃ pana sevitabbaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ anipphannasseva phusato.
tika-s0102t:1198_2: Vīriyañca supaggahitaṃ hoti catutthassa ariyavaṃsassa ukkaṃsanato.
tika-s0102t:1199_0: Ye manoviññeyye dhamme iṭṭhādibhede samannāharantassa āvajjantassa āpāthaṃ āgacchanti.
tika-s0102t:1199_2: mettādivasena samannāharantassa ye manoviññeyyā dhammā āpāthaṃ āgacchanti,
tika-s0102t:1199_5: Tiṇṇaṃ therānaṃ dhammāti idāni vuccamānapaṭipattīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ therānaṃ manoviññeyyā dhammā.
tika-s0102t:1199_6: Bahi dhāvituṃ na adāsinti antopariveṇaṃ āgatameva rūpādiṃ ārabbha imasmiṃ temāse kammaṭṭhānavinimuttaṃ cittaṃ kadāci uppannapubbaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1199_8: tasmā visaṭavitakkavasena cittaṃ bahi dhāvituṃ na adāsinti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:1199_11: Thero kira sabbampi attanā kātabbakiriyaṃ kammaṭṭhānasīseneva paṭipajjati.
tika-s0102t:1200_1: Asammohasampajaññavasena advejjhābhāvato eko anto etassāti ekanto,
tika-s0102t:1201_0: Iti sakko pubbe attanā sutaṃ puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ nānāvādā cāraladdhiniṭṭhānaṃ idāni saccapaṭivedhena asārato ñatvā ṭhito,
tika-s0102t:1201_1: tassa kāraṇaṃ ñātukāmo tameva tāva byatirekamukhena pucchati “sabbeva dhammā nu kho”tiādinā.
tika-s0102t:1202_1: ajjhāsayadhātūti ca atthato ajjhāsayo evāti āha “anekajjhāsayo nānajjhāsayo”ti.
tika-s0102t:1202_2: “Ekasmiṃ gantukāme eko ṭhātukāmo hotī”ti idaṃ nidassanavasena vuttaṃ iriyāpathepi nāma sattā ekajjhāsayā dullabhā,
tika-s0102t:1202_4: Yaṃ yadeva ajjhāsayanti yaṃ yameva sassatādiajjhāsayaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1202_5: Abhinivisantīti taṃ taṃ laddhiṃ diṭṭhābhinivesavasena abhimukhā hutvā duppaṭinissaggibhāvena nivisanti,
tika-s0102t:1202_7: Thāmena ca parāmāsena cāti diṭṭhithāmena ca diṭṭhiparāmāsena ca.
tika-s0102t:1202_9: Voharantīti yathābhiniviṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhivādaṃ paññāpenti pare hi gāhenti patiṭṭhapenti.
tika-s0102t:1203_9: Pariyassati parikkhissati vaṭṭadukkhantaṃ āgammāti pariyosānantipi nibbānassa nāmaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1204_1: Vināsetīti tato eva sabbaso adassanaṃ pāpeti.
tika-s0102t:1205_3: yo pana ñātuṃ icchito attho, so pañho.
tika-s0102t:1205_4: So eva ca vissajjīyatīti nāyaṃ doso,
tika-s0102t:1205_5: aññathā ambaṃ puṭṭhassa labujaṃ byākaraṇaṃ viya siyā,
tika-s0102t:1205_9: Papañcasaññāti saññāsīsena papañcā eva vuttāti āha “papañco eko”ti.
tika-s0102t:1205_10: Ettha ca yathā pātimokkhasaṃvarapucchā kāyasamācārādivibhāgena vissajjitattā tayo pañhā jātā,
tika-s0102t:1205_11: evaṃ indriyasaṃvarapucchā rūpādivibhāgena vissajjitattā cha pañhā siyuṃ.
tika-s0102t:1205_14: evaṃ sati pātimokkhasaṃvarapucchābhāvasāmaññena tepi tayo ekova pañhoti sabbeva dvādaseva pañhā bhaveyyunti?
tika-s0102t:1205_16: Yasmā kāyasamācārādīsu vibhajja vuccamānesu mahāvisayatāya aparimāṇo vibhāgo sambhavati vissajjetuṃ.
tika-s0102t:1205_18: Rūpādīsu pana vibhajja vuccamānesu appavisayatāya na tādiso vibhāgo sambhavati vissajjetuṃ.
tika-s0102t:1205_19: Iti mahāvisayatāya pātimokkhasaṃvarapucchā tayo pañhā katā,
tika-s0102t:1205_20: indriyasaṃvarapucchā pana appavisayatāya ekova pañho kato.
tika-s0102t:1206_2: Taṇhā hi kāmarāgarūparāgaarūparāgādivasena pavattiyā anavaṭṭhitatāya sayampi calati,
tika-s0102t:1206_6: Pīḷanaṭṭhenāti vibādhanaṭṭhena tassa tassa dukkhassa hetubhāvena.
tika-s0102t:1206_19: “Ahaṃ kho pana bhante aññesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ dhammācariyo hontopi bhagavato sāvako…pe…
tika-s0102t:1208_2: Jiniṃsūti yathā asurā puna sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
tika-s0102t:1208_3: evaṃ devā vijiniṃsuyevāti dassento āha “devā puna apaccāgamanāya asure jiniṃsū”ti.
tika-s0102t:1208_4: Tādiso hissa jayo sātisayaṃ vedapaṭilābhāya ahosi.
tika-s0102t:1208_10: daṇḍena paharitvā vā āvaritvā vā sādhetabbanti attho.
tika-s0102t:1209_2: Devabhūtassa meti pubbepi devabhūtassa sakkasseva me bhūtassa.
tika-s0102t:1209_3: Satoti idānipi sakkasseva sato punarāyu ca me laddho.
tika-s0102t:1210_2: “Amūḷho gabbhaṃ essāmī”ti iminā ariyasāvakānaṃ andhaputhujjanānaṃ viya sammohamaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1210_4: atha kho asammohamaraṇañceva sampajānagabbhokkamanañca hotīti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:1210_6: tatthāpi manussesu uppajjantā uḷāresu eva kulesu paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhissanti,
tika-s0102t:1210_8: Tena vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “yattha me ramatī mano”ti,
tika-s0102t:1210_10: Sakko pana attano dibbānubhāvenāpi tādisaṃ jānituṃ sakkotiyeva.
tika-s0102t:1212_0: Sakadāgāmimaggaṃ sandhāya vadati chaṭṭhe atthavase anāgāmimaggassa vakkhamānattā.
tika-s0102t:1212_2: Manussaloke anto bhavissati puna mānussūpapattiyā abhāvato.
tika-s0102t:1213_0: Punadevāti manussesu uppanno tato cavitvā punadeva.
tika-s0102t:1214_0: Antime bhaveti mama sabbabhavesu antime sabbapariyosāne bhave.
tika-s0102t:1214_1: “Āyunā”ti iminā ca taṃsahabhāvino sabbepi vaṇṇādike saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0102t:1214_4: Akaniṭṭhagāmī hutvāti antarāyaparinibbāyiādibhāvaṃ anupagantvā ekaṃsato uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī eva hutvā.
tika-s0102t:1214_8: nibbattissatī”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “esa kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1214_10: atha kho mahāseṭṭhimahāupāsikānampi hotiyevāti dassento “sakko devarājā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1215_1: Bhavasampattinibbānasampattīnaṃ vasena aparipuṇṇajjhāsayatāya aniṭṭhitamanoratho taṃ taṃ pattukāmoyeva hutvā ṭhito.
tika-s0102t:1215_2: Ye ca samaṇeti ye ca pabbajite.
tika-s0102t:1216_0: Sampādanāti maggassa upasampādanaṃ tassa sampāpanaṃ sammadeva pāpanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1216_3: Yathāpucchite atthe anabhisambhuṇanaṃ nāma sammā kathetuṃ asamatthatā evāti āha “sampādetvā kathetuṃ na sakkontī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1217_3: atha vā ādiccassa bandhūti ādiccabandhu, bhagavā,
tika-s0102t:1222_1: satthu pana sāvakassa sāmaṃpayogo nāma sanipāto evāti āha “namakkāraṃ karomā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1223_1: Parāmasitvāti “imāya nāma pathaviyaṃ nisinnena mayā ayaṃ acchariyadhammo adhigato”ti somanassajāto,
tika-s0102t:1223_2: “imāya nāma pathaviyaṃ evaṃ acchariyabbhutaṃ buddharatanaṃ uppanna”nti acchariyabbhutacittajāto ca pathaviṃ parāmasitvā.
tika-s0102t:1223_3: Patthitapañhāti dīgharattānusayitasaṃsayasamugghātatthaṃ “kadā nu kho bhagavantaṃ pucchituṃ labhāmī”ti evaṃ abhipatthitapañhā.
tika-s0102t:1229_1: “Kasmā bhagavā idaṃ suttamabhāsī”ti asādhāraṇaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ pucchati,
tika-s0102t:1229_6: Tattha sādhāraṇaṃ ajjhattikaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ nāma bhagavato mahākaruṇā.
tika-s0102t:1229_7: Tāya hi samussāhitassa bhagavato veneyyānaṃ dhammadesanāya cittaṃ udapādi.
tika-s0102t:1229_8: Yathāha “sattesu ca kāruññataṃ paṭicca buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokesī”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:1229_9: bāhiraṃ pana sādhāraṇaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ nāma dasasahassamahābrahmaparivārassa sahampatimahābrahmuno ajjhesanaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1229_11: tadajjhesanuttarakālañhi dhammapaccavekkhaṇājanitaṃ appossukkataṃ paṭipassambhetvā bhagavā dhammaṃ desetuṃ ussāhajāto ahosi.
tika-s0102t:1229_13: evaṃ dasabalañāṇādayo ca desanāya ajjhattasamuṭṭhānabhāve vattabbā.
tika-s0102t:1229_16: sattānañca āsayānusayādiṃ yāthāvato jānitvā bhagavā ṭhānāṭṭhānādīsu kosallena veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ vicittanayadesanaṃ pavattesīti.
tika-s0102t:1229_19: yena ca desanāñāṇena idaṃ suttaṃ pavattitaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1229_23: tena “attajjhāsayādīsu catūsu suttanikkhepesu kataroya”nti suttanikkhepo pucchito hotīti itaro “kururaṭṭhavāsīna”ntiādinā
tika-s0102t:1230_0: Kururaṭṭhaṃ kira tadā taṃnivāsisattānaṃ yonisomanasikāravantatādinā yebhuyyena suppaṭipannatāya,
tika-s0102t:1230_1: pubbe ca katapuññatābalena tadā utuādisampattiyuttameva ahosi.
tika-s0102t:1230_4: Keci pana “pubbe pavattakuruvattadhammānuṭṭhānavāsanāya uttarakuru viya yebhuyyena utuādisampannameva
tika-s0102t:1230_5: hontaṃ bhagavato kāle sātisayaṃ utusappāyādiyuttaṃ taṃ raṭṭhaṃ ahosī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0102t:1230_13: dhammānupassanāvasena pañcasu ṭhānesūti evaṃ ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesu.
tika-s0102t:1230_14: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ arahatte pakkhipitvāti catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ yathā arahattaṃ pāpeti,
tika-s0102t:1230_17: maṇimuttādisattaratanāni ca yathā bhājanasampattiyā savisesaṃ sobhanti,
tika-s0102t:1230_19: evaṃ sīladassanādisampattiyā bhājanavisesabhūtāya kururaṭṭhavāsiparisāya desitā bhagavato ayaṃ desanā bhiyyoso mattāya sobhati,
tika-s0102t:1230_20: kiccakārī ca hotīti imamatthaṃ dasseti “yathā hi puriso”tiādinā.
tika-s0102t:1232_0: Vissaṭṭhaattabhāvenāti aniccādivasena kismiñci yonisomanasikāre cittaṃ aniyojetvā rūpādiārammaṇe abhirativasena vissaṭṭhacittena bhavituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-s0102t:1233_3: atha kho aññepi bahū maggapariyāyāti paduddhāraṃ karonto “maggassa hī”ti ādiṃ vatvā yadi maggapariyāyo ayana- saddo,
tika-s0102t:1233_12: uddese pana satiyā eva gahaṇaṃ veneyyajjhāsayavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1233_13: “Na dvidhāpathabhūto”ti iminā imassa maggassa anekamaggabhāvābhāvaṃ viya anibbānagāmibhāvābhāvañca dasseti.
tika-s0102t:1233_20: Seṭṭhopi loke “eko”ti vuccati “yāva pare ekāhaṃ vo karomī”tiādīsūti āha “ekassāti seṭṭhassā”ti.
tika-s0102t:1234_0: Nānāmukhabhāvanānayappavattoti kāyānupassanādimukhena tatthāpi ānāpānādimukhena bhāvanānayena pavatto.
tika-s0102t:1234_6: “Yāvatā bhikkhave dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā virāgo tesaṃ aggaṃ akkhāyatī”ti.
tika-s0102t:1234_9: Avibhāgena sabbepi satte hitena anukampatīti hitānukampī.
tika-s0102t:1235_2: Na hi saṅkheyyappadhānatāya sattavācino ekasaddassa kiriyāvuttivācakatā atthi.
tika-s0102t:1235_3: “Sakimpi uddhaṃ gaccheyyā”tiādīsu viya sakiṃ ayanoti iminā byañjanena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1235_4: Evamatthaṃ yojetvāti “ekaṃ ayanaṃ assā”ti evaṃ samāsapadatthaṃ yojetvā.
tika-s0102t:1236_0: Imasmiṃ padeti “ekāyano ayaṃ bhikkhave maggo”ti imasmiṃ vākye,
tika-s0102t:1237_0: Saddaṃ sutvāti “kālo bhante dhammasavanāyā”ti kālārocanasaddaṃ paccakkhato,
tika-s0102t:1237_2: Evaṃ ukkhipitvāti evaṃ “sundaraṃ manoharaṃ imaṃ kathaṃ chaḍḍemā”ti achaḍḍentā ucchubhāraṃ viya paggahetvā na vicaranti.
tika-s0102t:1237_4: Ekāyanamaggo vuccati pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānamaggoti ettāvatā idhādhippetatthe siddhe tasseva alaṅkāratthaṃ so pana yassa pubbabhāgamaggo,
tika-s0102t:1237_5: taṃ dassetuṃ “maggānaṭṭhaṅgiko”tiādikā gāthāpi paṭisambhidāmaggatova ānetvā ṭhapitā.
tika-s0102t:1238_0: Nibbānagamanaṭṭhenāti nibbānaṃ gacchati adhigacchati etenāti nibbānagamanaṃ,soyeva aviparītasabhāvatāya attho,
tika-s0102t:1238_9: “Abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhī”ti pana iminā sabbesampi upakkilesānaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ te visuṃ uddhaṭā.
tika-s0102t:1238_10: “Sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”ti vuttassa atthassa ekantikataṃ dassento “tathā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1238_12: cittasseva pana visuddhi idhādhippetāti dassetuṃ “rūpamalavasena panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1238_14: atha kho idaṃ ettha āhacca bhāsitanti dassento “tathā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1239_0: Sā panāyaṃ cittavisuddhi sijjhamānā yasmā sokādīnaṃ anuppādāya saṃvattati,
tika-s0102t:1239_2: Tattha socanaṃ ñātibyasanādinimittaṃ cetaso santāpo antonijjhānaṃ soko.
tika-s0102t:1239_3: Ñātibyasanādinimittameva sokāvatiṇṇato “kahaṃ ekaputtaka kahaṃ ekaputtakā”tiādinā paridevanavasena vācāvippalāpo paridavanaṃ paridevo.
tika-s0102t:1240_1: taṃ visodhehīti atītesu khandhesu taṇhāsaṃkilesavisodhanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1240_8: No ce gahessasīti na upādiyissasi ce,
tika-s0102t:1240_10: Upasanto carissasīti evaṃ addhattayagatasaṃkilesavisodhane sati nibbutasabbapariḷāhatāya upasanto hutvā
tika-s0102t:1241_6: puttā vā pitā vā bandhavā vā antakena maccunā adhipannassa abhibhūtassa maraṇato tāṇāya na honti. Kasmā?
tika-s0102t:1241_8: Na hi ñātīnaṃ vasena maraṇato ārakkhā atthi,
tika-s0102t:1241_9: tasmā paṭācāre “ubho puttā kālaṅkatā”tiādinā mā niratthakaṃ paridevi,
tika-s0102t:1241_11: Sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitāti yathānulomaṃ pavattitāya sāmukkaṃsikāya dhammadesanāya pariyosāne sahassanayapaṭimaṇḍite sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
tika-s0102t:1241_12: Kathaṃ panāyaṃ satipaṭṭhānamaggavasena sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsīti āha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:1241_13: Na hi catusaccakammaṭṭhānakathāya vinā sāvakānaṃ ariyamaggādhigamo atthi.
tika-s0102t:1241_14: “Imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā”ti panidaṃ sokavinodanavasena pavattitāya gāthāya paṭhamaṃ sutattā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1241_15: sāpi hi saccadesanāya parivārabandhā eva aniccatākathāti katvā.
tika-s0102t:1241_19: Tasmāti yasmā rūpādīnaṃ aniccādito anupassanāpi satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāva, tasmā.
tika-s0102t:1242_0: Pañcasate coreti satasatacoraparivāre pañcacore paṭipāṭiyā pesesi,
tika-s0102t:1242_1: te araññaṃ pavisitvā theraṃ pariyesantā anukkamena therassa samīpe samāgacchiṃsu.
tika-s0102t:1242_3: Vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvāti ūruṭṭhibhedapaccayaṃ dukkhavedanaṃ amanasikārena vinodetvā.
tika-s0102t:1242_6: Therassa hi sīlaṃ paccavekkhato parisuddhaṃ sīlaṃ nissāya uḷāraṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppajjamānaṃ ūruṭṭhibhedajanitaṃ dukkhavedanaṃ vikkhambhesi.
tika-s0102t:1244_1: mallayuddhacittakatāya ca “pītamallo”ti paññāto pabbajitvā pītamallatthero nāma jāto.
tika-s0102t:1244_4: Taṃyeva aṅkusaṃ katvāti “rūpādayo ‘mamā’ti na gahetabbā”ti natumhākavaggena pakāsitamatthaṃ attano cittamattahatthino aṅkusaṃ katvā.
tika-s0102t:1244_5: Pādesu avahantesūti ativelaṃ caṅkamanena akkamituṃ asamatthesu.
tika-s0102t:1244_7: Byākaritvāti attano vīriyārambhassa saphalatāpavedanamukhena sabrahmacārīnaṃ tattha ussāhaṃ janento aññaṃ byākaritvā.
tika-s0102t:1244_11: Tayidaṃ me saṅkhārānaṃ accantavūpasamakāraṇanti dassento “aniccā vatā”ti gāthamāhari,
tika-s0102t:1244_12: tena idānāhaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe bhaṅgasaṅkhātassa rogassa abhāvena arogo parinibbutoti dasseti.
tika-s0102t:1245_0: Assāti sakkassa. Upapattīti devūpapatti. Puna pākatikāva ahosi sakkabhāveneva upapannattā.
tika-s0102t:1246_1: Accharānaṃ nirayūpapattiṃ disvā tato pabhuti satataṃ pavattamānaṃ attano cittutrāsaṃ sandhāyāha “niccaṃ utrastamidaṃ citta”ntiādi.
tika-s0102t:1246_13: Tadā attano parivārassa uppannaṃ dukkhaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0102t:1248_1: taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati etenāti ñāyo,
tika-s0102t:1248_2: ariyamaggoti āha “ñāyo vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti.
tika-s0102t:1248_6: sattehi ca dukkhaṃ vinati saṃsibbatīti “vāna”nti vuccati,
tika-s0102t:1248_8: na vā etasmiṃ adhigate puggalassa vānanti nibbānaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1249_0: Nanu “visuddhiyā”ti cittavisuddhiyā adhippetattā visuddhiggahaṇenevettha sokasamatikkamādayopi gahitā eva honti,
tika-s0102t:1249_1: te puna kasmā gahitāti anuyogaṃ sandhāya “tattha kiñcāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1249_3: Taṃ tamatthaṃ ñāpetīti ye ye bodhaneyyapuggalā saṅkhepavitthārādivasena yathā yathā bodhetabbā,
tika-s0102t:1249_4: attano desanāvilāsena bhagavā te te tathā tathā bodhento taṃ tamatthaṃ ñāpeti.
tika-s0102t:1249_5: Taṃ taṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassentoti atthāpattiṃ agaṇento taṃ tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassento.
tika-s0102t:1249_9: Yasmā anatikkantasokaparidevassa na kadāci cittavisuddhi atthi sokaparidevasamatikkamanamukheneva cittavisuddhiyā ijjhanato,
tika-s0102t:1249_11: Yasmā pana domanassapaccayehi dukkhadhammehi phuṭṭhaṃ puthujjanaṃ sokādayo abhibhavanti,
tika-s0102t:1249_12: pariññātesu ca tesu te na honti,
tika-s0102t:1249_17: Sacchikiriyābhisamayasahabhāvīpi itarābhisamayo tadavinābhāvato sacchikiriyābhisamayahetuko viya vutto.
tika-s0102t:1249_18: Ñāyassādhigamo nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyāti phalañāṇena vā paccakkhakaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1250_2: atha kho aññatthāpi satthu āciṇṇaṃ evāti dassento “yatheva hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0102t:1250_3: Tattha ādimhi kalyāṇamādi vā kalyāṇaṃ etassāti ādikalyāṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1250_21: Na saṅkīyantīti idānipi tehi na apanīyanti.
tika-s0102t:1250_22: Na saṅkīyissantīti anāgatepi tehi na apanīyissanti.
tika-s0102t:1251_7: pavāḷanti pallavopi vuccatīti rattajambunadādipadehi te visesitā.
tika-s0102t:1252_1: kāyavedanācittavimuttassa tebhūmakadhammassa visuṃ vipallāsavatthantarabhāvena gahitattā ca heṭṭhā gahaṇesu
tika-s0102t:1252_3: pañcamassa pana vipallāsavatthuno abhāvā “na uddha”nti āha.
tika-s0102t:1252_12: manasikārasamudayā dhammānaṃ samudayo”ti “satipaṭṭhānā”ti vuttānaṃ sabhigocarānaṃ pakāsake suttappadese saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0102t:1252_16: Dānādīni karontassa rūpādīni satiyā ṭhānaṃ hontīti taṃnivāraṇatthamāha “padhānaṃ ṭhāna”nti. Pa-
tika-s0102t:1252_17: saddo hi idha “paṇītā dhammā”tiādīsu viya padhānatthadīpakoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0102t:1254_4: satthā sāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti anukampako hitesī anukampaṃ upādāya ‘idaṃ vo hitāya idaṃ vo sukhāyā’ti.
tika-s0102t:1254_8: vokkamma ca satthu sāsanā vattanti. Tatra,
tika-s0102t:1254_12: anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajāno. Idaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1255_4: na ca vokkamma satthu sāsanā vattanti. Tatra,
tika-s0102t:1255_10: anattamanatā ca attamanatā ca tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
tika-s0102t:1257_2: Buddhānaṃyeva hi niccaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitā hoti āveṇikadhammabhāvato,
tika-s0102t:1257_5: ārambho ca pavattīti katvā āha “pavattayitabbatoti attho”ti.
tika-s0102t:1257_6: Satiyā karaṇabhūtāya paṭṭhānaṃ paṭṭhapetabbaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Ana-
tika-s0102t:1257_10: saddo bhusatthavisiṭṭhaṃ pakkhandanaṃ dīpetīti “okkanditvā pakkhanditvā pattharitvā pavattatīti attho”ti āha.
tika-s0102t:1258_8: teneva niyyānikabhāvena ekattūpagato ekantato nibbānaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0102t:1258_11: Tattha catassopi cetāti kāyānupassanādivasena catubbidhāpi ca etā satiyo.
tika-s0102t:1258_13: Kiccaṃ sādhayamānāti pubbabhāge kāyādīsu subhasaññādividhamanavasena visuṃ visuṃ pavattitvā maggakkhaṇe
tika-s0102t:1258_14: satiyeva tattha catubbidhassapi vipallāsassa samucchedavasena pahānakiccaṃ sādhayamānā ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-s0102t:1258_17: Evañca satīti evaṃ maggaṭṭhena ekattaṃ upādāya “maggo”ti ekavacanena,
tika-s0102t:1258_18: ārammaṇabhedena catubbidhataṃ upādāya “cattāro”ti ca vattabbatāya sati vijjamānattā.
tika-s0102t:1258_21: Vuttamevatthaṃ nidassanena paṭipādetuṃ “mārasenappamaddana”nti suttapadaṃ ānetvā “yathā”tiādinā nidassanaṃ saṃsandati.
tika-s0102t:1259_1: vedanā ca assādassa kāraṇanti tappahānatthaṃ tesu taṇhāvatthūsu oḷārikasukhumesu asubhadukkhabhāvadassanāni
tika-s0102t:1259_2: mandatikkhapaññehi taṇhācaritehi sukarānīti tāni tesaṃ “visuddhimaggo”ti vuttāni.
tika-s0102t:1259_3: Tathā “niccaṃ attā”ti abhinivesavatthutāya diṭṭhiyā visesakāraṇesu cittadhammesu aniccānattatādassanāni sarāgādivasena,
tika-s0102t:1259_5: nīvaraṇādivasena ca nātippabhedātippabhedagatesu tesu tappahānatthaṃ mandatikkhapaññānaṃ diṭṭhicaritānaṃ
tika-s0102t:1259_7: Ettha ca yathā cittadhammānampi taṇhāya vatthubhāvo sambhavati,
tika-s0102t:1259_8: tathā kāyavedanānampi diṭṭhiyāti satipi nesaṃ catunnampi taṇhādiṭṭhivatthubhāve yo yassā sātisayapaccayo,
tika-s0102t:1259_10: Tikkhapaññasamathayāniko oḷārikārammaṇaṃ pariggaṇhanto tattha aṭṭhatvā jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā uṭṭhāya vedanaṃ
tika-s0102t:1259_13: dhammesu ca cittaṃ pakkhandatīti cittadhammānupassanānaṃ mandatikkhapaññavipassanāyānikānaṃ visuddhimaggatā vuttā.
tika-s0102t:1260_2: Parato tesaṃ tatthāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0102t:1260_3: Pañca kāmaguṇā savisesā kāye labbhantīti visesena kāyo kāmoghassa vatthu,
tika-s0102t:1260_4: bhavesu sukhaggahaṇavasena bhavassādo hotīti bhavoghassa vedanā vatthu,
tika-s0102t:1260_5: santatighanaggahaṇavasena visesato citte attābhiniveso hotīti diṭṭhoghassa cittaṃ vatthu,
tika-s0102t:1260_7: dhammānaṃ dhammamattatāya duppaṭivijjhattā ca sammoho hotīti avijjoghassa dhammā vatthu,
tika-s0102t:1260_8: tasmā tesu tesaṃ pahānatthaṃ cattārova vuttā.
tika-s0102t:1261_0: Evaṃ kāyādīnaṃ kāmoghādivatthubhāvakathaneneva kāmayogakāmāsavādīnampi vatthubhāvo dīpito hoti oghehi tesaṃ atthato anaññattā.
tika-s0102t:1261_3: “Dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anusetī”ti dukkhadukkhavipariṇāmadukkhasaṅkhāradukkhabhūtā vedanā visesena byāpādakāyaganthassa vatthu.
tika-s0102t:1261_4: Citte niccaggahaṇavasena sassatassa attano sīlena suddhīti ādi parāmasanaṃ hotīti sīlabbataparāmāsassa cittaṃ vatthu.
tika-s0102t:1261_5: Nāmarūpaparicchedena bhūtaṃ bhūtato apassantassa bhavavibhavadiṭṭhisaṅkhāto idaṃsaccābhiniveso hotīti tassa dhammā vatthu.
tika-s0102t:1261_9: Sukhavedanassādavasena paralokanirapekkho “natthi dinna”ntiādikaṃ parāmāsaṃ uppādetīti diṭṭhupādānassa vedanā vatthu.
tika-s0102t:1261_12: Santatighanaggahaṇavasena sarāgādicitte sammoho hotīti mohāgatiyā cittaṃ vatthu.
tika-s0102t:1261_13: Dhammasabhāvānavabodhe bhayaṃ hotīti bhayāgatiyā dhammā vatthu.
tika-s0102t:1262_3: viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti vacanato kāyādīnaṃ samudayabhūtā kabaḷīkāraphassamanosañcetanāviññāṇāhārā
tika-s0102t:1263_2: Saranti gacchanti nibbānaṃ etāyāti satīti imasmiṃ atthe ekatte ekasabhāve nibbāne samosaraṇaṃ samāgamo ekattasamosaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1264_0: Ekanibbānapavesahetubhūto vā samānatāya eko satipaṭṭhānasabhāvo ekattaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1264_4: Etasmiṃ atthe saraṇekattasamosaraṇāni saheva satipaṭṭhānekabhāvassa kāraṇattena vuttānīti daṭṭhabbāni,
tika-s0102t:1264_6: Saraṇavasenāti vā gamanavasenāti atthe sati tadeva gamanaṃ samosaraṇanti,
tika-s0102t:1264_10: pacchimaṃ ekabhāvassāti nibbānasamosaraṇepi sahitāneva tāni satipaṭṭhānekabhāvassa kāraṇāni vuttāni honti.
tika-s0102t:1265_3: pañcavidhenā”ti idaṃ upari pāḷiyaṃ āgatānaṃ ānāpānapabbādīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0102t:1266_3: so cassa sannissayo sāsanato añño natthīti vuttaṃ “idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane”ti.
tika-s0102t:1266_7: “Gocare bhikkhave caratha sake pettike visaye”tiādi vacanato bhikkhugocarā ete dhammā,
tika-s0102t:1266_10: tasmā “kāyānupassī viharatī”tiādinā bhikkhuṃ dasseti bhikkhumhi taṃniyamatoti āha “paṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanato”ti.
tika-s0102t:1266_14: Bhikkhuparisāya jeṭṭhabhāvato rājagamanañāyena itarā parisāpi atthato gahitāva hontīti āha “sesā”tiādi.
tika-s0102t:1266_15: Evaṃ paṭhamaṃ kāraṇaṃ vibhajitvā itarampi vibhajituṃ “yo ca ima”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0102t:1267_0: Samaṃ careyyāti kāyādi visamacariyaṃ pahāya kāyādīhi samaṃ careyya.
tika-s0102t:1267_6: Ariyabhāve ṭhito so evarūpo bāhitapāpasamitapāpabhinnakilesatāhi “brāhmaṇo, samaṇo,
